[\[61b.6\]]kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de lta de ltar shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las byed par 'gyur zhing sogs par 'gyur ro/_/de dag shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa 
[\[61b.7\]]nyid mngon sum du byed par yang 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de dag lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par yang mi 'gyur na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis pa las 'da' bar ni mi 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis kyang don gyi dbang 'di mthong na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya zhing rnal 'byor du bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 
[\[62a.2\]]'dzin par 'dod pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya zhing 
[\[62a.3\]]gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon 
[\[62a.4\]]tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par byed cing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed la/_srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /_srog chags stong phrag 
[\[62a.5\]]mang po dang /_srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de/_rab tu 'god la de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du sgrub cing rtsol la 'bad de slob cing mos 
[\[62a.6\]]na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni srid pa tha ma la gnas pa 'am/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa 'am/_skye ba gnyis kyis thogs pa ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur 
[\[62a.7\]]bar rig par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis thos par mi nus te/_
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ba zhig gi rna lam du grag par gyur na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des kyang myur ba myur bar gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya zhing /_gzhan dag la 
[\[62b.2\]]yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sems can 'ga' zhig gi don gyi phyir kye ma sems can 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[62b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur cig ces 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dbyig dang gser gyis yongs su bkang ste/_sbyin pa byin zhing yongs su btang bar gyur kyang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams 
[\[62b.4\]]kyis ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos thams cad rab 
[\[62b.5\]]tu rnam par 'byed par byed cing rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon 
[\[62b.6\]]tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams kyi lag na gnas par mi 'gyur te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan du na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mkhas pa shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa rnams kyi lag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[62b.7\]]rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa dang /_lus la gnas pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rin po che rin thang med pa rin che ba gang yang rung ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]nang nas khyer te 'ongs par gyur na sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_nor bu rin po che de dang po kho nar su'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rin po che de ni dang po kho nar rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i bu rnams sam/_rgyal po'i 
[\[63a.2\]]blon po chen po rnams kyi sug par mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang 
[\[63a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i lag tu gnas par 'gyur te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[63a.4\]]grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par byed cing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor du sgrub par byed pa de dag 
[\[63a.5\]]ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'tshal ba 
[\[63a.6\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_bklag par bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi zhing gzhan dag la yang rgya 
[\[63a.7\]]cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zhugs pa na phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis/_
[\[63b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya zhing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag 
[\[63b.3\]]par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun po dag ni las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du ngas 'khor bzhi po rnams la yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[63b.4\]]grangs 'di bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis 
[\[63b.5\]]bshad cing /_rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang /_nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[63b.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pas thos shing nyan par 'gyur ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la 
[\[63b.7\]]sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa drug gang na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang dper na ngas da ltar 'khor bzhi po dag la bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa bzhin du lhag chad med par 'khor bzhi po dag la bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[64a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[64a.3\]]grangs 'di gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya zhing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba la la zhig gis 
[\[64a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_gzhan 
[\[64a.5\]]dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya bar mi rnyed par gyur la/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba de la gal te la la zhig gis 'di skad du gal te rigs kyi bu khyod khyim gyi gnas na gnas 
[\[64a.6\]]shing btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te spyod par byed na de lta na ngas khyod la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes zer na sha ra 
[\[64a.7\]]dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya ba'i phyir gal te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa 'am/_gzung ba 'am/_bcang ba 'am/_bklag pa 'am/_kun chub par bya ba 'am/_gzhan 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par byar rnyed na khyim gyi gnas su song ste/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung zhing /_kun chub par byas te/_yang phyir mngon par byung yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi 
[\[64b.2\]]gnas nas mngon par byung ba btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba de la ltung ba med par ngas rjes su gnang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de 'das na yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[64b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_thag ring por gyur pa gang zhig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[64b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des der yang bgrod par bya zhing der phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[64b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya zhing /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi 
[\[64b.6\]]bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par 
[\[64b.7\]]bya zhing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/zhes sems bskyed la/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brjod par mi nus kyi/_glegs bam du byas pa zhig lag na srel bar gyur na des glegs bam de brnyas te/_phyir log nas bdag gis glegs bam bri bar bya'o/_/gal te glegs bam bkur du mi ster na yang de nyid 
[\[65a.2\]]du bri bar bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de 'di skad du gal te rigs kyi bu khyod zan bcad de 'dri phod na de lta na ngas khyod la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan 
[\[65a.3\]]yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sbyin par bya'o/_/zhes zer na yang des zan bcad de 'dug la bri bar bya'o/_/gal te yang 'di skad du 'chag cing bris shig ces zer na yang des 'chag cing bri bar bya'o/_/gal te yang 'di skad du 'greng ste bris shig ces zer na yang 
[\[65a.4\]]des 'greng ste bri bar bya'o/_/gal te yang 'di skad du 'dug ste bris shig ces zer na yang des 'dug ste bri bar bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[65a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i don gyi phyir grong ngam grong khyer du song nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod 
[\[65a.6\]]pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma rnyed par gyur na de nas rgyal khams gzhan nam/_yul gzhan dag tu yang bgrod cing gang du thos par 'gyur ba der 'gro bar bya'o/_/der phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[65a.7\]]rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya zhing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar gang du thos 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]par 'gyur ba der phyin nas gal te ma rnyed na yang des 'di snyam du gang gi phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'i ming thos par gyur pas na 
[\[65b.2\]]bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i 'jigs pa yang med la/_gang gis da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[65b.3\]]grangs de'i ming bstan pa de yang bdag la phan par 'dod pa/_bde bar 'dod pa/_don du 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin no snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[65b.4\]]rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis ngas bshad de/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[65b.5\]]mo gang dag gis thos pa dang /_gang dag thos par 'gyur ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[65b.6\]]to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su'i mthus thos par 'gyur/_bcom 
[\[65b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu nga 'das pa'i 'og tu/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid kyi mthus thos par 'gyur zhing /_ji ltar dam pa'i chos smra ba dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon 
[\[66a.2\]]tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di smra bar 'gyur ba de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang spro ba skye bar 'gyur la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pas kyang 
[\[66a.3\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin spro ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[66a.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad 
[\[66a.5\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 
[\[66a.6\]]yon tan gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag 'jigs pa 'am skrag par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan 
[\[66a.7\]]nas brjod na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi 'jigs pa dang /_skrag pa dag med par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te phyogs la la zhig tu 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba bab par gyur na de 'bab pa na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan nas brjod cing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bden pa dang /_
[\[66b.2\]]bden pa'i tshig gang gis klu brgya phrag mang po dang /_klu stong phrag mang po dang /_klu brgya stong phrag mang po dang /_klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag thar bar mdzad cing thar bar mdzad nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngos te/_
[\[66b.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang /_gzhan dag tu klu khro bo dag gis 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba 'bebs par byed pas/_de na sems can gang 
[\[66b.4\]]dag 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa de dag bdag gi mtshan nas brjod par 'gyur zhing der bdag gi mthus 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba de dag nye bar zhi bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngos pa'i bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag la 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba 
[\[66b.5\]]'bab pa 'di dag nye bar zhi bar gyur cig ces brjod pa tsam gyis na klu rnams kyi 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba de dag nye bar zhi bar 'gyur te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi 
[\[66b.6\]]bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag 'jigs pa 'am/_skrag pa 'am/_yams kyi nad dam/_gnod pa byung bar gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de rjes su dran par bya zhing /_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[66b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig gang gis dam bcas pa dang /_tshig brjod pa gang yin pa'i dam bcas pa dang /_tshig brjod pa de dag thams cad 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par gyur cing dam bcas pa dang /_tshig brjod pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des 'jigs pa dang /_skrag pa dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa 'di dag nub par gyur cig ces brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs 
[\[67a.2\]]pa de dag dang /_skrag pa de dag dang /_yams kyi nad de dag dang /_gnod pa de dag nub par 'gyur te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[67a.3\]]ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gcig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyi/_gnyis ni ma lags pas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta 
[\[67a.4\]]lags pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas bla na med 
[\[67a.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad 
[\[67a.6\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[67a.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/sha 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba de ltar gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /_
[\[67b.2\]]de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyung ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na sangs rgyas 
[\[67b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas pa nyid kyang mtshungs/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtshungs/_kha dog kyang mtshungs/_rtags kyang mtshungs/_rigs kyang mtshungs/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par yang mtshungs/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 
[\[67b.4\]]'dus pa yang mtshungs/_de dag gi rnam par grol ba yang mtshungs mod kyi/_gzhan du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa tha dad par 'gyur ba dang /_seng ge'i khri tha dad pa dang /_pad ma'i dkyil 'khor tha dad par 'gyur ba 
[\[67b.5\]]'ba' shig tu zad do/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams shar phyogs su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_phyag 
[\[67b.6\]]'tshal nas 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 
[\[67b.7\]]'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dir bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis lha'i me tog man dA ra 
[\[68a.2\]]ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_lha'i spos dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/mngon par gtor ma 
[\[68a.3\]]thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog de dag dang /_spos de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la me tog gi gdugs chen po gnas par gyur to/_/gzhan yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[68a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su me tog dag gis gtor 
[\[68a.5\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po de dag dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha 'di dag dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha 'di dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[68a.6\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de mthong bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi 
[\[68a.7\]]sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po de dag kyang steng gi nam mkha' la mngon 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]par 'phags nas bar snang la 'khod par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha de dag kyang steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas bar snang la 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/_'di lta 
[\[68b.2\]]bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de/_/de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas/_'khor bzhi po de dag dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis bcom 
[\[68b.3\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa de dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mthong bar 
[\[68b.4\]]gyur to/_/mthong nas kyang de dag thams cad pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga steng gi bar snang la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 
[\[68b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/_/de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[68b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mi rnams mthong ba dang /_'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar lha'i kha dog dang /_mtshan ma dang /_dbyibs dang ldan pa 'di dag ci sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom 
[\[68b.7\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa'i lha rnams yin nam/_'on te 'di dag ma yin snyam mo/_/
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_'di dag ni lha yin te/_dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir mi'i cha lugs dang rtags 'dzin cing /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[69a.2\]]rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i spyan snga na 'dug go_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis sngon chad mi rnams la 'di lta bu'i mdzes pa dang /_dpal dang /_skal ba bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dag lan 'ga' yang ma mthong ma thos pa'i phyir ro snyam mo/_/de nas 
[\[69a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag slar bsdus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag the tshom dang bcas/_yid gnyis dang bcas par thugs su 
[\[69a.4\]]chud nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa'i mi de dag ni lha'i nye bar spyod pa dang /_
[\[69a.5\]]yongs su spyod pa dag dang ldan pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_mi gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyang mthong la lha'i longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa dang ldan pa'i mi de dag ni lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ste/_'dod 
[\[69a.6\]]par bya ba yin no/_/gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas shi 'phos nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 
[\[69a.7\]]'gyur ba'i mi de dag kyang 'dod par bya ba yin no snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]shAkya thub pa mthong zhing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yang mthong bas na/_kau shi ka gal te de tsam gyis kyang khyod kyi lus kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na kau shi ka gang khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 
[\[69b.2\]]skye bar 'gyur ba'i rnyed pa de lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_gang dag gi rna lam du yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 
[\[69b.3\]]'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no/_/
[\[69b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/kau shi ka srog chags gang dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar sems bskyed na/_de dag ni de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[69b.5\]]dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ji lta ba de ltar gzung bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga stong tsam ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong brgyad stong 
[\[69b.6\]]gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong ma lnga stong gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge bsnyen brgya stong gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[69b.7\]]der skye bar smon lam btab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge bsnyen ma khris kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo/_/'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]ste/_de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan to/_/gang dag de las 
[\[70a.2\]]gzhan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung ston par 'gyur te/_lung bstan nas kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur 
[\[70a.3\]]ro/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_g.yos rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_
[\[70a.4\]]'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg_/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/_'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/_chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu rab tu chem chem zhing 'jig rten du snang 
[\[70a.5\]]ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_
[\[70a.6\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[70a.7\]]le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ran dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]{D51}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las le'u bdun pa ste go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa/_bam po dang po/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya warma [(]byu+A[,]byU[)] ha nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba 
[\[70b.2\]]theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya ka lan da ka'i gnas 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[70b.3\]]dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing gus pas rim gro dang /_bkur sti byas par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[70b.4\]]dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur ba de 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas spyi bo btud de phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la the 
[\[70b.5\]]tshom cung zad cig mchis te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar 'tshal na thugs rjes gnang bar mdzad cing bdag la bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_dpa' chen skyes bu 
[\[70b.6\]]chen po ste/_/'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis/_/bdag ni sems can dag gi slad/_/the tshom cung zad zhu ba lags/_/seng ge'i gdan las ma bzhengs par/_/sku ni phyogs bcu kun tu khyab/_/tha dad smra ba thams cad kyis/_/gang yang bsgul bar mi 'gyur bar/_/mkhyen pa'i gter ni 
[\[70b.7\]]mtha' mi mnga'/_/stobs rnams kyang ni tshad ma mchis/_/bcom ldan stobs ni re res kyang /_/'jig rten ma lus sgrol bar mdzad/_/thams cad mkhyen la rab gnas shing /_/stobs bcu la ni gang gnas pa/_/mi 'jigs seng ge chen po ste/_/rgyal ba bla na med pa'i gtso/_/ma 'dres chos ni 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag_/de bzhin gshegs la mnga' bas na/_/'jig rten rnams ni gsal mdzad cing /_/mu stegs rnams ni pham par mdzad/_/chos rnams thams cad rab mkhyen pas/_/de slad mtha' med mchog ces bgyi/_/nyams pa mi mnga'i 'dren pa la/_/bdag ni the 
[\[71a.2\]]tshom zhu ba lags/_/dri med mkhyen pa mtha' med pa/_/mkhyen pa mi g.yo rgya mtsho bzhin/_/mkhyen pa yul la thogs mi mnga'/_/bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/_/bcom ldan legs par bsgoms pas na/_/lam la the tshom yong mi mnga'/_/bder gnas 'dren pa chen po la/_/bdag ni the tshom 
[\[71a.3\]]zhu ba lags/_/chu bo dag ni rab rgal cing /_/mtshams sbyor 'ching ba yongs bcad pa/_/gdug pa'i zug rngu 'byin pa la/_/bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/_/ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs bcom zhing /_/nyon mongs gdung ba nyer zhi ba/_/shin tu bsil la rab gnas la/_/bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/_/
[\[71a.4\]]'jigs med ye shes bla med dang /_/ye shes chags dang thogs med pa/_/chos kyi rgya mtsho'i mkhyen pa rnams/_/de bzhin gshegs pas mngon sum brnyes/_/sangs rgyas yon tan tshad med pas/_/mngon sum mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs/_/zag pa thams cad zad gyur cing /_/nyon mongs lta ba rab 
[\[71a.5\]]bcom pa/_/bcom ldan yon tan tshad med pa/_/mang po dag ni rab tu bsags/_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos rje la/_/bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/_/bcom ldan mchog gi mkhyen pa yis/_/'jig rten kun ni gsal bar mdzad/_/chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad pas/_/yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' 
[\[71a.6\]]mi mnga'/_/'dren pa'i chos kyi 'od zer gyis/_/'jig rten kun tu gsal bar mdzad/_/de slad 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi/_/chos kyi 'od zer snang ba lags/_/chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad mkhyen/_/spobs pa dag ni bla na med/_/brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab cing /_/rnam dag lta ba rab spangs pa/_/
[\[71a.7\]]sangs rgyas spyan ni mtha' med pas/_/mkhyen pa'i yul la mtha' mi mnga'/_/'jig rten mtshungs med gtso bo la/_/bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/_/chos rgyal thub pa chen po yis/_/sems can the tshom gcod par mdzad/_/'dren pa la ni bdag zhu na/_/mos pa ji bzhin bkas bshad 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]gsol/_/lha dang mi yi 'jig rten kun/_/thams cad bdag gis rab brtags na/_/de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs med pas/_/thams cad ma lus gsal bar mdzad/_/yon tan rnams la rab gnas shing /_/rgyan dang ldan pa'i skyes chen lags/_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal/_/drang 
[\[71b.2\]]srong nang na gsal ba po/_/dper na gangs ri chen po ni/_/rin chen kun gyis bkod pa'i gnas/_/bcom ldan chos gdan bzhugs pa yi/_/bkod pa dag kyang de bzhin no/_/rab yangs brtson 'grus chen po yis/_/yid 'ong sgra ni ston mdzad pas/_/sems can gang dag thos gyur na/_/dge 
[\[71b.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba rnam dag 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mi g.yo mchog lags pas/_/chos kyi snang ba ston par mdzad/_/des ni sems can thams cad kyi/_/yid bzhin blo ni bde bar 'gyur/_/dus dang 'khor ni rab mkhyen cing /_/gang zag mkhyen pa 'dren pa yis/_/chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad pas/_/
[\[71b.4\]]dus mkhyen pa yi blo ldan lags/_/tshangs skad brtson 'grus chen po yis/_/rnam dag gsung ni bkas bshad gsol/_/char chen sa la babs pa ltar/_/chos kyi rlan gyis khyab par mdzod/_/bcom ldan 'khor 'dus nang bzhugs te/_/kun tu chos kyi char phab nas/_/chos 'di 
[\[71b.5\]]la ni gang re ba/_/sems can rnams ni tshim par mdzod/_/mchog tu bde la rab gnas pas/_/rgyal po ri rab ji lta bzhin/_/sems can rnams la sbyin mdzad cing /_/mang po rnams ni dga' bar mdzod/_/dpa' chen rkang gnyis gtso dag ni/_/spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/
[\[71b.6\]]sems can dag ni thams cad kyis/_/gang yang 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu chen po tshad ma mchis/_/'khor 'dus 'thun par gyur ba dag_/thub pa che la brten nas ni/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul tshol ba lags/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas spyod yul la/_/gzhol ba'i slad du 'dir mchis 
[\[71b.7\]]na/_/'dren pa mkhyen pa thogs mi mnga'/_/ji ltar myur du dbye mi mdzad/_/bdag ni de yi mos pa bzhin/_/zhal du bltas nas zhu lags na/_/bcom ldan thugs rjes rab phye nas/_/the tshom rnams ni bcad du gsol/_/bla med chos ni thos gyur na/_/sems ni rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/lus 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]ni dga' bas khyab gyur nas/_/the tshom dra ba chad par 'gyur/_/chos kyi rgyal po bla med gtso/_/thams cad mkhyen pa 'jigs mi mnga'/_/thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa la/_/bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/_/sangs rgyas chos ni thams cad la/_/the tshom cung zad yong mi 
[\[72a.2\]]mnga'/_/rab brtson 'dren pa chen po la/_/bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/_/bla med the tshom chad pa po/_/chos la the tshom mi mnga' ba/_/yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med la/_/bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/_/snang ba chen po dpag med dang /_/yon tan chen po dpag med dang /_/rnam dag mkhyen 
[\[72a.3\]]pa dpag med la/_/bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/_/brtson 'grus mkhyen pa dpag med dang /_/spyod yul mkhyen pa dpag med dang /_/phan 'dogs mkhyen pa dpag med la/_/bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/_/bcom ldan mkhyen pa mtha' med kyang /_/mtha' dang mtha' med rab tu spangs/_/
[\[72a.4\]]the tshom thams cad gcod pa la/_/bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags/_/bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal/_/thugs rjes zhu ba gsan du gsol/_/gnang bar mdzad na bdag zhu na/_/thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/_/thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya'i gtso/_/grags chen la ni zhu ba lags/_/
[\[72a.5\]]gal te thugs rjes gnang gyur na/_/the tshom dra ba gcad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros mtha' yas deng khyod kyis nga'i zhal du bltas nas sems rtse gcig tu gsol ba 'debs pa 'dis de 
[\[72a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba du zhig zhu bar sems/_/gal te zhu ba yod na ngas bshad par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_/blo gros mtha' yas khyod kyis ni/_/nga la ci zhig 'dri bar sems/_/de bzhin 
[\[72a.7\]]du ni zhus shig dang /_/ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya/_/khyod kyis ji skad dris pa bzhin/_/re re nas ni gsal phye nas/_/ji ltar mos dang 'dun pa bzhin du/_/myur du phye ste rab bshad do/_/ngas ni khyod la rab bshad kyis/_/thams cad the tshom med par byos/_/ji ltar khyod kyi 'dod pa bzhin/_/
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]khyod kyis zhus dang 'tsham par bshad/_/deng khyod dus bzhin zhu bar gyis/_/dus dang don ni ji lta bzhin/_/dus bzhin du ni zhus pa'i phyir/_/ngas ni nges par rab bshad do/_/ji ltar khyod kyi mos pa bzhin/_/zhu ba dag ni zhus shig dang /_/ngas ni thams cad rjes 'thun par/_/khyod la rab 
[\[72b.2\]]tu bshad par bya/_/deng khyod dus su zhus shig dang /_/ngas kyang dus bzhin bshad par bya/_/the tshom dra ba bcad pas na/_/the tshom med pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/nga ni chos kyi rjer gyur pas/_/don ni mthar phyin thugs su chud/_/chos rnams thams cad dag la yang /_/the tshom med pa 
[\[72b.3\]]brnyes pa yin/_/nga ni chos rnams thams cad las/_/mngon sangs rgyas pas bsam dka' yin/_/sems can mos pa ji bzhin du/_/zhus pa dag ni stong par mdzad/_/nga ni chos rnams thams cad la/_/thogs pa dag ni mi mnga' bas/_/dus bzhin du ni zhus pa la/_/myur du 
[\[72b.4\]]bshad pa mdzad pa yin/_/ngas ni dus bzhin rab bshad cing /_/the tshom dag ni mi mnga' bas/_/de yi mos pa ji lta bar/_/de yi the tshom gcod par mdzad/_/nga ni rtag tu dus rnams dang /_/'khor 'dus pa yi bsam pa dang /_/sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/_/bsam pa tha dad 
[\[72b.5\]]mkhyen pa yin/_/rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi/_/'dod pa dang ni 'dod med pa/_/so sor rab tu brtags nas ni/_/de dag gsal bar gzigs pa yin/_/gal te blo dang ldan pa rnams/_/legs pa nyid du sgrub byed na/_/nga yi dus dang sbyar nas ni/_/yang dag chos ston go bar mdzad/_/
[\[72b.6\]]blo dang mi ldan de dag ni/_/gti mug dag gis rmongs dkrugs shing /_/de dag shes rab snang med pas/_/yang dag chos la gus mi 'gyur/_/gal te gus pa med gyur na/_/yang dag chos ni tshol mi byed/_/chos 'di thos par gyur kyang ni/_/snang ba chen po'i shes mi skye/_/gang zhig 
[\[72b.7\]]chos la mkhas gyur pa/_/chos la mos shing tshol bar byed/_/gal te chos 'di thos gyur na/_/rab snang ye shes thob par 'gyur/_/theg chen dag la mos pa ni/_/mi yi gtso bo tshol byed pas/_/rab snang ye shes thob par 'gyur/_/bsam gyis mi khyab gnyer ba dag_/bsam gyis mi 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]khyab ye shes la/_/gzhol ba gang yin de dag ni/_/thos pas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/dpag med ye shes la mos dang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab gnyer ba dag_/des ni chos 'di thos gyur na/_/bla med ye shes thob par 'gyur/_/sems can dag ni la la 
[\[73a.2\]]zhig_/byang chub snying po tshol ba dang /_/bla med 'khor lo bskor 'dod pas/_/chos 'di thos nas dga' bar 'gyur/_/mos shing rab tu brtson pa dang /_/chos la gtso bor gang 'dzin pa/_/dri med chos ni thos gyur na/_/mos shing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/gal te sems can la la dag_/
[\[73a.3\]]legs par bsgrub par mos gyur pa/_/chos kyi 'od zer snang ba yi/_/bla med chos 'di bstan par bya/_/khur lci rnams ni khyer ba dang /_/nan tan bsgrub pa la mos pa/_/des ni chos 'di thos gyur na/_/dga' bas kun tu khyab par 'gyur/_/gang zhig rab tu mos pa yis/_/dge ba'i chos ni 
[\[73a.4\]]sems byed na/_/de la snying brtse bsam bzhag nas/_/rab tu phye nas bstan par bya/_/khyod la sogs la thugs brtse'i phyir/_/khyod kyis ji skad zhus pa bzhin/_/ngas kyang yang dag nges par ni/_/khyod kyi the tshom gcad par bya/_/ngas ni lo mang stong phrag tu/_/thabs mkhas dag ni rab 
[\[73a.5\]]bsgoms shing /_/the tshom dag ni bsal bas na/_/khyod kyi mos pa rab tu mkhyen/_/gal te the tshom yod gyur na/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis/_/khyod la rab tu bstan pas na/_/the tshom rnams ni gcad par bya/_/gal te the tshom yod gyur na/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis/_/
[\[73a.6\]]ji ltar mos pa bzhin du ni/_/ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya/_/gal te the tshom yod gyur na/_/ji ltar 'dod bzhin zhu bar gyis/_/nga ni chos la rab gnas pas/_/g.yo ba med pa brnyes pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' 
[\[73a.7\]]yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la the tshom cung zad cig mchis pa deng zhu ba lags na/_ji ltar na skyes bu dam pa 'jigs pa spangs nas yang dag par 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]sems rtse gcig tu sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha chen po bgos nas go cha chen pos rab tu brgyan pa dang /_mos pa chen po bskyed nas gus par bgyid pa dang /_bag yod pa dang bcas pas theg pa chen po 'di la 'tshal nas shin tu rnam par dag pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi shul mtho 
[\[73b.2\]]dman dang /_gyo mo dang /_gseg ma dang /_tsher ma dang /_mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lta ba'i thibs po rnams ma mchis pa/_zug rngu gdug pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_nyon mongs pa'i g.yang sa ma mchis pa/_'chi ba dang /_'jigs shing skrag pa dang /_bar chad ma mchis pa/_drang zhing 
[\[73b.3\]]gya gyu ma mchis pa dang /_de kho na nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi shul dang /_thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shul du zhugs nas lta ba'i thibs po rnams bcad pa dang /_dra ba thams cad dral ba dang /_mun nag rnams bsal ba dang /_srid pa'i mngon par zhen pa rnams spang ba dang /_'du 'phro ba rnams 
[\[73b.4\]]spang ba'i slad du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag don 'di'i slad du zhu ba gsol ba lags so/_/skyes bu dam pa ji lta bus go cha chen po ji lta bu 
[\[73b.5\]]bgos na go cha chen po bgos pa des theg pa chen po la 'tshal nas lam chen po 'dis gzhol zhing yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha'i bkod pa gang lags pa dang /_lam gang la gnas pa 
[\[73b.6\]]dang /_chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa la gnas pa gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/_chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa la rab tu gnas pas ni chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i snang ba skyed par 'gyur la/_chos kyi snang ba'i dbang gis ni go cha mi spong bar theg pa chen po la 'tshal 
[\[73b.7\]]nas nur ba ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_brjed ngas pa ma mchis pa'i dbang po dang /_rgyun chags pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi stobs kyis myur du chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la gsal bar mkhas pa mngon par bsgrubs nas/_byang chub kyi snying por bgrod pa dang /_
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams la yang dag par chos ston pa'i slad du sems can thams cad ji ltar mos pa dang /_ji ltar gzhol ba bzhin du ma grol ba las rnam par grol bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'dis sems 
[\[74a.2\]]can rnams la sman pa dang /_bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag don 'di zhu lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa lags na chos gang gis byang 
[\[74a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[74a.4\]]par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa dang /_gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs shing sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyi sman 
[\[74a.5\]]rab tu mkhyen pa lags pas de'i slad du bdag zhu ba gsol lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi slad/_/sangs rgyas chos don zab mo dag_/thams cad 
[\[74a.6\]]mkhyen cing gzigs pa po/_/rkang gnyis gtso la bdag zhu lags/_/theg pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/_/ting 'dzin gang gis gzhol gyur pa/_/sems can rnams la sman slad du/_/de dag zhu ba gsol ba lags/_/ji ltar skyes bu dam pa yis/_/go cha dpag med bgo 
[\[74a.7\]]bar 'gyur/_/de ltar go cha bgos nas kyang /_/ji ltar rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'dun pa slong bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar de la sred par 'gyur/_/ji ltar brtson 'grus chen por 'gyur/_/ji ltar bag yod ldan par 'gyur/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]theg chen 'di la gzhol bar bgyi/_/de la 'tshal nas ci bgyid pa/_/dngos po 'di yang bkas bshad gsol/_/ji ltar theg chen bteg nas ni/_/byang chub sems la gzhol gyur pa/_/'jig rten 'dren pa'i thugs rje yis/_/myur du bdag la bkas bshad gsol/_/
[\[74b.2\]]ji ltar yang dag mnyam lam gyis/_/mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bar 'gyur/_/lta ba rnams kyi thibs po dag_/gcod par bgyid la skyon med 'gyur/_/spyod yul dag ni thams cad las/_/ji ltar bgyis na 'da' bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar mnyam pa nyid dag gis/_/'dod 
[\[74b.3\]]chags dra ba dral bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar mun nag rab bsal nas/_/ye shes snang chen thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/_/ji ltar bgyis na gzhol bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar so sor rab brtags pas/_/'ching ba mang po spong bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 
[\[74b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/'ching ba spangs nas bde bar gnas/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/'jigs pa che las 'da' bar 'gyur/_/chos kyi don la mkhas gyur nas/_/bla med la ni gzhol bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu'i/_/
[\[74b.5\]]dpag med go cha bgo bar bgyid/_/go cha de dag bgos nas kyang /_/theg chen la ni 'tshal bar bgyid/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/mnyam nyid lam la gzhol bar bgyid/_/bdag gis deng 'dir zhus pa 'di/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas 
[\[74b.6\]]bshad gsol/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur/_/go cha bkod pa thob 'gyur dang /_/bla med theg pa rab brgyan pa/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/_/lam 'di la ni gnas pa dang /_/lam de'i bkod pa gang lags dang /_/chos rnams la ni mkhas 
[\[74b.7\]]gyur pa/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rnams dang /_/chos la mkhas pa'i snang ba dag_/ji lta bur ni rtog gyur pa/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/chos kyi snang ba de thos 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]nas/_/chos rnams thams cad mthar phyin pa/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/chos kyi snang ba thob gyur nas/_/go cha chen po mi spong zhing /_/de yi dbang gis gzhol 'gyur lags/_/ji ltar byang chub 
[\[75a.2\]]sems dpa' rnams/_/theg chen 'di la 'tshal nas ni/_/brtson 'grus ldog par mi 'gyur zhing /_/de yi dbang gis gzhol 'gyur lags/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/bsam pa dag ni rab brtan zhing /_/'di ltar shes rab stobs dag gis/_/shin tu 
[\[75a.3\]]'dul ba thob 'gyur lags/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi/_/tshul la mkhas pas thob par 'gyur/_/chos kyi rgyal po bsam mi khyab/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol/_/ji ltar myur ba kho nar ni/_/byang chub snying por bgrod gyur nas/_/su yang skor bar mi 'gyur 
[\[75a.4\]]ba/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo skor 'gyur lags/_/ji ltar g.yo ba ma mchis par/_/sngon gyi smon lam ji lta bzhin/_/sems can thams cad kun la ni/_/chos rnams yang dag ston 'gyur lags/_/chos rnams yang dag bstan pas na/_/'khor ba las ni grol 'gyur lags/_/ji ltar bgyis na sems can 
[\[75a.5\]]rnams/_/gtan du bde ba 'thob 'gyur lags/_/sems can rnams la sman slad du/_/'jig rten 'dren la bdag zhu na/_/thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa po'i/_/thugs rjes bdag la bkas bshad gsol/_/chos ni gang dang gang dag gis/_/byang chub sems dpa' smin bgyid pa/_/
[\[75a.6\]]chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyis/_/ting 'dzin phyag rgya mdzad du gsol/_/sangs rgyas chos la rab mos shing /_/byang chub che la gang lta ba/_/chos kyi sgra 'di thos gyur na/_/lus kun khyab par dga' bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[75a.7\]]blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros mtha' yas khyod kyis sngon sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing yon tan gzhal du med pa bsags pas na chos zab mo 'di la rab tu gdung bas mos par gyur pa dang /_bsam pa rgya chen pos 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so/_/khyod legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_ji ltar bla 
[\[75b.2\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ba yang dag par bshad par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[75b.3\]]stsal to/_/blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa des sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/sems can rnams sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha 
[\[75b.4\]]chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/sems can rnams tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/sems can rnams bzod pa rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/sems can rnams brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po 
[\[75b.5\]]bgo bar bya'o/_/sems can rnams bsam gtan rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/sems can rnams shes rab rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/sems can rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/
[\[75b.6\]]sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i dngos po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nad kyi gnyen por bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/yon tan chen po mngon par bsgrub 
[\[75b.7\]]pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes legs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/sems can rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i ye 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]shes legs par yongs su rdzogs par rab tu bstan par 'dod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud dang /_bdud kyi 'khor dang /_bdud kyi pho nya dang /_bdud kyi las la gnas pa dang /_lta ba rnams kyi thibs po 
[\[76a.2\]]dang /_lam ya nga bar zhugs pa'i mu stegs can gyi bstan pa las rab tu byung ba thams cad dang /_'jig rten rgyang pan dang /_mu stegs can dang 'thun pa ji snyed pa dag dang 'thab pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar go cha chen 
[\[76a.3\]]po bgo zhing /_go cha mi spong bar brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas sems can gyi khams thams cad du zhugs te/_bzod pa la gnas nas 'jigs pa rnams spangs te/_mi skrag mi dngang /_mi g.yo mi 'khrug par byas nas go cha dpag tu med pa dag bgo bar bya'o/_/de 'di lta ste/_
[\[76a.4\]]sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i go cha dang /_lta ba'i thibs po thams cad gcod pa'i go cha dang /_bdud kyi dpung rnams rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i go cha dang /_shes rab yang dag par len pa'i go cha dang /_tshogs dpag tu med pa sogs pa'i go cha dang /_khur lci ba rnams sgrol ba'i 
[\[76a.5\]]go cha dang /_mngon par yid ches pa 'phel bar byed pa'i go cha dang /_tshul khrims la gnas pa'i go cha dang /_las kyi kun gzhi yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha dang /_thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i stobs kyi gter gyi go cha dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i gter gyi go cha dang /_mngon par zhen pa thams 
[\[76a.6\]]cad yongs su spong ba'i go cha dang /_ldog pa dang /_'gyed pa med pa'i shes rab kyi go cha gang yin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha chen po de lta bu bgos nas 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa de'i bar du shin tu brtan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs g.yo ba med pa mi spong bar 
[\[76a.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams/_/bsdu phyir go cha bgo bar bya/_/sems can rnams ni tshad med phyir/_/go cha bgos pa tshad med do/_/sbyin 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_/thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed/_/sems can la ni phan gdags phyir/_/go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/_/tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_/go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/_/'jig rten la ni phan 'dogs byed/_/sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/_/go cha 
[\[76b.2\]]'di ni bgo bar bya/_/bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_/dar zhing bde bar gnas par byed/_/sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/_/go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/_/brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_/phyir mi ldog par 'grub par byed/_/sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/_/
[\[76b.3\]]go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/_/bsam gtan rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_/spyod yul dag kyang de bzhin no/_/sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/_/go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/_/shes rab rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_/zag med bla na med pa yin/_/sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/_/
[\[76b.4\]]go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/_/sems can dag ni thams cad la/_/bde ba'i yo byad sbyin dgos pas/_/don de legs par shes pa'i phyir/_/go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams/_/phan pa'i dngos po bya dgos pas/_/bsdu ba rnam dag bzhi po yis/_/srid pa kun 
[\[76b.5\]]tu 'jug par byed/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nad/_/gnyen po dag ni bsten pa'i phyir/_/sems can la ni sman gtong bas/_/nad rnams rab tu sel bar byed/_/des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/go cha legs par bgos nas ni/_/yon tan rnams kyi tshogs dag na/_/mkhas 
[\[76b.6\]]ba dpag med thob pa yin/_/sems can 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi/_/nyams thag shin tu mi bde bas/_/bdag gis yongs su bskyab snyam nas/_/go cha dpag med bgo bar bya/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad med rnams/_/bdag gis rnam par dgrol snyam nas/_/srid lta'i dra bas klags 
[\[76b.7\]]pa dag_/thams cad yongs su gcad par bya/_/gang gis nyon mongs dra ba 'di/_/thams cad gcod par gang nus pa/_/brtan pa'i brtson 'grus stobs dag gis/_/dpa' bo'i go cha bgo ba yin/_/sems can dag ni thams cad kun/_/bde ba'i lam la rab bkod cing /_/mya ngan 'das 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]la gzhol ba dang /_/bla med bde la dgod par bya/_/gang zhig brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs/_/go cha 'di ni bgo bar byed pa/_/bdud rnams thams cad dag dang ni/_/rtag tu 'thab kyang ngal mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig lta la rab gnas nas/_/thibs po dag tu gang zhugs dang /_/
[\[77a.2\]]'jig rten rgyang pan ba dag la/_/go cha bgos nas phan gdags bya/_/gzhan yang 'khor ni tshad med pa/_/lam gol dag tu zhugs pa rnams/_/de dag la ni phan gdags phyir/_/go cha dpag med bgo bar bya/_/de ltar go cha bgos nas ni/_/go cha chen po mi spong bar/_/brtson 'grus chen 
[\[77a.3\]]po'i stobs bskyed na/_/go bgos rab brtags khyad par 'phags/_/sems can khams la rab zhugs te/_/bzod pa la ni gnas gyur nas/_/brtan pa'i bzod pa sgrub byed pa/_/go bgos gong na med pa yin/_/'jigs pa dag ni rab spangs shing /_/skrag pa dag ni med par yang /_/
[\[77a.4\]]go cha dpag med bgos nas ni/_/thams cad rab brtson 'grus par bya/_/gang zhig go cha rab gnas pa/_/rtag tu yang dag rtogs gyur cing /_/rab dben g.yo ba med pas na/_/mi 'khrugs ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta'i go cha rab bgos nas/_/blo dang ldan pas gzhan yang ni/_/
[\[77a.5\]]sems can skyob pa'i go bgos te/_/bdud kyi go cha gzhom par bya/_/yon tan dpag med go cha dag_/thams cad rab tu bgo bar bya/_/dbang po shes mchog gang zag gis/_/bgos nas bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/khur lci rab tu spang ba'i phyir/_/bla med go cha bgos nas su/_/sems 
[\[77a.6\]]can thams cad yongs bzlas nas/_/sdug bsngal khur las thar bar bya/_/rnam dag dad pa 'phel byed cing /_/dbang po drug ni rab sdom pa/_/tshul khrims gang dag ldan pa ni/_/go bgos gong na med pa yin/_/dpa' bo ye shes bsgrub pa la/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab 
[\[77a.7\]]gnas pas/_/spyod la tshul khrims ldan pas na/_/go bgos g.yo ba med pa yin/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba mang po las/_/rnam dag las ni bsgrubs pas na/_/de phyir go cha rab bgos nas/_/rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa yin/_/sems can la ni sred pa'i blos/_/'jig rten la ni phan 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]'dogs pas/_/thabs ni rab tu rtogs pas na/_/go bgos legs par gnas pa yin/_/thabs mkhas ye shes gang yin pa/_/byang chub sems dpas rab rtogs pas/_/de ltar go cha bgos nas ni/_/'ching ba mtha' dag gcod par byed/_/mngon zhen thams cad rab spong zhing /_/
[\[77b.2\]]yid ches rgyab kyis mi phyogs pa/_/go bgos blo dang ldan pa ni/_/bla med byang chub bgrod par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' nges par ni/_/bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs gang /_/brtson 'grus stobs la rab gnas pa/_/brtan zhing phyir ldog mi 'gyur ro//_//bam po gnyis pa/_
[\[77b.3\]]gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bskal pa tshad med pa nas khur chen po khyer zhing go cha chen po bgos pa'i go cha de lta bu de ni bdud dam/_/bdud kyi 'khor ram/_bdud kyi pho nya 'am/_log par lta ba'i thibs po dgon dung ma rungs par zhugs pa'i 
[\[77b.4\]]sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs med cing bstan du med pa dang /_ltos pa med cing mtshan ma med pa dang /_mtshan ma spangs pas mtshan ma dang bral ba dang /_ming dang yi ge med pa'i phyir ro/_/blo gros mtha' yas gal te la la zhig mda'i 
[\[77b.5\]]tshad ri rab tsam sha stag 'phangs na yang phog par mi 'gyur la/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa thams cad bdud kyi rgyal por gyur la/_re re la yang bdud kyi dmag rnam pa sna tshogs 'khor dang bcas par gyur pa de dag dus gcig tu mda' rnon 
[\[77b.6\]]po tshad ri rab tsam sha stag 'phangs na yang nam yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i go cha bgos pa la rnam par gzhigs pa 'am/_tha na spu nyag ma gcig tsam yang nyams par byed par mi nus te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sems kyis 
[\[77b.7\]]kyang tha dad pa'i 'du shes skyed par mi nus na lus kyis gnod pa bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems rtse gcig tu de dag 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni bdud mang po pham par byed cing nye bar zhi bar yang byed la/_go cha de lta bu la gnas 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]shing g.yo ba med pas sems can thams cad kyis kyang rnam par 'jig par byed mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mtshan ma med pa'i phyir dang /_sems can rnams kyis blta bar bya ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing shes par 
[\[78a.2\]]mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du go cha chen po bgos pa de dag shes shing mthong ngo /_/sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir chos thams cad la yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/
[\[78a.3\]]sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir chos thams cad la yang dmigs par mi byed de/_de lta bas na sems can rnams kyis mthong zhing shes par mi nus so/_/go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag la ni kha dog gi mtshan ma med cing bstan du med pa dang /_tshig gi brjod pa med pa'i 
[\[78a.4\]]phyir gzugs dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur la/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur ro/_/nang dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_phyi rol dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_nang 
[\[78a.5\]]dang phyi rol gnyis ka dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_nang yang ma yin phyi rol yang ma yin pa dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_khams dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_skye mched dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_sa'i khams dang yang mtshungs 
[\[78a.6\]]par ldan par mi 'gyur/_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_'dod pa'i khams dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dang yang mtshungs par 
[\[78a.7\]]ldan par mi 'gyur/_mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]mi 'gyur/_mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa yang ma yin pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi sa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_
[\[78b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_tshig gi lam dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_gzugs kyi rgyu dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[78b.3\]]byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rgyu dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur/_mtshan nyid dang /_mtshan nyid ma yin pa dang yang mtshungs bar ldan par mi 'gyur/_chos 
[\[78b.4\]]thams cad dang mtshungs bar ldan par yang mi 'gyur/_mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin te/_'ching ba med pa/_grol ba med pa bgrang ba dang /_dpe dag gis shes par bya ba ma yin pa ste/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta bu'i go 
[\[78b.5\]]cha dang ldan pa de dag ni chos thams cad du lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs te/_gzugs su lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes par lta bar yang dag par mi dmigs so/_/tha na chos cung zad tsam du lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs 
[\[78b.6\]]so/_/de bzhin du go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag ni chos thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/_mtshungs par mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/gzugs dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/_mtshungs par mi ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_
[\[78b.7\]]rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/_mtshungs par mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/_chos thams cad kyi mtshungs par ldan pa dang /_mtshungs par mi ldan pa de dag thag bsrings pa yin no/_/de bzhin du go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag la ni mngon par 'du bya ba med de/_byed pa med 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/mtshan ma yang med de/_mtshan ma nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gnas kyi mtshan ma med pa/_'dus pa'i mtshan ma med pa/_rnam par rtog pa med pa/_g.yo ba med pa/_dmigs pa med pa/_ngo bo nyid du blta ba med pa ste/_go cha bgos ba nyid kyang 
[\[79a.2\]]dmigs su med pa'o/_/de bzhin du go cha bgos pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha yang dag par bgos pa na gang gis go cha bgos pa dang /_gang du go cha bgos pa dang /_gang las go cha bgos pa 
[\[79a.3\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /_bdag gis go cha bgos pa dang /_bdag gis go cha bgos par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /_'dir go cha bgos pa dang /_gzhan du go cha bgos pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /_go cha de lta bu bgos pa'i sems can 
[\[79a.4\]]yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir dang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha bgos pa yin pas lus kyang mi dmigs/_ngag kyang 
[\[79a.5\]]mi dmigs/_yid kyang mi dmigs te dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa rab tu spangs pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gal te chos cung zad tsam la gnas par gyur tam/_gal te chos cung zad tsam la dmigs nas go cha bgos sam/_go cha bgo 
[\[79a.6\]]'am/_go cha bgo bar 'gyur ba de dag ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes mi bya ste/_gal te sems de dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur pa na gdod bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can 'ga' 
[\[79a.7\]]tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin/_bskal pa gcig gi sems can tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin/_bskal pa brgya stong dang bskal pa bye ba brgya stong dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sems can tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin gyi/_
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]bskal pa tshad med pa grangs med pa'i sems can gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa yin pas de'i phyir go cha chen po tshad med pa bgos pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni go cha yang dag par bgos pa na sems can gyi 'du shes la mi gnas pa'i go cha gyon 
[\[79b.2\]]par byed do/_/sems can gyi 'du shes mi skyed pa'i go cha dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes spong ba'i go cha dang /_bdag gi 'du shes zlog pa'i go cha dang /_sems can gyi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i go cha dang /_bdag gi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i go cha dang /_'du shes dang /_tshor ba las yang dag par 
[\[79b.3\]]'das pa'i go cha dang /_chos thams cad la byed pa'i 'du shes med par shes pa'i go cha dang /_mtshan ma'i go cha dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha dang /_smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha dang /_chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang /_'gag pa 
[\[79b.4\]]med pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang /_chos thams cad kyi bye brag gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang bye brag gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang /_chos thams cad kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang /_dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha gyon par byed do/_/
[\[79b.5\]]blo gros mtha' yas gal te dngos po med pa la gnas nas go cha gyon par byed la go cha chen po bgos pa zhes mi bya ste/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni dngos po la mi gnas par ye shes chen po yongs su tshol ba yin pas de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod pa 
[\[79b.6\]]yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_bskal pa stong phrag tshad med du/_go cha dpag med bgos nas ni/_/sems can dag ni thams cad kun/_/sdug bsngal rnams las grol bar byed/_/de lta'i go cha che bgos pa/_/bdud dam bdud kyi 
[\[79b.7\]]mngags pa dang /_/bdud kyi las rnams byed pa dag_/mig gis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de las gzhan pa'i sems can gang /_/lta ba'i thibs por zhugs pa dag_/bsam gyis mi khyab go cha 'di/_/des kyang thob par 'gyur ma yin/_/gzugs med cing ni kha dog med/_/bstan 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]du med cing ltos med pa/_/go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/de phyir mig gis blta bya min/_/ming med mtshan ma med pa dang /_/mtshan ma thams cad spangs pas na/_/go cha bgos pa dpag tu med/_/de phyir phan tshun mthong ba med/_/gal te mda' ni ri rab tshad/_/shin tu 
[\[80a.2\]]rnon po 'phangs na yang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/_/mda' ni rang nyid chag par 'gyur/_/'jig rten bdud ni ji snyed pas/_/ri rab tshad ni mda' rnams kyis/_/go cha chen po bgos pa la/_/dus gcig 'ongs te 'phangs na yang /_/go cha chen po bgos pa yi/_/spu nyag 
[\[80a.3\]]gcig ni nyams mi 'gyur/_/bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/_/gang yang pham byed gzhig mi nus/_/des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/lus dang sems ni 'gyur ba med/_/bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos la/_/su zhig bsgul zhing g.yo bar nus/_/sems bskyed thang cig tsam 
[\[80a.4\]]gyis kyang /_/bdud ni mang po pham byed pas/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsam mi khyab/_/bdud dpung dag ni 'jil bar byed/_/de lta'i go cha che bgos pa/_/nams kyang g.yo bar mi 'gyur bas/_/sems can dag ni thams cad kyis/_/mthong bar nus pa gang yang med/_/sems can 
[\[80a.5\]]dag ni thams cad kyis/_/go cha mtshan nyid mi shes pas/_/de phyir sems can thams cad kyis/_/mig gis mthong bar mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyabs byed cing /_/chos rnams thams cad shes pas ni/_/rdo rje mchog dang 'dra bas na/_/de ni legs par go bgos yin/_/
[\[80a.6\]]chos rnams thams cad mi len cing /_/sems can rnams ni skyob byed pas/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi rjes 'brang phyir/_/de ni legs par go bgos yin/_/go char 'dzin pa med pa ni/_/chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'brang ba/_/bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/_/de ni legs par 
[\[80a.7\]]go bgos yin/_/go cha bstan pa med par yang /_/chos ni thams cad gang sbyong ba/_/chos rnams tshig dang bral bas na/_/ston par nus pa gang yang med/_/gzugs dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing /_/tshor ba dang yang mtshungs mi ldan/_/'du shes 'du byed rnam shes dang /_/
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/_/nang du mtshungs par mi ldan zhing /_/phyi rol du yang mtshungs ldan min/_/nang dang phyi rol gnyi gar yang /_/mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/_/khams dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing /_/skye mched dang yang mtshungs ldan min/_/khams 
[\[80b.2\]]dang skye mched dag dang yang /_/'dus par gyur par yod ma yin/_/sa dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing /_/chu dang mtshungs par ldan pa min/_/me rlung nam mkha' rnam shes dang /_/mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/_/'dod dang mtshungs par mi ldan zhing /_/gzugs dang 
[\[80b.3\]]mtshungs par ldan pa'ang min/_/gzugs med pa yi khams rnams dang /_/mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/_/thams cad dmigs su med pas na/_/mngon par 'dus byas rnams dang ni/_/mngon par 'dus byas med pa dang /_/mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/_/bsam 
[\[80b.4\]]gyis mi khyab go bgos pas/_/gnas pa med cing 'dus pa med/_/'ching ba med cing grol ba med/_/mtshungs par mi ldan yod ma yin/_/go cha mtha' ni dpag med pas/_/nyan thos dag gi sa dag dang /_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang /_/mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/_/
[\[80b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi ni sa rnams dang /_/chos rnams thams cad kun dang ni/_/thams cad mtshungs par mi ldan zhing /_/thams cad 'dus par gyur ma yin/_/tshig gi lam ni sna tshogs kyis/_/gang yang reg par mi 'gyur bas/_/dpag tu med pa'i go cha 'di/_/ngo bo med cing bsam dka' 
[\[80b.6\]]yin/_/chos rnams thams cad bdag dang ni/_/mtshungs ldan mtshungs min ldan min pas/_/bsam gyis mi khyab go cha ni/_/bgrang ba kun las 'das pa yin/_/go cha bla na med pas na/_/'ching ba med cing grol ba med/_/gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang /_/'du byed rnam shes 
[\[80b.7\]]mtshan nyid med/_/de dag gi ni mtshan nyid dang /_/mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/_/chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid dang /_/mtshungs ldan mtshungs min ldan pa'ang min/_/mtshan ma med pa dag dang yang /_/mtshungs ldan 'dus pa yang ma yin/_/go cha bla na med pas ni/_/'ching ba 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]med cing grol ba med/_/chos rnams dag ni thams cad las/_/chos gcig grangs su'ang bgrang ba med/_/chos rnams thams cad dag las ni/_/go cha dmigs par mi 'gyur bas/_/de phyir bla na med 'gyur zhing /_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes brjod/_/go 
[\[81a.2\]]cha la ni gzugs med cing /_/tshor ba 'du shes yod ma yin/_/'du byed med cing rnam shes med/_/phung po rnams kyis bsdus pa'ang min/_/de lta'i dpa' bo gang dag gis/_/go cha chen po 'di bgos pas/_/lus dang sems ni mi dmigs pas/_/chos ni cung zad mthong mi 'gyur/_/
[\[81a.3\]]bsam pa rnams las 'das pa'i phyir/_/rnam dag sems la rab gnas shing /_/rtag tu zhum pa med pas na/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes brjod/_/shin tu brtan pas go bgos pa/_/de yi sems ni mi sgul zhing /_/bskal pa'i tshad ni mi 'dzin pas/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes 
[\[81a.4\]]brjod/_/go cha la ni tshad med cing /_/chos dang chos min mi len pas/_/dus kyi tshad ni med pa'i phyir/_/gzhal du med pa zhes bya'o/_/sems can 'du shes mi skyed cing /_/bdag gi 'du shes yod ma yin/_/'du shes 'di ni shes pa'i phyir/_/'du shes thams cad skye mi 'gyur/_/
[\[81a.5\]]chos rnams thams cad shes kyang ni/_/chos de'i 'du shes skye mi 'gyur/_/de ltar go cha gang bgos pas/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes brjod/_/gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas go cha chen po 'di ni chos gya nom pa'i bkod pa'i yo byad ces kyang bya/_/mchog tu gyur pa zhes kyang bya 
[\[81a.6\]]ste/_rnam par gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad dbyer med pa zhes bya ste/_chos cung zad tsam la yang bye brag tu 'byed pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang go cha 'di lta bu bgos pa de ni shes rab chen po'i stobs 'dzin cing 
[\[81a.7\]]theg pa chen po dang theg pa mchog dang mtshungs pa med pa'i theg pa dang /_yongs su sdud pa chen po'i theg pa dang dpag tu med pa sdud pa'i theg pa la zhon nas sems can thams cad theg pa 'dis 'degs par byed kyang theg pa 'di la mi shong ba gang yang med la/_theg pa de yang 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med par sems can rnams bde ba la dgod par byed cing sems can rnams bde bar nges par byung bar byed do/_/sems can gang nges par bde bar byed pa'i theg pa 'di la zhon pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lus dang sems ngal zhing nyon mongs par gyur pa yod par mi 'gyur 
[\[81b.2\]]ro/_/blo gros mtha' yas theg pa 'di ni lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_theg pa gzhan gyis nges par 'byung bar byed pa thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed do/_/theg pa 'di ni 'gro ba med pa 'ong ba med pa 
[\[81b.3\]]gnas pa med pa bltar med pa shes pa med pa sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs pa phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs pa dbus kyi mtha' mi dmigs pa/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur cing /_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rdul mi gos pa/_bltas pa med pa/_thogs pa med pa mngon par zhen pa med pa 
[\[81b.4\]]yin pas/_theg pa 'dis nges par 'byung bar bya'o/_/theg pa 'di ni tshad med pa yin te gzhal du med pa'i phyir ro/_/rang bzhin gyis thogs pa'i mtshan ma med pa yang yin te/_mtshan ma la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/theg pa mchog 'di la zhon pa gang yin pa de dag ni sems la zhum pa med 
[\[81b.5\]]par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par gzhol zhing 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros mtha' yas 'di lta ste/_dper na mar me dang nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni sems can rnams kyi snang ba chen por byed do/_/de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di yang 'od zer gyis stong gsum gyi 
[\[81b.6\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar byed cing gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon pa 'am bar chad byed mi nus pas yon tan chen po'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros mtha' yas theg pa 'di ni mun gnag spong bar byed cing 'jig 
[\[81b.7\]]rten gyi nad thams cad rab tu sel ba dang /_'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing sems can chen po yongs su sdud pa yin pas dman pa rnams kyis bzhon par bya ba ma yin te/_go cha chen po bgos pa ni ma gtogs so/_/ngas ji skad du 'di ni bskal pa tshad med pa 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]nas sems can rnams yongs su bskyabs pa/_sangs rgyas mang po la mchod cing rim gro byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/_tshogs yongs su dag pa rnams kyis bzhon par bya ba yin gyi/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang de las gzhan pa 'jig rten gyis 
[\[82a.2\]]bcings pa 'jig rten dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dang /_mu stegs can la mngon par yid ches par byed pa dman pa thams cad theg pa 'di'i ming thos par yang mi 'dod na theg pa 'di la bzhon par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/gal te sems can 
[\[82a.3\]]gang la la zhig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod yul la rnam par rtsen cing theg pa 'di la zhon par byed na smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/blo gros mtha' yas theg pa 'di ni mtha' med de/_sngon dang /_
