[\[204a.3\]]gnas pa med gyur cing /_/'dod pa'i yul gyis gos pa med pa dang /_/zas skom dag gis g.yo sgyu mi skyed pa/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig skye dgu rnams la 'di skad du/_/'dod chags spyad kyang nyes med gang zer ba/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams la skur 
[\[204a.4\]]ba yin/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig yid ches rtag tu rab brtan zhing /_/nan tan bskyed nas chos rnams tshol ba la/_/skyo ba med cing brnyas par mi byed pa/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chung ma bu mo mngon zhen cing /_/rtag tu 'dod 
[\[204a.5\]]pa'i yul ni rjes dran dang /_/shes rab mi sgom rgya cher phan mi 'dogs/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig ri dang nags khrod rab gnas shing /_/shes rab bsgoms nas shin tu dga' gyur dang /_/'tsho ba'i yo byad dag la 'dod med pa/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos 
[\[204a.6\]]par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig gi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'/_/rtag tu rmongs dang mi rtogs gang yin pa/_/de ni gti mug bdud kyis bcings pas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig gi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'/_/rtag tu rtogs shing rmongs pa med gyur pa/_/de ni 
[\[204a.7\]]bdud kyis bcings las grol bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig mtha' yod dang med pa la/_/rtag tu rmongs nas khong du ma chud pa/_/de ni gti mug bdud kyis bcings pas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig mtha' yod dang 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]med pa dag_/rtag tu rtogs shing rmongs pa med gyur pa/_/de ni bdud kyis bcings las grol bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mi gnas 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid la/_/rtag tu rmongs shing khong du mi chud pa/_/de ni gti mug bdud kyis bcings pas 
[\[204b.2\]]na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mi gnas 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid dag_/rtag tu khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/_/de ni bdud kyis bcings las grol bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/rna ba sna dang lce lus yid dag dang /_/gzugs 
[\[204b.3\]]sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams dang /_/sa chu me rlung ngo bo nyid dag dang /_/dngos po sems can sdug bsngal phung po dang /_/khams dang 'jig rten skye sgra mi bden dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal sred/_/'chab rgyags ser sna phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang /_/khro sogs par yang de 
[\[204b.4\]]bzhin rig par gyis/_/gang zhig mig zad mtha' ni de dag la/_/rtag tu rmongs shing khong du mi chud pa/_/de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zad mtha' ni de dag la/_/rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/_/de ni skye 
[\[204b.5\]]bo'i spyod dang bral bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig gi 'jig pa de dag la/_/rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa/_/de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig gi 'jig pa de dag la/_/rtag 
[\[204b.6\]]par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/_/de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig gi rab dben de dag la/_/rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa/_/de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig 
[\[204b.7\]]mig gi rab dben de dag la/_/rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/_/de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig gi 'gro 'ong med pa la/_/rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa/_/de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na/_/des ni 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig gi 'gro 'ong med pa dag_/rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med pa/_/de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs nas/_/mig zad ngo bo nyid la rtag 
[\[205a.2\]]rmongs pa/_/de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig la bdag med rab rtogs nas/_/mig zad ngo bo rtag tu rtogs gyur pa/_/de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig la bdag med 
[\[205a.3\]]ma rtogs nas/_/bzod pa'i gnas la rtag tu rmongs gyur pa/_/de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig la bdag med rab rtogs nas/_/bzod pa'i gnas ni rtag tu rtogs gyur pa/_/de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na/_/des 
[\[205a.4\]]ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/_/de ni mi gnas tshul khrims bsgrub mi nus/_/mi gnas tshul khrims mngon par mi sgrub pas/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/_/des ni mi gnas tshul 
[\[205a.5\]]khrims bsgrub par nus/_/mi gnas tshul khrims mngon par bsgrub pas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/_/des ni zag med tshul khrims bsgrub mi nus/_/zag med tshul khrims mngon par mi bsgrub pas/_/des ni mdo sde 'di 
[\[205a.6\]]la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/_/des ni zag med tshul khrims bsgrub par nus/_/zag med tshul khrims mngon par bsgrub pas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/_/des ni zag med shes rab 
[\[205a.7\]]bsgrub mi nus/_/zag med shes rab mngon par mi sgrub pas/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/_/des ni zag med shes rab bsgrub par nus/_/zag med shes rab mngon par bsgrub pas na/_/des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa/_/mig stong nyid la rtag tu rmongs par 'gyur/_/des ni kun 'dzin ye shes mi skyed pas/_/mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa/_/mig stong nyid ni rtag par rtogs par 'gyur/_/des ni kun 
[\[205b.2\]]'dzin ye shes rab bskyed pas/_/mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zad ngo bo nyid rtogs pa/_/des ni kun 'dzin ye shes bsgrub pa na/_/bla med ma chags ye shes rab bsgrubs pas/_/mdo sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di la ma 
[\[205b.3\]]mos pa/_/mig zad ngo bo nyid la rtag tu rmongs/_/des ni ting 'dzin rnams las nyams pas na/_/bla med ye shes thob par shin tu dka'/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di la rab mos shing /_/mig zad ngo bo nyid ni mngon rtogs pa/_/des ni ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pas na/_/bla med 
[\[205b.4\]]ye shes mngon byed dka' ba med/_/gang zhig mig zad ngo bo nyid rtogs shing /_/bdag med pa yi mtshan nyid rab shes pa/_/des ni rtag tu chos 'di thos pas na/_/mngon par yid ches the tsom med pa 'thob/_/gang zhig mig zad ngo bo nyid sems shing /_/nyin mtshan rab brtson le lo 
[\[205b.5\]]med gyur pa/_/des ni kun 'dzin spobs pa mngon bsgrubs nas/_/mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu ston par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed pa/_/'od zer 'byin pa'i ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rab ston cing /_/mig stong nyid ni rab tu rtogs par 
[\[205b.6\]]'gyur/_/gang zhig mchod rten brgya stong rab byas shing /_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa byas pa bas/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed na/_/'di yi yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags/_/gang gis rol mo brgya stong rab byas nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 
[\[205b.7\]]mchod pa byas/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur na/_/'di yi yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags/_/sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sems can rnams/_/bskal pa dag ni bye ba tshad med par/_/de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs par mchod pa bas/_/mdo sde 'di bzung 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]bsod nams khyad par 'phags/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di la tshig bzhi pa'i/_/tshigs bcad gcig tsam 'dzin cing ston byed na/_/de la rgyal ba thugs rje chen po yi/_/gtso ltar gus pa rab tu bskyed par bya/_/nga ni 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya stong du/_/
[\[206a.2\]]srid pa gsum du 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/sangs rgyas dag ni tshad med pa rnams la/_/mdo sde 'di yi phyir ni rim gro byas/_/res 'ga' mar me brgya stong tshad med pa/_/snying po re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad tsam/_/sbar nas mdo sde 'di la rang dbang dag_/'thob par bya phyir 
[\[206a.3\]]'dren pa rnams la mchod/_/res 'ga' me tog tsam pa ka dang ni/_/su ma na dang mya ngan med pa yi/_/phreng ba rgyal mtshan gdugs ni sna tshogs kyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod pa byas/_/nga sngon 'khor ba'i 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/slong du 'ongs pa 
[\[206a.4\]]dag la sbyin btang ste/_/res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag kyang btang /_/res 'ga' zam pa khron pa chu mig btang /_/res 'ga' glang po che dang bzhon pa btang /_/res 'ga' rin chen rta dang chung ma btang /_/res 'ga' gser gyi khri dang rin chen gur/_/res 'ga' se 
[\[206a.5\]]mo do dang phreng ba btang /_/de bzhin bskal pa brgya stong rdzogs par ni/_/mdo sde 'di phyir sems la ser sna med//_//bam po gnyis pa/_nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrungs/_/ting 'dzin shes rab rtag tu 
[\[206a.6\]]bsgoms/_/sems can rnams la sbyin pa btang /_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/gtum po dag gis brgyad bkag kyang /_/de tshe nga ni snying brtse bas/_/de la gnod pa yod ma byas/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/slong du 'ongs pa dag la ni/_/ji ltar mos bzhin rab 
[\[206a.7\]]btang bas/_/thams cad rab tu dga' bar byas/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/gzhal med khang chen rnams la ni/_/rin chen dra bas rab brgyan nas/_/sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su phul/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]yid bzhin nor bu rin po ches/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/drin yod rnams la rtag dran pas/_/tha na tshigs bcad gcig mnyan pa/_/de la yang ni bkur sti byas/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/tshul khrims ldan la rab bkur 
[\[206b.2\]]bas/_/tha na 'chag pa'i tshe na yang /_/de la rtag tu gus pa bskyed/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/'khor ba dag na 'khor ba'i tshe/_/drin ni cung zad yod pa la'ang /_/de la rtag tu drin du gzos/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/rnyed pa ma btsal chos ma skur/_/nye bshes 
[\[206b.3\]]sems can rnams la ni/_/snying brtse dag ni rab tu bskyed/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/mang thos legs bshad ldan pas na/_/chos la mngon par zhen byed cing /_/bshes pa'i khyim la ser sna med/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/mi dge'i sems ni skyes gyur na/_/myur 
[\[206b.4\]]ba nyid du rab bshags pas/_/'phel bar yang ni yod ma byas/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/rgyal po'i bur ni gyur ba na/_/rin po che dang byug spos dang /_/spos kyi phye ma ji snyed pa/_/dad pa'i sems ni ngas bskyed nas/_/sangs rgyas rnams la bsngos shing phul/_/nga sngon mdo 
[\[206b.5\]]sde 'di yi phyir/_/khri mon btson la snying brtse bas/_/sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang myong ba/_/lus kyi skyin par dang du blangs/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs nas/_/rtag tu dus drug dag gi tshe/_/sdom pa dag ni rab tu blangs/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/
[\[206b.6\]]rtag tu bzod pa rab bsgoms pas/_/tha na chung ma dag la yang /_/'dod pa'i ser sna yong ma bskyed/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/dbul phongs dag ni thams cad kun/_/bde ba dag ni thob bya'i phyir/_/nor dag gis ni phyug por byas/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/dge 
[\[206b.7\]]sbyong dang ni bram ze dang /_/skye dgu rnam pa sna tshogs kun/_/thams cad dag ni rab tu bsdus/_/nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/_/thams cad kun la phan gdags phyir/_/rtag tu sbyin bdag cher byas nas/_/slong ba dag la yongs su btang /_/res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag_/
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]gzhan dag gcod du mi gzhug par/_/sems can rnams la yongs btang zhing /_/yid bzhin du ni tshim par byas/_/nga sngon sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/_/sems ni rtag tu snyoms pas na/_/tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dang /_/tshul khrims 'chal dang ngo tsha 
[\[207a.2\]]med/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pa nas/_/so so'i skye bo'i bar dag la/_/ngo mtshar snyam pa'i sems bskyed nas/_/gus pas kun la sbyin pa btang /_/nga sngon sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/_/sems la mtho dma' med pas na/_/sdug bsngal 'gro ba mi tshol zhing /_/mdo sde 'di 
[\[207a.3\]]la rtse gcig mos/_/res 'ga' yul khams dag tu ni/_/phyir rgol thams cad med byas shing /_/klu rnams kun ni rab btul nas/_/dus bzhin char ni rab tu phab/_/zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis/_/ngas ni tshe rabs dpag med nas/_/mdo sde 'di ni gnyer ba'i 
[\[207a.4\]]phyir/_/dka' ba rnams ni rab tu spyad/_/bskal pa brgya stong snyed du ni/_/brjod kyang mthar thug mi 'gyur ro/_/yid ches pa la khyod gnas nas/_/ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/_/yang dag dran pa'i sems skyed la/_/mdo sde 'di ni bshad par gyis/_/ngas ni sangs rgyas 
[\[207a.5\]]spyan dag gis/_/ma 'ongs dus ni gsal gzigs pas/_/spyod pa sna tshogs ji lta ba/_/thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa yin/_/dge slong dag ni gang zhig gis/_/bla med ye shes btsal ba'i phyir/_/shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/_/mdo sde 'di ni gang ston pa/_/gang 
[\[207a.6\]]zag de dang phyogs rnams kyang /_/thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/_/ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/_/mdo 'di thos nas gang mos pa/_/bsam pa dang ni thabs rnams kyang /_/thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/_/dman pa dag ni gang zhig gis/_/mdo sde 'di 
[\[207a.7\]]ni ma thos pas/_/chos bstan pa la skur 'debs pa/_/thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/_/dge slong rnams ni gang zhig dang /_/dge slong ma ni gang zhig gis/_/mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas/_/shin tu gdung bas ngu byed pa/_/de kun ngas ni lung bstan nas/_/rgyal ba 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]gtso bo mthong bar 'gyur/_/zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/gang dag yid ni dag pa dang /_/gang dag gi ni ma dag dang /_/tha na mos pa gang yin pa/_/thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/_/sems can dag ni gang zhig 
[\[207b.2\]]gis/_/rab zhi dben la rtag mos shing /_/ting 'dzin rnams la rab gnas nas/_/'khor ba dag la ma chags pas/_/tha na bag chags rnams kyang ni/_/gtan nas rab tu gang spangs dang /_/de la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams/_/thams cad ma lus thugs su 
[\[207b.3\]]chud/_/sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/_/mi bden chos la zhen pa dang /_/sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/_/sangs rgyas la ni rab mos pa/_/ma 'ongs dngos po 'di lta bu/_/thams cad ma lus thugs su chud/_/sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/_/'jig rten 
[\[207b.4\]]bde la rab chags pas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sa bon dag_/legs pa nyid du mi skyed pa/_/rgyu dang rkyen ni de yi phyir/_/sbyor ba rnams ni nyams par 'gyur/_/su yang rung ba gang zhig gis/_/byang chub sa bon rtogs gyur na/_/gang zag de yis nges par ni/_/rnam dag 
[\[207b.5\]]'od zer dpag med thob/_/zla 'od khyod kyis 'di lta bur/_/'od zer 'di la sogs pa yi/_/rgyu dang rkyen ni re re kun/_/so so tha dad nyid du ltos/_/khyod kyis shes rab stobs kyis ni/_/thams cad de ltar rig par gyis/_/gang zhig mi dge grogs spangs te/_/dge 
[\[207b.6\]]ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten byas/_/tshul khrims rnam dag gang srung ba/_/sangs rgyas 'od zer sgrub par 'gyur/_/khyod kyis dbang po rab srungs la/_/ngo tsha khrel med rab tu spongs/_/dge ba'i chos ni rab bsgoms la/_/sems can rnams ni bsrung bar gyis/_/khyod kyis 
[\[207b.7\]]rtsod pa rab spongs la/_/stong nyid dag ni rtogs par gyis/_/rnyed pa dag la ma gdu bar/_/mang thos legs bshad ldan par gyis/_/khyod kyis rnyed pa dag la ni/_/mi gtsang lta bur blta bar gyis/_/rnyed pa'i dri ma dag gis ni/_/rnam dag sems ni sbags ma byed/_/rnam par 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]grol ba btsal bar byos/_/bla med rnyed pa thob par 'gyur/_/khyod kyis sangs rgyas lam bsgrubs la/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid 'dra bar ltos/_/chos kyi sgron chen rtag sbor la/_/'jig rten kun ni snang bar gyis/_/khyod kyi sems ni ri rgyal ltar/_/mi g.yo nyid 
[\[208a.2\]]du rab tu byos/_/kha ngan dang ni brdegs pa yang /_/thams cad bzod pa dang du long /_/khyod ni sems can rnams kyi phyir/_/dge bshes yang dag rab tu byos/_/dman pa'i sems ni yongs spongs la/_/rnam dag las ni rtag tu sgrubs/_/khyod kyi sems ni brtan byos la/_/
[\[208a.3\]]bla med chos ni rab tu ston/_/mdo sde dam pa 'di lta bu/_/brtse ba can la sbyin par gyis/_/bla med ye shes gang tshol ba/_/'khor ba dag la 'jigs ma byed/_/des ni sdig pa rnam spangs nas/_/phan yon mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/dper na blo dang ldan pa dag_/me la 
[\[208a.4\]]spyod par mkhas pa gang /_/ro rnams sna tshogs sbyin byed kyang /_/mes ni sreg par yong mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig blo dang mi ldan pa/_/thabs dag la ni mi mkhas pas/_/me khyer lag mthil gang bzhag pa/_/mes ni rab tu sreg par 'gyur/_/ji ltar mi zhig dug dag gis/_/
[\[208a.5\]]sems ni 'khrugs nas myos pa gang /_/me la rab tu bsros na ni/_/de yi rgyu yis sos par 'gyur/_/zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis/_/blo dang ldan pa'ang de bzhin du/_/yid brten yid ni stong par rig_/de phyir 'khor bar gnas kyang ni/_/mig brten mig ni stong 
[\[208a.6\]]rig pas/_/mig la mngon par zhen pa med/_/gal te de ltar rab shes na/_/mig la gnas kyang nyon mongs med/_/gal te mig nyid stong rig na/_/yang dag ye shes sgrub par 'gyur/_/yang dag ye shes thob pa'i phyir/_/'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gal 
[\[208a.7\]]te mig nyid stong rig na/_/'dod chags dag ni gtan nas spong /_/'dod chags dag ni med pa'i phyir/_/'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/ngar 'dzin 'chab dang khro ba dang /_/ser sna phrag dog ngo tsha med/_/mi bzod sems ni mtho ba dang /_/
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]rgyags dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /_/g.yo sgyu dang ni bag med dang /_/gya gyu la sogs bar du yang /_/thams cad 'dod chags bzhin du bshad/_/yang dag ye shes thob gyur na/_/mig ni zhi ba nyid du rtogs/_/zhi ba nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir/_/'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/yang 
[\[208b.2\]]dag ye shes thob gyur na/_/sangs rgyas tshul la rab tu gnas/_/tshul la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir/_/'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/yang dag ye shes thob gyur na/_/sangs rgyas thabs la gnas par 'gyur/_/thabs la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir/_/'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 
[\[208b.3\]]'gyur/_/yang dag ye shes ma bsgrubs par/_/sgrib pa dag ni gtan spong zhing /_/'od zer 'byung ba sgrub par ni/_/ngas sngon ma thos ma mthong ngo /_/yang dag ye shes rab bsgrubs nas/_/sgrib pa'i gnod pa gtan spong zhing /_/spyod pa 'di rjes gang 'brang ba/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob 
[\[208b.4\]]par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i spyod pa yongs tshol zhing /_/mdo sde 'di la bslabs byas nas/_/de bzhin gshegs la gang mchod pa/_/yang dag ye shes thabs thob 'gyur/_/yang dag ye shes gang bsgrubs pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par gyis/_/'od zer 'gyed pa rdzogs 
[\[208b.5\]]par 'gyur/_/lag mthil 'bras bu ji bzhin no/_/mig la bdag med gang rmongs pa/_/dge sbyong chos ni nyams par 'gyur/_/gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/_/mig la bdag med gang rtogs pa/_/dge slong chos ni sgrub par 'gyur/_/gang zag 
[\[208b.6\]]de yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/_/mig gi mtha' zad gang rtogs pa/_/rna ba skye ba'i mtha' yang rtogs/_/rna ba skye ba'i mtha' rtogs pas/_/dge sbyong chen po'i chos shes bya/_/gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/_/mtha' ni yongs su ma shes na/_/mig ni 
[\[208b.7\]]skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang /_/yongs su shes par mi 'gyur bas/_/gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/_/gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/_/mtha' ni yongs su shes gyur na/_/mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang /_/yongs su shes pa nyid du 'gyur/_/
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/_/gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/_/mtha' ni legs par ma shes na/_/mig gi skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang /_/legs pa nyid du mi shes pas/_/gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob 
[\[209a.2\]]mi 'gyur/_/gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/_/mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na/_/mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang /_/legs pa nyid du shes 'gyur bas/_/gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/_/gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/_/mtha' ni mngon sum ma shes 
[\[209a.3\]]na/_/mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang /_/mngon sum nyid du mi shes pas/_/gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/_/gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/_/mtha' ni mngon sum shes gyur na/_/mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang /_/mngon sum nyid du rab shes pas/_/
[\[209a.4\]]gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/_/gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/_/mtha' ni legs par ma shes na/_/mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang /_/yongs su shes par mi 'gyur bas/_/gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/_/
[\[209a.5\]]gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/_/mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na/_/mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang /_/mngon sum nyid du shes 'gyur bas/_/gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/_/gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/_/rnam dag legs par ma shes na/_/
[\[209a.6\]]rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa/_/legs pa nyid du mi shes pas/_/gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur/_/gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/_/rnam dag legs par shes gyur na/_/rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa/_/legs pa nyid du rtogs 'gyur bas/_/gang zag de 
[\[209a.7\]]yis de lta bu'i/_/'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur/_/de bzhin sna dang lce dang lus/_/yid dang gzugs sgra dri ro dang /_/reg bya chos dang sa chu dang /_/me rlung dag gi dngos po dang /_/'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po dang /_/khams dang 'jig rten skye mched dang /_/sgra dang ming la sogs 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]pa yang /_/thams cad de bzhin rig par gyis/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing 'od zer 'gyed pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa des dge 
[\[209b.2\]]ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnam pa brgyad cu po 'di dag mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can yongs su srung zhing rjes su dran pa dang /_gnod sems med pa dang /_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa srung zhing nyams par mi byed pa dang /_sems 
[\[209b.3\]]shin tu mnyam pa dang /_g.yo sgyu med pa dang /_ser sna med pa dang /_phrag dog med pa dang /_'dod chags kyi bsam pa med pa dang /_bslu ba'i bsam pa med pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa dag la mngon par yid ches pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_rgyags pa la zhen cing 
[\[209b.4\]]sred pa med pa dang /_bzod pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag par gyur pa dang /_dgon pa na gnas pa dang /_'khor rnams la mi rten pa dang /_rnyed pa la mi rten pa dang /_grags pa la mi rten pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[209b.5\]]rnams la rab tu gnas pa dang /_'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin rab tu ston pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la sgyu med par rim gro byed pa dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag la mchog gi bsam pa skyed pa dang /_chos la gus pa'i phyir mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la shin tu bkur ba dang /_
[\[209b.6\]]mdo sde'i don rab tu rtogs pa dang /_yang dag par bstan pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang /_tshig smras pa dag la mi bden pa med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la brtson pa dang /_rtag tu sbyin pa gtong ba dang /_bdud kyi las rab tu rtogs pa dang /_
[\[209b.7\]]dbang po rnams dam du srung ba dang /_tshig rab tu brtags pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa dang /_sa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang /_gzungs zad mi shes pa yongs su tshol ba dang /_lus dang srog la phongs pa med pa dang /_'khor bzhi po dag la rjes su 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]ston par byed pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i bsam pa yongs su bcad pa dang /_'jig rten phyi ma'i chos med do zhes zer ba'i log par lta ba rnams spangs pa dang /_da dung ma bslabs pa dag la gya gyu'i mtshan ma mi ston pa dang /_gang bslab par 'dod pa dag la ci nus kyis 
[\[210a.2\]]rnam par phye nas rab tu ston pa dang /_glu dang rol mo'i sgra dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang /_rgyan dang yo byad kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang /_bden pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gnyid rab tu spangs pa dang /_yang dag pa'i 
[\[210a.3\]]chos yongs su tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa dang /_sangs rgyas la gus pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i las yongs su spangs pa dang /_bslab pa'i gnas rnams la yang dag par brtson pa dang /_chos la sred pa'i phyir grogs khyad par can la rten par byed pa 
[\[210a.4\]]dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su tshol ba la skyo ba med pa dang /_rab tu 'byung ba la shin tu mos pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos srung zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /_sdig pa'i las mi slong ba dang /_bstan pa rnams la the tshom med pa dang /_dpes ston pa la rab tu mkhas 
[\[210a.5\]]pa dang /_gsang ba rnams rnam par phye nas ston par byed pa dang /_byang chub chen po yongs su tshol ba la ngal ba med pa dang /_mdo sde yang dag par bzung ba rnams brjed par mi byed pa dang /_rang gi bslab pa mi spong ba dang /_pha rol gyi smra ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang /_nges par 'byung 
[\[210a.6\]]ba'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang /_spyod pa tshad med pa rnams mngon par sgrub pa dang /_chos kyi ye shes de dag la sems nges par gyur pa dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_srid pa gsum po dag la chags pa med pa dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal 
[\[210a.7\]]spangs pa dang /_mngon par yid ches pa dag la gnyen po rnam par gzhag pa dag ston par byed pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i bye brag rtogs par khong du chud pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' yongs su legs par shes pa dang /_gzhan gyi dring la mi ltos ba dang /_yongs su 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]spong ba'i spyod pa dag la brtson 'grus kyis grub par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad kyi bkod pa dag phun sum tshogs par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni rnam pa brgyad cu zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos brgyad cu po 'di dag ni chos lnga'i nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[210b.2\]]chos lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor ba shes pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa shes pa dang /_nyon mongs pa zad pa shes pa dang /_mchog tu gyur pa shes pa dang /_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shes pa gang yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos lnga po de dag ni chos gnyis 
[\[210b.3\]]kyi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems yongs su dag pas rab tu brgyan pa dang /_gzugs yongs su dag pas rab tu brgyan pa gang yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos gnyis po de dag ni chos gcig gi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[210b.4\]]gcig gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba mngon par grub pa gang yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu yang chos rnam pa brgyad cu yod de/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i 
[\[210b.5\]]rnam par grol ba legs par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_shes rab rgya chen por gyur pa dang /_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yongs su sgrub pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba dang bral ba dang /_nga rgyal 
[\[210b.6\]]rab tu bcom pa dang /_tshig mnyen pa dang /_dngos po sna tshogs rab tu shes pa dang /_dge ba'i grogs po yongs su shes pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pa dang /_spyod lam gyis sems can 'dul ba dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[210b.7\]]par ltung ba rnams kyi the tshom rab tu gcod pa dang /_mi dge ba rnams la smod cing chos dkar po rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_mi dge ba'i grogs po dang mi 'grogs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa la yongs su skyob med pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_brtson 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]'grus rab tu rtsom pa dang /_bdud kyi dngos po rab tu rtogs pa dang /_bden pa rnams mngon du gyur pa dang /_yang dag pa kho nar mchod pa byed pa dang /_the tshom yongs su gcod pa dang /_sems kyis rtag tu sems can yongs su bzla bar sems pa dang /_
[\[211a.2\]]srid pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_sems rgya chen po yongs su bskyed pa dang /_sems can mi dge ba rnams la nyes dmigs yang dag par ston pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rab tu spong ba dang /_'dod pa'i phan pa yongs su mi tshol ba dang /_
[\[211a.3\]]sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'chos pa dang /_'phags pa rnams la gus pa skyed pa dang /_theg pa chen po la gnas pa dag la rten cing rim gro byed pa dang /_theg pa dman pa dag gi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi 
[\[211a.4\]]theg pa pa dag thag ring du spong ba dang /_phyir rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa rgya chen po bshams nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems kyis dbul bar byed pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa dang /_spobs pa phun 
[\[211a.5\]]sum tshogs pa dang /_dpe sna tshogs kyis yang dag pa'i chos rab tu ston par byed pa dang /_stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /_chos yongs su tshol ba la le lo med pa dang /_don zab mo yang dag par ston pa dang /_gzungs chen po dang ldan pa dang /_chos 
[\[211a.6\]]yang dag par ston par byed kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_chos rgya cher spel bar byed pa dang /_yongs su 'dren pa la chog shes pa med pa dang /_spyod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang /_spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang /_mang du thos 
[\[211a.7\]]pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mi dge ba rnams kyi bsngags pa mi rjod pa dang /_dge ba'i las yang dag par sgrub pa dang /_phung po rnams khong du chud pa dang /_lta ba rnams rab tu spangs pa dang /_rgyu'i ngo bo nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang /_spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa dang /_
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]spyod yul ma yin pa yongs su spangs pa dang /_yongs su dang bskyed pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lam la gnas pa dang /_theg pa chen po la rab tu dga' ba dang /_mnyam pa nyid du yongs su sdud par byed pa dang /_bdag med pa la mngon par ma chags pa dang /_'khor ba la yongs su skyo 
[\[211b.2\]]ba med pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su tshol ba la mos pa dang /_'dod pa chung ba'i phyir dgon pa la gnas pa dang /_rtag tu bsod snyoms slong zhing le lo med par gyur pa dang /_ji tsam rnyed pa de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khrel med pa spangs 
[\[211b.3\]]pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par byed pa dang /_dge ba'i grogs po dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /_bdag gi zla ma yin pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang /_so so'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa dang 'thun par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas la shin tu dang 
[\[211b.4\]]ba dang /_snod ma yin pa yongs su spong ba dang /_mi 'thun pa rnams la tshig sbyin par mi byed pa dang /_gsol ba mi 'debs pa dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed pa dang /_gsol ba 'debs pa zhig 'ongs na ci rigs par ston par byed pa dang /_zas la snyoms par gyur pa dang /_
[\[211b.5\]]rtag tu gtong zhing mnyam pa nyid du gtong ba dang /_sgo chen po phye nas gtong bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni gzhon nu chos rnam pa brgyad cu ces bya ste/_'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba thob par byed do/_/de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon 
[\[211b.6\]]nur gyur pas chos de lta bu thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa mig zad mtha' mkhyen pas/_/de slad rnam dag ye shes ston mdzad lags/_/rnam dag ye shes ston par mdzad 
[\[211b.7\]]pas na/_/rnam dag 'od zer phun sum tshogs pa lags/_/de bzhin gshegs pas mig bdag med mkhyen pas/_/de slad rnam dag dbyangs ni ston mdzad lags/_/rnam dag dbyangs ni ston par mdzad pas na/_/tshangs dbyangs mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa lags/_/
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]bcom ldan sngon ni sems can phan btags pas/_/de slad rnam dag gsung ni rdzogs pa lags/_/rnam dag gsung ni yongs su rdzogs pas na/_/'jig rten tshad med rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad/_/de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid stong mkhyen pas/_/
[\[212a.2\]]de slad kun 'dzin mkhyen pa rdzogs pa lags/_/kun 'dzin mkhyen pa yongs su rdzogs pas na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston/_/de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khyad par mkhyen/_/mig gi khyad par dag kyang mtha' ma mchis/_/mkhyen pa'i ming ni 
[\[212a.3\]]dpag tu ma mchis pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston/_/sangs rgyas yi ge khyad par sgo mkhyen pas/_/mig stong yi ge bral bar rab tu mkhyen/_/mig stong yi ge bral bar mkhyen pas na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston/_/gang 
[\[212a.4\]]zhig mig la bdag med rab sems pa/_/sangs rgyas gsung ni bden pa nyid du rtogs/_/sangs rgyas gsung ni bden par rtogs pas na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer nges pa ston/_/bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul mchog ni yongs rdzogs pas/_/mig gi 'jig pa dpag 
[\[212a.5\]]med thugs su chud/_/mig gi 'jig pa rab tu mkhyen pas na/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad/_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/mig gi skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen/_/ji ltar bcom ldan mig gi skye mkhyen pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi 
[\[212a.6\]]thogs de bzhin shog_/de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce lus yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dag dang chos/_/'jig rten skye dang sgra dang ming la sogs/_/thams cad la yang de bzhin rab tu mkhyen/_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/_/
[\[212a.7\]]ji ltar bcom ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol byon/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/tshul khrims rnam dag pha rol byon dang ldan/_/ji ltar bcom ldan tshul khrims pha rol byon/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/bzod pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/_/ji ltar bcom ldan bzod pa'i pha rol byon/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/brtson 'grus pha rol byon pa phun sum 
[\[212b.2\]]tshogs/_/ji ltar bcom ldan brtson 'grus pha rol byon/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/bsam gtan pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/_/ji ltar bcom ldan bsam gtan pha rol byon/_/bdag kyang ring por 
[\[212b.3\]]mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/shes rab pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/_/ji ltar bcom ldan shes rab pha rol byon/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/chos sku'i pha 
[\[212b.4\]]rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/_/ji ltar bcom ldan chos sku'i pha rol byon/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/rnam dag gzugs ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/_/ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag gzugs ldan 
[\[212b.5\]]pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/rnam dag yid ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/_/ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag yid ldan pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog 
[\[212b.6\]]gyur pa/_/yon tan mchog ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/_/ji ltar bcom ldan yon tan mchog ldan pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/gzugs kyi mtshan ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/_/ji ltar bcom ldan gzugs 
[\[212b.7\]]kyi mtshan ldan pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/rnam dag sgra ni dpag med phun sum tshogs/_/ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag sgra ldan pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]gyur pa/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po dpag med phun sum tshogs/_/ji ltar bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul cher ldan pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/sems can gdul slad srid pa gsum na bzhugs/_/ji ltar 
[\[213a.2\]]bcom ldan sems can gdul mdzad pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/'khor ba'i spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'khor ba'i spyod 'das pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin 
[\[213a.3\]]shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/'dod chags spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod chags spyod 'das pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/zhe sdang spyod pa dpag 
[\[213a.4\]]med dag las 'das/_/ji ltar bcom ldan zhe sdang spyod 'das pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/gti mug spyod pa dpag med dag las 'das/_/ji ltar bcom ldan gti mug spyod 'das pa/_/bdag kyang ring por 
[\[213a.5\]]mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/'dod chags zhe sdang spyod pa dpag med 'das/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod sdang spyod 'das pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/zhe sdang gti 
[\[213a.6\]]mug spyod pa dpag med 'das/_/ji ltar bcom ldan sdang rmongs spyod 'das pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/'dod chags gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod rmongs spyod 'das pa/_/bdag 
[\[213a.7\]]kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/_/cha mnyam spyod pa dpag med yang dag 'das/_/ji ltar bcom ldan cha mnyam spyod 'das pa/_/bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog_/'dren pa 'dod chags dag las yongs 'das pas/_/
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog_/'dren pa zhe sdang dag las yongs 'das pas/_/'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs 
[\[213b.2\]]pa/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog_/'dren pa gti mug spyod las yongs 'das pas/_/'jig rten kun la shin du phan 'dogs mdzad/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog_/'dren pa 'dod chags zhe sdang spyod 
[\[213b.3\]]'das pas/_/'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog_/'dren pa zhe sdang gti mug spyod 'das pas/_/'jig rten kun las shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig 
[\[213b.4\]]rten phan 'dogs pa/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog_/'dren pa 'dod chags gti mug spyod 'das pas/_/'jig rten kun las shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog_/'dren pa chags 
[\[213b.5\]]sdang gti mug spyod 'das pas/_/'jig rten kun las shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/lha tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/_/
[\[213b.6\]]bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/klu tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog_/de 
[\[213b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/gnod sbyin mang po thams cad 'dul bar mdzad/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/dri za thams cad rab tu 'dul mdzad cing /_/
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]de bzhin grul bum dpag tu ma mchis pa/_/'khor bcas ji snyed rab tu 'dul bar mdzad/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/lha mi kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/chos rnams yang dag don ni rab 
[\[214a.2\]]tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/yang dag de la the tshom ma mchis shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal zad mtha' mkhyen/_/skye dgu thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/sdug bsngal zad la the tshom ma 
[\[214a.3\]]mchis shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu zad mtha' mkhyen pas/_/skye dgu thams cad la ni phan 'dogs mdzad/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/rgyu zad de la the tshom ma mchis shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/'jig rten spyod pa dag 
[\[214a.4\]]ni rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten spyod la the tshom ma mchis shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/'jig rten gnas dang gnas med rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig 
[\[214a.5\]]rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/'jig rten las dang 'bras bu rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan 
[\[214a.6\]]pas/_/'jig rten rang bzhin sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/thams cad kun du 'gro ba'i spyod pa mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes 
[\[214a.7\]]grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/'jig rten mos pa sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin thams cad mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/bsam gtan spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/_/
[\[214b.2\]]bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/rnam par thar pa'i spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/
[\[214b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/cha mnyam spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/snyoms 'jug spyod pa dag ni rab tu 
[\[214b.4\]]mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba rab mkhyen pas/_/'khor ba nyon mongs rgyu las skyes par mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten 
[\[214b.5\]]thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad rab mkhyen pas/_/'jig rten phan 'dogs dpe zla yong ma mchis/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas ting 
[\[214b.6\]]'dzin rab gnas pas/_/khyad par thabs kyi ye shes skyed par mdzad/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/sngon gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dpag med mkhyen/_/bdag 
[\[214b.7\]]kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/'chi 'pho skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/nyon mongs zad pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/bla med byang chub 
[\[215a.2\]]yang dag mngon sangs rgyas/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/nyon mongs bag chags dag ni rab tu spangs/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig 
[\[215a.3\]]rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/'khor ba nges 'byung chos ni rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos don rab mkhyen pas/_/
[\[215a.4\]]sems can dpag med rnams ni go bar mdzad/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos nyid sgyu ma dang /_/rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig 
[\[215a.5\]]rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/_/yi ge dag dang brjod pa rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mchog ldan pas/_/
[\[215a.6\]]dam chos zab mo dag ni ston par mdzad/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsung thugs dul pas/_/thams cad ye shes rjes su 'brang bar mdzad/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur 
[\[215a.7\]]nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum rab mkhyen pas/_/'dzin dang chags pa mi mnga' thogs mi mnga'/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]pas tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang /_/shes rab bsgrubs pas de las ldog mi 'gyur/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pas rnam grol rab bsgrubs pas/_/rnam grol mkhyen dang gzigs pa 
[\[215b.2\]]ldog mi mnga'/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pas zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgrubs/_/lha mi 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/khams 
[\[215b.3\]]gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/_/'jig rten chos rnams la ni zhen mi mnga'/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig 
[\[215b.4\]]rten mkhyen ldan pas/_/'gro ba sna tshogs dag ni gsal bar gzigs/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'gro ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas/_/de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/_/bdag kyang de 
[\[215b.5\]]'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas rab zhi mtha' mkhyen pas/_/de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/rab zhi de la the tshom ma mchis shog_/de bzhin 
[\[215b.6\]]gshegs pa 'khor ba'i mtha' mkhyen pas/_/de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/'khor ba de la the tshom ma mchis shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen/_/de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang 
[\[215b.7\]]ldan/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/snga phyi'i mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas skyon zlog mtha' rab mkhyen/_/de slad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/skyon zlog de la the tshom ma mchis 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen/_/mig gi rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/snga phyi mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog_/de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas/_/mig 
[\[216a.2\]]gi rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'/_/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas/_/skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog_/gang zhig sngon dang phyi mtha' ma rtogs pas/_/des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/_/de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/_/de slad 'dod 
[\[216a.3\]]pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/_/gang zhig yod med mtha' ni ma rtogs pa/_/des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/_/de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/_/de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/_/gang zhig zad dang mi zad ma rtogs pa/_/des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/_/de 
[\[216a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/_/de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/_/gang zhig 'jug dang mi 'jug ma rtogs pa/_/des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed/_/de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas/_/de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'/_/zhe sdang gti mug 
[\[216a.5\]]khong khro 'chab pa dang /_/g.yo sgyu phrag dog nga rgyal khengs pa dang /_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang /_/bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang de bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/_
[\[216a.6\]]'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu rab tu bkye'o/_/'od zer des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams snang bar byas te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu phan pa dag byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nyid du 
[\[216a.7\]]thim par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas/_/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_gus pas thal mo sbyar nas/_
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod de/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa/_'brug dang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing /_/ka la ping ka'i sgra phyung bas/_/chos rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin pa/_/ci yi slad du 'dzum pa mdzad/_/nyi ma stong bas khyad par 'phags/_/rnam par sgra rab dag 
[\[216b.2\]]dang ldan/_/yon tan ngo mtshar rab mnga' ba/_/ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/_/bsam gtan shes rab rab brgyan pas/_/thams cad dag ni yongs rdzogs pas/_/ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs 
[\[216b.3\]]mnyen pas/_/ngag rtsub rnams ni rtag tu spangs/_/sems can nad ni legs gso ba/_/ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad/_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso/_/mig ni rtag tu stong dben mkhyen/_/rnam dag tshangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' bas/_/sems can rnams la chos ston mdzad/_/
[\[216b.4\]]rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa nas/_/kun 'byung 'gog pa lam dag dang /_/ye shes bzod pa'i bar de bzhin/_/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso/_/mig zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang /_/rab zhi dag ni 'khor ba dag_/thams cad stong dben nyid du 
[\[216b.5\]]mkhyen/_/rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/_/thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no/_/gzhan yang rten cing 'brel 'byung chos/_/chad dang rtag pa yongs bral nas/_/bdag dang gzhan gyis byas min pas/_/rkyen 
[\[216b.6\]]bab las byung nyid du gsung /_/res 'ga' rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis/_/sdug bsngal gzhi ni ston par mdzad/_/res 'ga' don ni sna tshogs kyis/_/sangs rgyas 'od zer bsngags par mdzad/_/res 'ga' tshig ni tshad med kyis/_/rab dben chos ni ston mdzad cing /_/
[\[216b.7\]]gang zag srog dang bdag med dang /_/sems can med pa nyid du ston/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med kyang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gi/_/tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis/_/de 'dra'i chos ni ston par mdzad/_/de bzhin gshegs pas yon tan chos/_/yang 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]dag nyid ni ston mdzad kyang /_/rjod dang brjod bya mi mnga' bas/_/brjod mdzad chos kyang yong mi mnga'/_/bcom ldan yang dag chos gsung zhing /_/skye dgu rnams ni go mdzad pas/_/lha rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dag_/gang thos de dag rtogs par 'gyur/_/lha ma 
[\[217a.2\]]yin ni thams cad kyang /_/mos pa dag ni rnam par dag_/mi ni mang po tshad med kyang /_/the tshom dra ba chad par gyur/_/'dod chags rang bzhin rab tu rtogs/_/zhe sdang gti mug rnam par bshig_/sred dang nga rgyal ma rig dang /_/g.yo sgyu phrag dog spros pa nas/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[217a.3\]]phung po la sogs par/_/thams cad kyang ni yongs su spangs/_/'di la sogs pa'i tshig gi don/_/mthar ni kun kyang rnam par dag_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig la/_/sna tshogs ming ni rab mkhyen pas/_/grangs ni brgya stong mang po rnams/_/bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu 
[\[217a.4\]]ston/_/sangs rgyas tshad med mang po las/_/de 'dra'i chos ni legs bslabs pas/_/chos kyi dngos po gcig la yang /_/brjod pa thug pa med pa ston/_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams kyi/_/rnam grangs sna tshogs rab mkhyen pas/_/ming tshig dang po bar ma dang /_/tha 
[\[217a.5\]]ma rnam 'byed rab tu mkhyen/_/tha dad tshig ni sna tshogs dag_/thams cad rab tu bslabs pas na/_/don mchog dag ni gya nom pa/_/ston pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen/_/de 'dra'i dbyangs ni rnam dag pa/_/rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung bas/_/lce 'ba' zhig la rten pa nas/_/lus sems 
[\[217a.6\]]bar la rten pa'ang min/_/sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_/phyogs bcu'i 'khor ni yongs 'dus nas/_/thal sbyar bcom ldan zhal lta na/_/the tshom dag ni bsal du gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad dang /_/skye mtha' dag ni rang bzhin gyis/_/rtag tu stong zhing dben pa dang /_/
[\[217a.7\]]'gro 'ong med par rab tu mkhyen/_/bzhugs dang gnas ni mi mnga' bas/_/yang dag mtha' la rab tu bzhugs/_/bcom ldan spyan ni thogs mi mnga'/_/de slad deng bdag zhu ba lags/_/de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid kyi/_/sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag dang /_/zad dang ma zad 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]'khor ba ni/_/rang bzhin stong dben rab mkhyen pas/_/chos kyi don rnams rab phye nas/_/'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad/_/thub pa dbyangs snyan rab mnga' bas/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan sngon dang phyi mtha' dang /_/mig nyid stong dben rab mkhyen 
[\[217b.2\]]cing /_/rnam rtog tshig dang bral lags na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan mig ni dpag med dang /_/brjod pa sna tshogs rang bzhin gyis/_/rtag tu stong dben mkhyen lags na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan zad dang skye mtha' dang /_/mig 
[\[217b.3\]]nyid stong dben rab mkhyen cing /_/nyon mongs rnams ni yongs spangs pas/_/sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa brnyes/_/grags pa mchog ni phun sum tshogs/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan yun ring bsgom bslabs pas/_/bsam gyis mi khyab ston par mdzad/_/
[\[217b.4\]]mig nyid stong pa nyid du mkhyen/_/dri bral rtag tu rnam par dag_/sems kyi spyod pa tshad med rnams/_/dgongs pa gcig gis thams cad mkhyen/_/'od zer 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/_/'di ni gang gi snga rtags lags/_/drang srong chen po mngon sangs rgyas/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo 
[\[217b.5\]]khyad par 'phags/_/nyon mongs dag ni rab bsal bas/_/thugs ni rtag tu zhi zhing dben/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen mchog gis/_/mig zad mtha' ni rab tu rtogs/_/rgyu dang rkyen ni gang gi slad/_/deng 'dir 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/
[\[217b.6\]]yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/_/thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen/_/rna ba mi rtag nyid du rtogs/_/sna nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan lce la bdag med 
[\[217b.7\]]mkhyen/_/lus kyang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/_/sems yid stong par rab mkhyen na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan gzugs la bdag med mkhyen/_/sgra yang mi rtag nyid du rtog_/dri nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]ldan ro la bdag med mkhyen/_/reg bya mi rtag nyid du rtogs/_/chos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan sa la bdag med mkhyen/_/chu yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/_/me nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston 
[\[218a.2\]]par mdzad/_/bcom ldan rlung la bdag med mkhyen/_/ngo bo mi rtag nyid du rtogs/_/dngos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'jig rten bdag med mkhyen/_/sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs/_/phung po stong par rab mkhyen na/_/ci 
[\[218a.3\]]slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan khams la bdag med mkhyen/_/'jig rten mi rtag nyid du rtogs/_/skye nyid stong par rab mkhyen na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan sgra la bdag med mkhyen/_/ming yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/_/lam nyid stong par rab 
[\[218a.4\]]mkhyen na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan ye shes bdag med mkhyen/_/rab dben mi rtag nyid du rtogs/_/sems can stong par rab mkhyen na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med/_/bdag dang bdag med pa yang mkhyen/_/
[\[218a.5\]]mos pa stong par rab mkhyen na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/'khor ba bdag med nyid du gzigs/_/rtag dang mi rtag pa yang mkhyen/_/mya ngan 'das pa stong mkhyen na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnam grol/_/grags pa 
[\[218a.6\]]khams gsum kun du gang /_/brgya byin mi yi dbang po dang /_/klu rnams la sogs kun gyis mchod/_/de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad dang /_/skye mtha' rab dben mkhyen lags na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad/_/sangs rgyas sras ni tshad med pa/_/'khor 'dir thams 
[\[218a.7\]]cad rab tu 'dus/_/sangs rgyas gsung las skyes pa dang /_/chos las sprul te gang byung ba/_/thams cad bcom ldan spyan sngar mchis/_/gus pas thal mo rab sbyar lags/_/'khor 'dus de dag slad du ni/_/'od zer rgyu rkyen 'di zhu lags/_/de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid ni/_/
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]stong zhing bdag med mkhyen pas na/_/khyim na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa/_/thams cad las ni yang dag 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams ni/_/bye brag med cing mnyam mkhyen pas/_/bcom ldan dgongs pa rab mkhyen gyi/_/rdzu 'phrul dag gis gzigs ma lags/_/
[\[218b.2\]]bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen/_/ngo bo nyid stong 'gro 'ong med/_/rnam dag mkhyen pa tshad ma mchis/_/ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//_//bam po gsum pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa skye mtha' rab zad pa/_/thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten kun skyob mdzad/_/
[\[218b.3\]]chos rje mchog gyur mi yi gtsor gyur pa/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshad ma mchis/_/gzhan yang lha tshogs gzi byin che ba rnams/_/mkha' la gdugs ni dam pa dag kyang thogs/_/sa chen 'di ni rab tu g.yos par gyur/_/
[\[218b.4\]]gang zhig sngon ni de bzhin gshegs pa las/_/yun ring dge ba'i chos ni gang bsgrubs pa/_/mnyam par dga' mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/gang zhig sngon ni sangs rgyas rab mchod nas/_/chos 'di thos nas dga' ba rab 
[\[218b.5\]]skyes pas/_/'dren pa rab mchog mi yi gtsor gyur pa/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan gsung ni mang po dga' mdzad pas/_/bya rgyal ngang pa bzhin du dbyangs rab snyan/_/sgra snyan tshad med rang gi ngang gis 'byung /_/ci slad 'od zer 'di bkye bshad du 
[\[218b.6\]]gsol/_/tshigs bcad bye ba tshad ma mchis pa yis/_/rjes 'thun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod gyur cing /_/ku tsi ra yi sgra skad mchog ldan pa/_/ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol/_/'brug sgra zab mos chos ni bstan pa'i sgra/_/'jig rten brgya stong dpag med grags gyur pa/_/
[\[218b.7\]]thugs rjes tshig rtsub yang na 'jam ston pa/_/ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkyi/_/skye dang mi skye zad dang mi zad mkhyen/_/mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ong med par rtogs/_/'jig rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i mchog gyur pa/_/ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye/_/mig gi byung ba rtag 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]tu stong dben dang /_/'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis dang /_/smig rgyu chu bur lta bur rab mkhyen pa/_/rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan lags/_/de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams nas/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i 
[\[219a.2\]]bar du yang /_/thams cad de bzhin du ni rig par bgyi/_/rdo rje rtag pa'i sku dang mi 'jig sku/_/mtshan mchog brgya stong dag ni phun sum tshogs/_/sku la 'khrul 'khor mi mnga' g.yo mdzad pa/_/rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum pa bshad du gsol/_/byin pa zlum zhing zhabs kyi rting pa ring /_/
[\[219a.3\]]phyal gyi mtshan ma mi gda' seng ge 'dra/_/lte ba shin tu zab cing rked rgyas pa/_/rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/_/gser sku rnam dag rdul dang dri ma spangs/_/ba spu re re kha dog mthon mthing ldan/_/g.yas su 'khyil cing spos kyi ngad ldang ba/_/rgyu rkyen gang slad 
[\[219a.4\]]'dzum mdzad bshad du gsol/_/sku mchog dam pa yongs rdzogs rtag gnas pa/_/dper na n+ya gro d+ha yi shing rgyal bzhin/_/yon tan thams cad kyis ni rab tu brgyan/_/gsung dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad/_/dpung pa zlum zhing phrag pa stug la mdzes/_/gtsug 
[\[219a.5\]]tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil bar gda'/_/zhing ni brgya stong dpag med rgyu bar mdzad/_/sems can log dang yang dag lam ston mdzad/_/tshems dkar dri mi mnga' bas dung dang 'dra/_/ljags mtshan srid ring zhal ni kun du khebs/_/'gram pa seng ge 'dra zhing shangs ni 
[\[219a.6\]]mtho/_/thams cad thabs dang rnam dag thugs las skyes/_/ud pa la yi bsung ni zhal nas 'byung /_/tsan dan dri dag sku ni kun du khyab/_/sngon ni byams pa rgya cher bsgoms pas na/_/rnam dag mos pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mthil shin tu mnyam/_/
[\[219a.7\]]sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur/_/gom pa seng ge glang po che 'dra bas/_/'jig rten thams cad las ni yang dag 'das/_/'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis mdzes par brgyan/_/khyad 'phags 'od zer dag ni rab tu gsal/_/dge ba dag gis skye dgu phan 'dogs pas/_/gang 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]gis mthong ba dang ba rab tu skye/_/sor gcig 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag med snang bar mdzad/_/sngon ni dge sbyong mang po rab bsgrubs pas/_/mtshan gyi bkod pa sna tshogs 'di brnyes lags/_/gzugs sku yongs rdzogs dpe zla yong ma mchis/_/zhal 
[\[219b.2\]]mtshan rab mdzes shin tu khyad par 'phags/_/rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya dang 'dra/_/sku dbyibs mi rgu seng ge ji lta bzhin/_/'jig rten byung nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/_/ci slad 
[\[219b.3\]]'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/cang shes bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi mnga'/_/phyag mthil mnyam rgyas phyag ni pus mo 'das/_/mi yi seng ge ngo mtshar khyad par 'phags/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/sku las 'od zer dpag med rab 'gyed 
[\[219b.4\]]cing /_kha dog gya nom rab zhi rtag gsal ba/_/rnam dag thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad/_/mdo sde tshad med pa dag ston par mdzad/_/rtag dang chad pa dag la gnas pa yis/_/de 'dra'i chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur ma lags/_/gang gis mthar lta rnams ni rab spangs na/_/bcom 
[\[219b.5\]]ldan rnam dag sku ni myur thob 'gyur/_/lha rnga 'brug sgra gsung ni kun grags shing /_/ka lan dka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal/_/lha yi glu sgra brgya stong mang ldan pa/_/ci slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol/_/'dren pas gsung gcig tu ni chos bstan pas/_/'chal pa'i tshul 
[\[219b.6\]]khrims can dag rgyun yang bcad/_/de bzhin gshegs pas dbyangs rab gang gsungs pa/_/de kun zab cing ngo mtshar chos lags so/_/khyu mchog smin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye bas/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni brgya stong gsal bar mdzad/_/spyan mchog dag ni kha dog mthon mthing 
[\[219b.7\]]'dra/_/gtsug tor mtshan ni mkha' yi lhas mi mthong /_/tshems dkar gtams pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan/_/dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs/_/dge ba'i phrin las tshad med dag las skyes/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sku/_/kha dog dam pa dpag med phun tshogs shing /_/'od zer rnam dag ngo mtshar rab bkye ba/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/thugs rje chen po mchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso/_/sems can yang dag bsam pa thugs su chud/_/thogs pa ma mchis spobs 
[\[220a.2\]]pa mchog brnyes pa/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol rab byon pas/_/rig pa gsum dang mngon shes drug phun tshogs/_/rnam dag 'od zer dpag med ston mdzad pa/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa 
[\[220a.3\]]dpag med snyed/_/bcom ldan brgya stong snyed la mchod pa mdzad/_/de 'dra'i rgyu 'bras chab ni mi 'tshal ba/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan sngon ni bskal pa dpag med snyed/_/ting 'dzin mchog rnams la ni rab bzhugs pas/_/mig gi skye mtha' zad pa'i mtha' mkhyen 
[\[220a.4\]]na/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar dus/_/'dren pas de dag kun ni rab tu mkhyen/_/rnam dag mkhyen pa thogs med bsam mi khyab/_/ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i mdun du 
[\[220a.5\]]phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo la bzhag nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_/gzhon nu shin tu legs par nyon/_/ngas ni deng 'dir byang chub chos/_/'od zer rab tu ston pa'i mdo/_/khyod la shin tu yongs gtad kyis/_/ma 'ongs tha ma dus ngan tshe/_/
[\[220a.6\]]chos ni rnam par 'jig pa na/_/khyod kyis sems can rnams la ni/_/rab tu phye nas bshad par gyis/_/ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan dag gis/_/ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe/_/shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i/_/mdo sde dam pa 'di dag la/_/gang mos gang ni mi mos pa/_/thams cad kun kyang gzigs shing 
[\[220a.7\]]mkhyen/_/sems can dag ni gang zhig gis/_/byang chub lam ni rab tshol ba/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing /_/mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar gyis/_/gang zhig dad pa rab 'jig cing /_/'du 'dzi la ni mos 'gyur dang /_/nyin mtshan gnyid la gang dga' ba/_/mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/_/nga yi bstan 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]pa dag las ni/_/rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag la/_/mos pa dag ni mi skye ba/_/skyes bu blun po de dag ni/_/dad pas byin pa chud gzon 'gyur/_/'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag la/_/nyes dmigs mang bar thos kyang ni/_/'jig rten dag la mngon zhen nas/_/'jigs pa dag 
[\[220b.2\]]ni mi skye ba/_/skyes bu blun po de dag ni/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par 'gyur/_/chos gos dag ni bgos gyur kyang /_/de la shes rab ci yang med/_/thub pas legs par gsungs pa yi/_/yang dag bka' ni gang yin pa/_/shes pa med pas thos gyur na/_/yid ches len par mi 'gyur te/_/
[\[220b.3\]]skyes bu blun po de dag dang /_/lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag_/gal te thos par gyur nas kyang /_/rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi/_/sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba/_/de 'dra'i gang zag dag la ni/_/ngas ni rab tu smod par byed/_/mi lus thob par gyur mod 
[\[220b.4\]]kyang /_/de ni don med chud zos yin/_/gal te shin tu zab pa'i chos/_/'di dag thos par gyur nas ni/_/rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi/_/sems ni rab tu skye 'gyur ba/_/de 'dra'i gang zag de dag ni/_/sngon chad sangs rgyas phrad pas na/_/gdon mi za ba kho nar ni/_/bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[220b.5\]]skyes bu blun po gang dag cig_/lta ba ngan pas rab smas nas/_/shes rab srog ni gcod byed pa/_/byang chub yongs su spong bar 'gyur/_/de lta bas na mi dge ba'i/_/bshes gnyen dag ni rab spangs nas/_/blo ldan mkhas pa dag la ni/_/bsten cing gus pa bskyed par bya/_/'jig rten dag ni thams 
[\[220b.6\]]cad na/_/nyes dmigs tshad med gang yod dang /_/sems can ngan song gsum por ni/_/rtag tu bying bar gang byed pa/_/thams cad gti mug rmongs pa yi/_/rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas na/_/nyon mongs rjes su 'jug byed cing /_/rang dbang dag ni 'thob mi 'gyur/_/yang dag chos ni spong byed cing /_/chos ma 
[\[220b.7\]]yin pa spyod par byed/_/de lta bas na rmongs pa yi/_/skyes bu dman pa spang bar bya/_/ji ltar kha lo sgyur ba yis/_/rang gi srog shing bcag pa bzhin/_/mi dge las ni byas pas na/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur/_/kha nas tshig ngan phyung nas ni/_/rtag tu bdag la gnod byed pa/_/ji ltar sta re rno 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]thogs nas/_/rang gi lus ni gcod byed 'dra/_/chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen dag gis/_/byas pa'i las kyi rjes su ni/_/rnam smin myong ba skyabs med par/_/de ltar khong du ma chud pas/_/'jig rten drang srong la bsten nas/_/dge ba'i grogs po yin snyam sems/_/de nas rang nyid 'di 
[\[221a.2\]]snyam du/_/stong pa nyid ni gang bsgom pa/_/'dus ma byas ni rtogs snyam nas/_/chad par lta ba skyed par byed/_/lus ni snod chag pa dang 'dra/_/sems kyang rjes su 'gag gyur zhes/_/phal cher kyal ba'i tshig dag la/_/mos pa nyid du rab 'gyur zhing /_/'di la mngon par zhen pas na/_/phan pa'i 
[\[221a.3\]]don ni ci yang med/_/gal te sbrul ni gdug pa yis/_/gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang /_/nam yang skye dgu mang po rnams/_/ngan 'gro dag tu ltung mi byed/_/blun po gang zhig chos ston pa/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byed pas/_/skye dgu mang po tshad med snyed/_/sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed/_/
[\[221a.4\]]khyed la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa/_/'di lta bur ni lta bar gyis/_/deng 'dir nga yi spyan sngar ni/_/zla 'od gzhon nu gang 'dug pa/_/'dis ni sngon chad 'das pa yi/_/sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das/_/tshad med gang gA'i klung bye snyed/_/mchod pa rim gro rab byas shing /_/shin tu brtan par 
[\[221a.5\]]yongs bsgoms nas/_/bla med ye shes btsal bas na/_/srid pa dag ni thams cad la/_/sems kyis gnas pa ci yang med/_/mig gi skye mtha' gtan du ni/_/rnam par dag par shes pas na/_/spros pa dag ni yongs spangs nas/_/mngon par zhen pa ci yang med/_/sems can dag ni tshad med 
[\[221a.6\]]la/_/phan pa dag ni bya ba'i phyir/_/bla med 'od zer ston pa yi/_/mdo sde dag ni ston par byed/_/skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/_/chos 'di slob par mi nus pas/_/rnal 'byor bsgom pa dag la ni/_/skyon nyid du yang lta bar byed/_/de lta bas na blun po dag_/thag ring por ni yongs spangs nas/_/de dag la ni 
[\[221a.7\]]bstan mi bya/_/de yi chos kyang mi bslab bo/_/skyes bu blun po gang yin pa/_/rtsod pa'i smra la mos pas na/_/rtsod smra med pa'i spyod pa la/_/nan tan bsgrub par mi nus pas/_/skyes bu de dag rnams la ni/_/tshul bzhin sems ni ci yang med/_/de lta bas na de dag la/_/bsnyen bkur mi bya bsngags mi brjod/_/skyes 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]bu blun po gang yin pa/_/le lo snyom las la gnas pas/_/rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyi/_/mi dge las ni spyod pas na/_/de la tshul khrims dag pa dang /_/shes rab mang thos ci yang med/_/rtag tu 'dod pa'i yul sems shing /_/'du 'dzi dag la mos par byed/_/khyed kyis 'di ltar blun po de/_/rigs 
[\[221b.2\]]dang rus dang lus kyang ni/_/dman pa yin par rab tu ltos/_/khong khro bka' blo mi bde zhing /_/byad bzhin dag ni mi sdug la/_/gal te dge ba'i gnas skyes kyang /_/lus ni rtag tu ma rabs 'gyur/_/bdag tu 'du shes la zhen pas/_/yang dag don la rmongs par 'gyur/_/blo gros dag dang mi ldan 
[\[221b.3\]]pas/_/tshig gi bye brag 'byed mi nus/_/rang bzhin stong pa'i chos thos kyang /_/de la mos pa skyed mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das/_/yun ring po nas 'jig rten pa'i/_/tshig gi spros pa gang yin pa/_/thams cad rab tu spangs pa yin/_/so so'i skye bos 'di dag la/_/shin 
[\[221b.4\]]tu zhen cing chags pas na/_/ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du yang /_/rtogs shing khong du chud mi 'gyur/_/tshul khrims bsngags pa rjod byed kyang /_/tshangs par spyod pa sgrub mi byed/_/kha nas chos ni ston byed kyang /_/lus kyis chos min spyod par byed/_/rang gis 'dul ba ston byed kyang /_/rtag tu 'dul 
[\[221b.5\]]min spyod par byed/_/sangs rgyas slob ma dag la ni/_/kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos gyon gsungs/_/'chal ba'i tshul khrims can dag gis/_/gos 'di rab tu bgos gyur kyang /_/nga rgyal dang ni bag med pa'i/_/sems ni rab tu 'phel bar byed/_/dad pas byin pa ci zos pa/_/thu lum 'bar ba 
[\[221b.6\]]mid pa 'dra/_/de ltar khyim gyi gnas spangs nas/_/'dod pa lnga yi bde ba'ang med/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos dag la/_/mchog gi bde ba ma thob nas/_/spyod pa 'dren ma mos byed pas/_/mtha' gnyis dag ni spong mi 'gyur/_/yid kyi mos pa ji snyed pa/_/thams cad kyang ni dag mi 'gyur/_/
[\[221b.7\]]de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni/_/'khor mang nang du gnas gyur kyang /_/dper na ji ltar wa skyes dag_/seng ge'i khyur ni zhugs pa bzhin/_/de ltar rab tu zhi ba yi/_/chos ni yang dag bstan byas kyang /_/de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i don/_/rtogs shing khong du ma chud pas/_/'khor mang dag la bstan bsngags 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]kyang /_/khengs pa'i sems ni skyed par byed/_/ston pa chen po mi dran pas/_/ngo tsha dman pa'i sems kyang med/_/mi gtsang dngos po len byed kyang /_/yid bzhin nor bu thob pa bzhin/_/shin tu dga' bas 'dzin byed pas/_/sems kyis [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]gtong mi byed/_/'di lta 
[\[222a.2\]]bu yi ma rabs dag_/khyim nas rab tu byung nas ni/_/spyod lam dag kyang srung ba dang /_/chos gos lhung bzed 'dzin byed kyang /_/cha byad tsam dang ldan pas na/_/yang dag shes rab ci yang med/_/kha spu dag ni bregs gyur kyang /_/sdig pa'i sems ni mi spong zhing /_/dge sbyong ma yin pa yi chos/_/log 
[\[222a.3\]]lta dag tu lhung gyur na/_/rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam/_/de dag rab tu nyams par 'gyur/_/dge sbyong mngon du bya ba yi/_/'bras bu dag kyang 'thob mi 'gyur/_/ma rig nyon mongs rnams kyang ni/_/rdul tsam nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer dag tu rnam rgyu zhing /_/rang nyid dben pa'i bsngags 
[\[222a.4\]]brjod kyang /_/skyes bu blun po blo med pas/_/yang dag bgrod pa shes mi 'gyur/_/sems kyi 'dun pa ci yod pa/_/de dag thams cad mi dge yin/_/rnyed pa 'dod pa'i rgyu yi phyir/_/dgon pa dag na gnas byed kyi/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag rgyu/_/bsgrub pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/rmugs dang gnyid 
[\[222a.5\]]la rab tu dga'/_/lus ni ji ltar bde snyam nas/_/rtag tu de lta'i dngos po dag_/sgrub pa la ni mos par byed/_/dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag tu/_/lo ni mang por gnas byed kyang /_/phyin log lta bar gyur pa'i phyir/_/mya ngan 'das lam stor bas na/_/nams kyang dge sbyong lam dag gi_/'bras bu 
[\[222a.6\]]dag ni thob mi 'gyur/_/yang dag lta ba rab nyams shing /_/tshul khrims dag dang 'gal byas pas/_/gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan pa/_/de la shin tu sred par 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni/_/rtag tu sred pa skyed par byed/_/gal te grong khyer zhugs na yang /_/nga rgyal mtshan ma 
[\[222a.7\]]ston byed cing /_/lus kyi las ni mi srung bas/_/spyod lam dag la gnas mi byed/_/res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs nas ni/_/rgyu tshe rang nyid 'di skad du/_/dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag na/_/ri phug dag ni gang yod pa/_/khyed rnams 'di ltar shes par gyis/_/de ni bdag gi gnas yin te/_/mtho 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]dma' ran par lta ba dang /_/'gro gom tshul la gnas so zhes/_/tha dad mtshan ma'i tshig brjod de/_/dgra bcom pa yi rtags bstan pas/_/khyim pa dag ni ji snyed pa/_/phan tshun du ni 'di skad du/_/dgon pa'i dge slong gang yin pa/_/yang dag 'phags pa yin zhes zer/_/res 'ga' dgon 
[\[222b.2\]]pa de dag na/_/gnas par gyur pa de yi tshe/_/gal te gzhan dag 'ongs gyur na/_/'di lta bur ni ston par byed/_/bdag ni dgon gnas 'di dag tu/_/nyin mtshan 'chag par byed ce'am/_/yang na rtswa 'jam bting nas ni/_/'dir ni 'dug par byed ces zer/_/res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs 
[\[222b.3\]]gyur nas/_/khyim pa'i der ni phyin pa'i tshe/_/g.yo sgyus nan tan 'di skad du/_/bde 'am zhes ni 'dri bar byed/_/'jig rten pa yi 'du 'dzi'i gtam/_/rgyal po chom rkun la sogs pa'i/_/sna tshogs dag ni rjod par byed/_/res 'ga' chags pa'i sems dag gis/_/bud med rnams kyi mdun 
[\[222b.4\]]dag tu/_/thabs ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/rang gi yon tan rjod par byed/_/bdag ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi/_/bsod nams zhing ni chen po byed/_/bdag ni rgyal thabs rab spangs nas/_/rab tu byung nas lam sgom yin/_/btsun mo dang ni sras rnams kyang /_/mtho ris skyes par gyur 
[\[222b.5\]]ces zer/_/de dag de skad thos nas ni/_/shin tu gus pa rab bskyed de/_/gos zas dang ni btung ba dag_/sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par byed/_/btsun pas thugs rjer rab dgongs shing /_/bdag cag thad du yang gshegs zer/_/ro zhim dag la zhen chags shing /_/nyes dmigs rnams 
[\[222b.6\]]ni mi shes pas/_/bdud kyis glags kyang rnyed 'gyur te/_/ru sbal rgya mos zin pa 'dra/_/dgon par gnas pa dag la yang /_/rnyed pa dag gis snyems par byed/_/dge slong brtson 'grus can dag la/_/brnyas shing skur pa 'debs par byed/_/rnyed dang grags pas sems rmongs pas/_/yang nas 
[\[222b.7\]]yang du zhen pa skyed/_/lus ni yongs su gso ba'i phyir/_/rtag tu g.yo sgyu spyod pas na/_/lus dang ngag gi mi dge las/_/yang nas yang du 'phel bar byed/_/gal te sbyin bdag dad pa yis/_/dad pa'i sems kyis mchod na yang /_/le lo snyom las dbang gis ni/_/de yi bsod nams 'bri bar byed/_/
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]skyes bu blun po de dag ni/_/rtag tu mi dge 'dod bskyed pas/_/stong pa nyid kyi chos 'di la/_/rjes 'thun bzod sems 'thob mi 'gyur/_/gang dag nga yi bstan pa las/_/nyes dmigs de dag rab spangs nas/_/nan tan bag yod sgrub byed na/_/chos 'di thos par dka' mi 
[\[223a.2\]]'gyur/_/rnyed pa dang ni mi rnyed dang /_/bstod smad sdug bsngal bde la sogs/_/'jig rten chos kyis mi g.yos pa/_/chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/_/lus la mi gtsang 'du shes dang /_/phung po rma yi 'du shes dang /_/zas ni rma bskus 'du shes pa/_/chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/_/
[\[223a.3\]]gos bzang dag ni thob gyur kyang /_/dregs pa dag ni mi skyed cing /_/ngo tsha dgab pa'i phyir gyon pa/_/chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/_/gzugs dang stobs ni mi snyems shing /_/zas la chags pa med pa dang /_/srog gnas phyir ni gang za ba/_/chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/_/sred pa 
[\[223a.4\]]rnams ni stong shes nas/_/'dod pa dag la blang dor med/_/rtag tu stong dben gang spyod pa/_/chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/_/dpag tshad gcig 'das ri khrod du/_/gcig pu 'dug nas mnyam bzhag cing /_/'dus byas bdag med gang rtogs pa/_/chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/_/
[\[223a.5\]]mi zad skye ba'i mtha' dag dang /_mig 'jug mtshan nyid rtogs byed cing /_/mig gtsang lam ni rab sgrub pa/_/chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur/_/rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/_/sgra dang ming gi bar du yang /_/thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin ma 
[\[223a.6\]]'ongs dus kyi tshe/_/dge slong dag ni tshad med snyed/_/brtson pa dang ni le lo can/_/thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag_/sgrub pa dang ni mi sgrub pa/_/yid ches pa dang yid mi ches/_/thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag_/
[\[223a.7\]]mig zad lam ni gang yin pa/_/sgrub pa dang ni mi sgrub pa/_/thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/gang zhig byang chub rab mos shing /_/zla gcig gnyis gsum 'das nas ni/_/dus gzhan phyir ni gang ldog pa/_/thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis/_/gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas/_/mos 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]pa'i sems ni gang bskyed pa/_/gal te nyams par gyur na yang /_/slar ni dad pa thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas/_/bag med spong bar mi byed pa/_/mdo 'di sangs rgyas dka' ma yin/_/de snyam du ni sems par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas/_/bdud kyis yongs su gang bzung ba/_/dang 
[\[223b.2\]]po dad pa skyes gyur kyang /_/phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos la ma mos pa/_/mi bden grags dang rnyed pa tshol/_/grong khyer grong rdal rab rgyu zhing /_/gzungs rnams dang ni ting 'dzin dang /_/kun 'dzin 'od zer bsngags brjod kyang /_/de yis yang dag rtogs mi 'gyur/_/'dod pa lnga pos bcings pa dang /_/
[\[223b.3\]]'jig rten las ni 'dod tshol ba/_/brjod pa dag ni rtogs byed pas/_/stong nyid sgom la skur pa 'debs/_/dran dang shes rab sems med pas/_/tshe tshad rab tu don med 'das/_/blun po stong pa'i chos spong ba/_/de ni tshul khrims bgegs byas pas/_/mnar med dag tu ltung bar 'gyur/_/nam yang mtho ris yong mi skye/_/gang 
[\[223b.4\]]gis skad cig gcig la ni/_/mchod rten stong ni byas pa bas/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas/_/tshig bzhi tshigs bcad gcig 'dzin 'phags/_/me tog phreng ba brgya stong dag_/sangs rgyas mchod rten mchod pa bas/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas/_/tshig bzhi tshigs bcad sems pa 'phags/_/gang gis 
[\[223b.5\]]rin chen mchod rten dag_/gang gA'i bye snyed byas pa bas/_/gang gis tha na skad cig tsam/_/mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni 'bum phrag brgya/_/me tog gtor nas mchod pa bas/_/gang gis tha na skad cig tsam/_/mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/_/chos gos 'bum phrag brgya 
[\[223b.6\]]mang po/_/sangs rgyas rnams la phul ba bas/_/gang gis tha na skad cig tsam/_/mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags/_/sangs rgyas spyan ni rnam dag 'phags/_/mi mkhyen mi gzigs gang yang med/_/gang gis mdo sde 'di mos na/_/sangs rgyas spyan ni thob par 'gyur/_/'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshe/_/
[\[223b.7\]]sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa byung /_/nga ni bram ze'i khye 'ur gyur/_/me tog thogs nas mchod pa byas/_/shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/_/byang chub snying po la 'dug nas/_/mdo sde 'di ni ston 'gyur zhes/_/nga la byang chub lung yang bstan/_/khyod ni de tshe gzhon nur gyur/_/da lung bstan pa thos gyur nas/_/dga' zhing dad pa'i 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]sems bskyed de/_/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du/_/gal te bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas tshe/_/bdag ni de yi grogs gyur nas/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu yang /_/chos kyi sde snod rab 'dzin cing /_/srung bar shog ces smon lam btab/_/sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de yis/_/'od zer 
[\[224a.2\]]ston pa'i mdo 'di ni/_/ji skad gsungs bzhin de yi tshe/_/bram ze'i khye'u dang gzhon nu gnyis/_/legs par mnyan cing yongs su bzung /_/nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/_/me tog ud pa la dag gis/_/sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas/_/de tshe khyod kyang der 'dug ste/_/'di skad du ni smon lam btab/_/nga yi bstan 
[\[224a.3\]]pa tha ma la/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab bzung nas/_/rgya cher ston par shog ces smras/_/gang gis chos 'di thos gyur nas/_/zhe sdang sems ni mi skyed par/_/gzung 'dzin klog cing gang 'don pa/_/de ni skyes bu dam pa yin/_/khyod kyis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/_/thos dka'i chos 'di rab bzung nas/_/sems can dag la don gyi tshul/_/
[\[224a.4\]]rgya cher dbye zhing bstan par bya/_/ngas kyang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/_/yang dag chos ni nub pa na/_/'od zer ston pa'i mdo 'di ni/_/sems can dag la rgya cher bstan/_/blun pos nan tan mi sgrub pas/_/'di la skur ba 'debs par byed/_/ngas ni de skad thos gyur kyang /_/zhe sdang dag ni skyed mi byed/_/ngas ni rtag tu 
[\[224a.5\]]bzod bsgoms nas/_/'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs byed/_/bzod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pas na/_/mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis brgyan/_/gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas sku/_/gya nom yongs su rdzogs gyur cing /_/gser gyi kha dog rnam dag 'phags/_/bzod pa'i stobs las byung bar ltos/_/nga yi zhabs ni
