[\[224a.6\]]sa reg nas/_/zhing ni tshad med g.yo byed kyang /_/sems can rnams ni mi ltung ba/_/thams cad bzod pa'i stobs las skyes/_/nga yi spu khung gcig nas ni/_/'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas/_/thams cad gsal bar gang byed pa/_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/srin po bzhin du 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/
[\[224a.7\]]srog chags gzi byin 'phrog byed pa/_/nga la rtag tu gus pa yang /_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/nga yi 'khor ni ji snyed pa/_/sems ni rab tu dul gyur nas/_/de bzhin gshegs la gus pa yang /_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag_/'khor 'dus chen po'i nang dag tu/_/
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags brjod pa/_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/klu yi rgyal po brgya stong dag_/rab tu gdug cing 'jigs rung ba/_/sangs rgyas mthong na dga' ba yang /_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/srin po gnod sbyin la sogs pas/_/me tog phreng ba brgya stong thogs/_/'ongs nas nga la 
[\[224b.2\]]mchod byed pa/_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/zhing ni brgya stong tshad med par/_/bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/nga yi yon tan bsngags pa yang /_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po/_/brgya stong dag ni 'dus gyur nas/_/me tog gtor nas 
[\[224b.3\]]nga mchod pa/_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/gnod sbyin rgyal po la sogs pa/_/bye ba brgya phrag drug cu rnams/_/'ongs nas nga la gang mchod pa/_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/gzhan yang klu yi rgyal po ni/_/ma na ba ga la sogs pas/_/mu tig dmar pos nga mchod pa/_/thams cad bzod 
[\[224b.4\]]mchog stobs las byung /_/du mu ru dang shi khyi ba'i/_/brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas/_/rol mo dag gis nga mchod pa/_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/lto 'phye dang ni lus srul po/_/brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas/_/me tog spos kyis nga mchod pa/_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/sa chen 'dzin pa klu yi 
[\[224b.5\]]rgyal/_/lus phyed dag ni rab bstan nas/_/thal sbyar nga la gus pa yang /_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/lus med sgra gcan zin la sogs/_/bye ba phrag ni brgya stong rnams/_/dang ba'i sems kyis nga mchod pa/_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar ltos/_/sangs rgyas 'od zer gang 
[\[224b.6\]]reg pa/_/sdug bsngal bral nas bde thob pa/_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/sa mu ta dang rlung gi lha/_/brgya stong nam mkha' gang bar ni/_/spos kyi char phab nga mchod pa/_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/lha yi 'khor ni brgya stong dag_/lha yi me tog gtor mchod de/_/sred spangs sangs rgyas sten byed pa/_/thams cad 
[\[224b.7\]]bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/khyed kyis sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang /_/sbyin dang tshul khrims sgra bsgrags nas/_/thams cad kun du thos mdzad pa/_/bzod mchog stobs las byung bar ltos/_/phung po khams kyi sgra dag dang /_/bden pa bzhi yi sgra dag gis/_/thams cad kun ni go mdzad pa/_/thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung /_/nga yi rdzu 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/mkha' las mig zad mtha' dag dang /_/rab zhi'i sgra ni thos gyur te/_/skye ba'i mtha' yang de bzhin no/_/nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/mkha' las mig ni rgyu dang rkyen/_/de las skye yang 'gro 'ong med/_/de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/_/nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/mkha' las mig zhi rtogs byed na/_/
[\[225a.2\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyang de las skyes/_/de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/_/nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/mkha' las mig zad mtha' zhi bas/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/_/de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/_/nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/mkha' las mig mtha' rab zhi bas/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/_/de 
[\[225a.3\]]skad du ni thos par 'gyur/_/nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/mkha' las mig skye mtha' zhi pas/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/_/de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/_/nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/mkha' las mig 'jug rab zhi na/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/_/
[\[225a.4\]]de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/_/nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/mkha' las mig ni skye zhi bas/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/_/de skad du ni thos par 'gyur/_/nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/mkha' las mig dben rab zhi bas/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes/_/de skad 
[\[225a.5\]]du ni thos par 'gyur/_/rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/_/thams cad kun kyang de bzhin no/_/'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang /_/'chab dang phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang /_/khengs dang nga rgyal la sogs pa/_/rgya cher bshad 
[\[225a.6\]]pa'ang de bzhin no/_/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas de lta bu'i chos khyad par du 'phags pa thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar te/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sang gi gdugs la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_'khor 
[\[225a.7\]]mang po dang bcas par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/_thugs brtse bar dgongs te bdag gis sbyar ba'i gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu de'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang /_sems can tshad med pa rnams 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]la yang phan pa mdzad par 'gyur bar thugs kyis mkhyen nas thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_rab tu dga' 
[\[225b.2\]]bas rang gi khyim du song ste/_rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor dar gyi lding khang bres te lding khang de yang shin tu mtho zhing rgya che la thams cad kun du khyab pa/_
[\[225b.3\]]gser gyi tsong tsong dra bar bres pa/_nor bu rin po che'i phreng ba sbyangs pa/_seng ge'i ba dan dang /_gser gyi phreng ba lu gu rgyud can 'bum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog kha dog khyad par du 'phags pa'i phreng ba'i phung po dag gcal du bkram mo/_/
[\[225b.4\]]me tog tsam pa ka dang a ti mug ta la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba tshad med grangs med pa yang rin po che'i lding khang gi nang thams cad dang /_'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun tu khyab par sbyangs shing rgyan du bres so/_/gzhan yang de'i nang du khri stan rnams bshams nas/_
[\[225b.5\]]rin po che'i spos phyi li ka dang /_du ma tsa dang /_tsan dan dang /_gur gum rnam par dag cing yid dga' bar byed pa sna tshogs bsregs so/_/de bzhin du sbyar spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyang mchod pa'i yo byad du sbyar to/_/gzhan yang spos kyi chus lam srang rnams kun tu khyab 
[\[225b.6\]]par chag chag btab bo/_/sa gzhi kun du me tog sna tshogs gcal du bkram mo/_/de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang /_sgra gcan zin gyi bu mo grangs med tshad med pa yang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/_byang chub kyi rgyu mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir der 
[\[225b.7\]]'ongs nas grong khyer chen po khyad par du 'phags pa de rab tu brgyan to/_/de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa grong khyer de kun du khyab par brgyan cing yongs su dag pa dang gdugs tshod la bab par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]rnams la sman par mdzad pa'i slad du grong khyer chen por gshegs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu grong khyer du gshegs nas sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu grong khyer chen po de'i sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/_
[\[226a.2\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur te/_de'i tshe long ba dag ni gzugs mthong bar gyur/_sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba thob par gyur/_'on pa rnams ni sgra thos par gyur/_byad bzhin mi sdug pa rnams ni byad bzhin bzang po 
[\[226a.3\]]thob par gyur/_nor med pa rnams ni nor dang ldan par gyur/_bu med pa rnams ni bu yod par gyur/_gos med pa rnams ni gos thob par gyur/_rin po che med pa rnams ni rin po che thob par gyur/_nye bshes med pa rnams ni nye bshes dang ldan par gyur/_lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis phongs 
[\[226a.4\]]pa rnams ni lus kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/_/gzhan yang ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_ne tso dang /_rma bya dang /_ka ri ka la sogs pa bya'i tshogs mang po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba mchog dam pa 
[\[226a.5\]]phyung ste/_gang gis sgra de dag thos pa yang yid shin tu bde bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsam pa ka'i ljon shing tshad med pa snyed mngon par sprul pas/_sems can brgya stong mang po rnams me tog yongs su dag pa de dag dang /_gzhan yang spos 
[\[226a.6\]]mchog dam pa thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byas so/_/gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang phyug thob pa brgya stong du ma mu tig dmar po dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma thogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' bas mngon par gtor to/_/lha ma 
[\[226a.7\]]yin mang po dang /_gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che'i gdugs gser dang /_dngul gyis rab tu brgyan pa thogs nas bar snang la 'dug ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du khebs par g.yogs so/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsan dan 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]gyi ljon shing dang /_gser gyi ljon shing dang /_rin po che'i snod dang /_gos la sogs pa'i ljon shing brgya stong tshad med dpag tu med pa rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/_me tog dang /_lo ma phun sum tshogs shing rgyas pa/_sems can tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[226b.2\]]thun mong du mngon par grub pa/_rlung gi ngad langs pa tsam gyis spos mchog dam pa'i dris sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams kun tu khyab par gang ba mngon par sprul to/_/sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang dus gcig tu me tog thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 
[\[226b.3\]]gtor to/_/de bzhin du sems can ma yin pa tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa sha stag go_/gang dag ci dang ci smon pa de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang gis de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur 
[\[226b.4\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad nam mkha' la khyad par du 'phags pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par ston pa'i sgra thos par gyur kyang de gang nas byung ba shes par yang ma gyur la tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong du mas kyang 
[\[226b.5\]]chos rnams yang dag par bstan par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/'dod chags zad mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa/_/yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer 
[\[226b.6\]]zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/'dod chags skye mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa/_/yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/'dod chags mtha' ni 
[\[226b.7\]]stong dben gang rtogs pa/_/yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/'dod chags rab zhi stong dben gang rtogs pa/_/yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/bcom 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/'dod chags 'jug pa stong dben gang rtogs pa/_/yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/
[\[227a.2\]]'dod chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs pa/_/yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/'dod chags skye med stong dben gang rtogs pa/_/yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[227a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/'dod chags rab 'gog stong dben gang rtogs pa/_/yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab ser sna/_/g.yo sgyu khengs dang nga rgyal mya ngan dang /_/sdug 
[\[227a.4\]]bsngal kun 'byung 'gog pa lam sems can/_/khye'u dang bu mo bud med dag dang ni/_/skyes pa gso ba dag dang dbang po drug_/yul drug 'byung chen bzhi yi dngos po dang /_/'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po khams dag dang /_/'jig rten skye sgra ming sogs kyang de bzhin/_/chos rje dam 
[\[227a.5\]]pa'i chos ni bstan pas na/_/sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur/_/lha yi 'jig rten kun kyang thos gyur nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg la gnas par mos/_/bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/bcom ldan sbyin stobs dag la 
[\[227a.6\]]rab mos pas/_/sbyin pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/bcom ldan tshul khrims rnam dag rab mos pas/_/tshul khrims rnam dag stobs kyis byang chub brnyes/_/bcom ldan 'das ni grong 
[\[227a.7\]]khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/bcom ldan bzod pa dag la rab mos pas/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/bcom ldan brtson 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]'grus dag la rab mos pas/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/bcom ldan bsam gtan dag la rab mos pas/_/bsam gtan stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/_/bcom ldan 
[\[227b.2\]]'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par gyur/_/bcom ldan shes rab dag la rab mos pas/_/shes rab stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par gyur/_/rdzu 'phrul mngon shes yon tan gnas shes stobs/_/thabs dang gzungs kyi stobs dang grags pa'i stobs/_/
[\[227b.3\]]las dang rten 'byung yan lag dad dang thos/_/stong dang 'thun pa'i stobs dang rab zhi stobs/_/rab dul yang dag mtha' dang dben mkhas stobs/_/'jigs dang dga' dang phan 'dogs la mos dang /_/byams dang snying rje dga' snyoms bzod 'tshe med/_/stong dang mtshan ma med sogs kyang de bzhin/_/
[\[227b.4\]]stobs bcu 'phags pa'i mnga' bdag lha yi gtso/_/yon tan grags pa dpe zla ma mchis pa/_/grong khyer mchog gshegs zhabs ni bzhag pa'i tshe/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher phan pa mdzad/_/sngon chad srid gsum las dge rab bsgrubs pas/_/lha yi dge ba sna tshogs 'phel bar mdzad/_/
[\[227b.5\]]'jig rten thams cad kyis ni rab tu bkur/_/nga yi bstan pa 'di thos thams cad dga'/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs nas zhabs bzhag tshe/_/grong khyer sa chen dag ni rab tu g.yos/_/bcom ldan rnam dag 'od zer mthong bas na/_/ngo mtshar mi 'dzin mi dga' gang yang med/_/bcom ldan grong 
[\[227b.6\]]gshegs phan pa cher mdzad pas/_/lha mi'i 'khor rnams sems ni dga' bar gyur/_/sa dang mkha' 'gro dag gis srid gsum na/_/bcom ldan shin tu bde zhes bsngags par gyur/_/bcom ldan zhabs kyi 'khor lo sa bzhag tshe/_/rnam dag 'od zer kun gsal ngo mtshar gyur/_/rta ni cang 
[\[227b.7\]]shes grong khyer sgra snyan phyung /_/bya tshogs dag kyang mkha' las rab tu dga'/_/gzhan yang rab dang bud med mang po yi/_/lag dang rkang dang gdub 'khor phreng ba dang /_/de bzhin rin chen rgyan ni sna tshogs las/_/ma dkrol ba yang rang las sgra snyan byung /_/so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]brjod cing /_/skad 'thun bkra shis mchog gis bsngags pa brjod/_/'on long dbang po ma tshang dbang po thob/_/thams cad bcom ldan khyad 'phags 'bras bu dbang /_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs tshe kun dga' bas/_/lha mis me tog mngon par mchod pa byas/_/mkha' las 
[\[228a.2\]]kun du sgra snyan byung bas na/_/lha tshogs tshad med rab tu dga' bar gyur/_/gzhan yang sems can dran pa nyams pa dag_/smyos 'khrugs rab zhi phan tshun gtam snyan brjod/_/bud med gang sbrum mya ngan 'jigs gyur pa/_/'od zer byin gyis bde ba thob par gyur/_/skyes pa bud med ngo tsha khrel 
[\[228a.3\]]bcas la/_/dri ma spangs pa'i chos dag rab bshad pas/_/thams cad dga' nas dag pa'i sems bskyed de/_/thub mchog zhabs la spyi btud phyag byas nas/_/kha cig bcom ldan bla med lam rab tshol/_/kha cig byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos tshol/_/bcom ldan grong khyer mchog tu 
[\[228a.4\]]gshegs pas na/_/bcom ldan zhal du lta zhing rang nyid dga'/_/bcom ldan mkhyen pas sa yi spyod rtogs pas/_/'jig rten rjes 'thun phan pa rab tu mdzad/_/chos kyi nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byin/_/rin chen mchog ni sems can rnams la btang /_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs 
[\[228a.5\]]pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung /_/gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/_/sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad byung /_/gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa/_/sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin/_/gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred 
[\[228a.6\]]pa/_/sangs rgyas yid ches mi 'jigs 'thob/_/mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/_/shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/_/gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/_/chos la yid ches mi 'jigs 'thob/_/mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/_/shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/_/gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/_/
[\[228a.7\]]dge 'dun yid ches mi 'jigs 'thob/_/mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/_/shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/_/gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/_/tshul khrims 'dzin med thob par 'gyur/_/mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/_/shin tu dang ba rgyun mi 'chad/_/gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/_/
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]ngan 'gro'i 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur/_/mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/_/'dod chags rgyun ni spong bar byed/_/gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/_/ngan 'gro'i zhe sdang spong bar 'gyur/_/mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/_/zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed/_/gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/_/ngan 'gro'i gti mug spong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[228b.2\]]mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/_/gti mug rgyun ni spong bar byed/_/gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa/_/byang chub ye shes dag la gnas/_/mig zad mthar ni lta bas na/_/byang chub ye shes rgyun mi 'chad/_/mig skye mtha' dang mig gi mtha'/_/'jug pa dang ni rab dben dang /_/yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur dang /_/
[\[228b.3\]]mi skye rab tu zhi ba dang /_/'di la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyang /_/thams cad mig zad 'dra bar bstan/_/gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa/_/de ni rtag tu the tshom med/_/de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa/_/de ni rtag tu the tshom med/_/de 
[\[228b.4\]]ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig gi mtha' srid pa/_/de ni rtag tu the tshom med/_/de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig gi 'jug sred pa/_/de ni rtag tu the tshom med/_/de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/_/
[\[228b.5\]]sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mi dben rab sred pa/_/de ni rtag tu the tshom med/_/de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig mi skye sred pa/_/de ni rtag tu the tshom med/_/de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[228b.6\]]gang zhig mig med la sred pa/_/de ni rtag tu the tshom med/_/de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zhi la sred pa/_/de ni rtag tu the tshom med/_/de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur/_/rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/gzugs 
[\[228b.7\]]sgra dri ro reg bya nas/_/sgra dang ming gi bar du yang /_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/mig skye dpag med gang skyed pa/_/ye shes dpag med skyed par byed/_/ye shes dpag tu med pa'i phyir/_/chos 'di bstan pa'ang de bzhin no/_/mig zad dpag med gang shes pa/_/mig la sgrib pa med par 'gyur/_/de ltar sgrib 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]pa med pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thogs med 'thob/_/rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/_/sgra dang ming gi bar du yang /_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mkha' las chos bshad sgra 
[\[229a.2\]]thos pas/_/sangs rgyas yon tan the tshom med/_/kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang /_/sangs rgyas ye shes 'jigs mi byed/_/gang zhig 'dod chags sems byung yang /_/sangs rgyas yon tan stor ma gyur/_/kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang /_/bla med ye shes tshol byed cing /_/ma 'dres chos ni 
[\[229a.3\]]bsgrub pa dang /_/nyan thos theg pa mos mi byed/_/byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang /_/bsam gtan bde la mos pas na/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab bskyed nas/_/dge sbyong 'bras bu thob snyam sems/_/byis pa bsam gtan sgom byed kyang /_/mi zad mtha' yi shes med na/_/bskal pa brgya stong sgom 
[\[229a.4\]]byed kyang /_/de la rnam grol ci yang med/_/skye ba len pa thams cad ni/_/de la zhen chags skyed par byed/_/gal te skye nyid stong rig na/_/mthong ba rnams ni rnam dag 'gyur/_/gang zhig bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs kyang /_/mig zad mtha' shes med gyur na/_/bskal pa brgya stong lon yang ni/_/bsam gtan 
[\[229a.5\]]yongs su dag mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig nyer bsdogs thob gyur kyang /_/zad mtha' shes pa 'thob mi 'gyur/_/zad pa thob pa ma shes phyir/_/zag pa thob la rtag tu spyod/_/gang zhig 'du shes zhen byed pa/_/'du shes zad mtha'i shes pa med/_/'du shes zad pa ma shes phyir/_/rtag tu 'du shes zag la spyod/_/
[\[229a.6\]]gang zhig 'jig rten zhen chags pa/_/'jig rten zad mtha' shes pa med/_/'jig rten zad mtha' ma shes phyir/_/rtag tu 'jig rten zag la spyod/_/gang zhig zag bcas sems la gnas/_/sems zad mtha' yi shes pa med/_/sems zad pa ni ma shes phyir/_/rtag tu sems ni zag la spyod/_/gang 
[\[229a.7\]]zhig zag bcas chos la gnas/_/chos zad mtha' yi shes pa med/_/chos zad pa ni ma shes phyir/_/rtag tu zag bcas chos la spyod/_/sbyangs pa'i chos la gnas gyur kyang /_/mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/_/mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/_/yang dag sbyangs la gnas pa min/_/kha dog sgyur ba'i 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]gos bgos kyang /_/mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/_/mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/_/yang dag chos gos bgos ma yin/_/ya rabs rigs su skyes gyur kyang /_/mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/_/mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/_/de ni dag pa'i rigs ma yin/_/'khor mang dag ni bdog gyur kyang /_/mig zad mtha' yi 
[\[229b.2\]]shes med na/_/myur du ngan 'gror lhung 'gyur te/_/'khor dag gis ni skyob mi nus/_/sgra yi rig pa mkhas gyur kyang /_/mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/_/mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/_/sgra yi rig pa rtogs ma yin/_/bzo rnams la ni mkhas gyur kyang /_/mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/_/mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir/_/
[\[229b.3\]]de ni bzo la mkhas ma yin/_/'dri ba mang la mkhas gyur cing /_/yi ge gcig gis rnam 'byed kyang /_/mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/_/de ni don 'thun bshad ma yin/_/mkhas pa'i rjes su slob byed kyang /_/gsang dang gsang min mi shes shing /_/mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/_/chos 'di rtogs par mi 'gyur 
[\[229b.4\]]ro/_/brjod pa sna tshogs rgyang pan dang /_/chos rnams rab tu shes gyur kyang /_/mig zad mtha' yi shes med na/_/'khri shing stug por lhung ba 'dra/_/sgra yi rig pa mkhas gyur cing /_/dge dang mi dge'i rtags ston dang /_/tshig 'bru yi ge sgra skad dang /_/klog dang 'don pa'i mthar thug kyang /_/mig zad mtha' ni ma shes 
[\[229b.5\]]na/_/de dag rnams ni shes med yin/_/bud med dag gi mtshan ma dang /_/tshig mkhan rmongs par byed pa dang /_/lus mnyes ngal sos chos rnams dang /_/mkhyud dpyad dag la mkhas gyur kyang /_/mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/_/de dag rnams ni shes med yin/_/gzhung lugs brgya mang ston byed cing /_/yi ge 'bru gcig mi brjed kyang /_/
[\[229b.6\]]mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/_/bshad pa de ni don med yin/_/de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang /_/mig mtha' dang ni 'jug pa nas/_/rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang /_/de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/_/rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/_/sgra dang ming gi bar du yang /_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/sgra yi rig pa klog 'don cing /_/
[\[229b.7\]]de yi don ni rtogs gyur kyang /_/mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/_/de ni nam yang dman pa yin/_/smrang gzhi dag ni 'don byed cing /_/gsang sngags dag ni rtogs gyur kyang /_/mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na/_/de ni nam yang dman pa yin/_/de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang /_/mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas/_/rab tu zhi ba'i bar 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]du yang /_/de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/_/rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/_/sgra dang ming gi bar du yang /_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//_//bam po bzhi pa/_bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/_/mkha' las chos bstan sgra 
[\[230a.2\]]thos pas/_/mig zad mtha' yi shes pa thob/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/sems can dag ni tshad med snyed/_/mkha' las chos bstan sgra thos pas/_/mig gi rang bzhin rtogs par gyur/_/stong dang bdag med rab rtogs pas/_/thams cad rnam dag mig thob 'gyur/_/rna ba sna lce lus 
[\[230a.3\]]dang yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/_/sgra dang ming gi bar du yang /_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/'dod sdang gti mug khong khro dang /_/nga rgyal khengs dang g.yo sgyu nas/_/bag med pa yi bar du yang /_/de bzhin du ni rig par gyis/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/sems can dag ni tshad med 
[\[230a.4\]]snyed/_/steng gi nam mkha' dag las ni/_/sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos/_/kha cig 'dod chags 'jigs pa yi/_/dpe zla med pa ming yang thos/_/kha cig zhe sdang 'jigs byed cing /_/'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos/_/kha cig gti mug rab rtogs shing /_/nga rgyal 'dul ba'i ming 
[\[230a.5\]]dag thos/_/kha cig 'jig rten dag la ni/_/rab zhi ston pa'i 'dren ming thos/_/kha cig shes rab dag bstan nas/_/'jig rten phan 'dogs ming dag thos/_/kha cig thabs dag rab bstan nas/_/sems can phan 'dogs ming dag thos/_/kha cig bdud ni rab btul kyang /_/'khon 'dzin med pa'i ming 
[\[230a.6\]]dag thos/_/kha cig gsung rab chos dag gis/_/rnam grol bstan pa'i ming dag thos/_/kha cig sems can sdug bsngal ba/_/rgya cher sgrol ba'i ming dag thos/_/kha cig mi yi gtso bo yis/_/'jig rten sgrol ba'i ming dag thos/_/ming ni de dag thos gyur nas/_/thams 
[\[230a.7\]]cad rnam dag mig thob gyur/_/nam mkha' dang ni rgya mtsho'i chu/_/ri rab lhun po'i bar du yang /_/thams cad gzhal du rung srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thub mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig zad nges pa thob gyur na/_/chos sku mngon par 'grub pa dka' mi 'gyur/_/
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na/_/kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob/_/des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur pas/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa dka' mi 'gyur/_/
[\[230b.2\]]gang zhig mig skye nges pa thob gyur na/_/chos sku mngon par 'grub pa dka' mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na/_/kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med thob/_/des ni mdo sde dpag med go bar 'gyur/_/
[\[230b.3\]]gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur pas/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa dka' mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos dag nas/_/sgra rnams dang ni ming gi bar du yang /_/thams cad de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya/_/de tshe sa chen dag ni rab 
[\[230b.4\]]tu g.yos/_/rgya mtsho ri rnams kyang ni de bzhin no/_/lha ma yin dang lha ni mang po rnams/_/thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes par gyur/_/bdud dang bdud dpung g.yo sgyu rab bcom nas/_/thams cad sangs rgyas bkod pa bsgrub par mos/_/lha rnams so sor gzhal med khang 
[\[230b.5\]]zhugs nas/_/phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam ni 'di skad smras/_/'dren pa deng ni 'jig rten byung bas na/_/lha mi thams cad la ni phan pa mdzad/_/sa bla'i lha 'khor gzhal med khang gnas nas/_/dang ba'i sems kyis dga' nas 'di skad du/_/'dren pa 'jig rten deng byung 
[\[230b.6\]]shin tu legs/_/'jig rten kun bde rgyu ni rab tu mdzad/_/mkha' la spyod pa'i lha rnams de thos nas/_/thams cad dga' nas rab tu dang ba skyes/_/khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/_/'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/_/rgyal chen 
[\[230b.7\]]rigs bzhi'i lha rnams de thos nas/_/thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes/_/khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/_/'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lhas ni de thos nas/_/thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]skyes/_/khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/_/'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/_/'thab bral lha dag de skad thos nas ni/_/thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/_/khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/_/
[\[231a.2\]]'dren pa byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/_/bdag cag byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas/_/bcom ldan bla med mkhyen pa nye bar bgyi/_/lha mi'i gtso mchog la ni brten nas su/_/sems can thams cad sgrol bar bgyid ces zer/_/dga' ldan lha rnams de skad thos 
[\[231a.3\]]nas kyang /_/thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/_/khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/_/'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bye bar ni/_/spyod mchog khyad 'phags dpag med mngon bsgrubs nas/_/
[\[231a.4\]]sems can sdug bsngal ba la bde lam bstan/_/'khor ba bsgral nas mya ngan 'das la bkod/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams de skad thos nas ni/_/thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/_/khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/_/'dren pa byung bas 'jig 
[\[231a.5\]]rten phan mdzad zer/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lhas ni de thos nas/_/thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/_/khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas/_/'dren pa byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye shi 'das pas na/_/bdud 
[\[231a.6\]]dang mu stegs mang po pham par mdzad/_/bla med byang chub dag ni yongs rdzogs nas/_/skye dgu drangs nas pha rol 'jog ces zer/_/tshangs ris lha rnams de skad thos nas kyang /_/thams cad dga' nas shin du dang ba skyes/_/khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod 
[\[231a.7\]]nas/_/'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzad zer/_/de bzhin gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos pas/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas 'di skad du/_/'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad/_/bdud dpung 'jigs skrag mya ngan byed ces zer/_/srid pa'i rtse mo'i lha yi 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]bar du yang /_/sangs rgyas byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad thos/_/de bzhin sgra ni kun du grags pas na/_/lha ma yin dag 'gribs shing lha rnams 'phel/_/bdud kyi khang pa dag ni yongs stongs shing /_/lha rnams 'khor ni rab tu rgyas par gyur/_/mi 'jigs stobs kyis log 
[\[231b.2\]]pa rab btul nas/_/byang chub chen po mchog ni myur du brnyes/_/de bzhin skad cig yud tsam lha rnams kyis/_/bcom ldan byung nas phan mdzad thos gyur nas/_/'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa shin du legs/_/rnam dag mig ni sems can sbyin zhes zer/_/bcom ldan grong khyer 
[\[231b.3\]]gshegs pa'i tshe/_/'dod pas yongs su gdungs pa rnams/_/mi gtsang bsgom pa bshad thos pas/_/'dod chags zhi ste ma lus spangs/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/zhe sdang dag gis gdungs pa rnams/_/byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas/_/zhe sdang zhi 
[\[231b.4\]]ste ma lus spangs/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/gti mug dag gis gdungs pa rnams/_/shes rab chos ni bstan thos pas/_/gti mug zhi ste ma lus spangs/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/nga rgyal dag gis gdungs pa rnams/_/nga rgyal spangs 
[\[231b.5\]]pa'i chos thos pas/_/nga rgyal zhi ste ma lus spangs/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/phrag dog dag gis gdungs pa rnams/_/phrag dog spangs pa'i chos thos pas/_/phrag dog zhi ste ma lus spangs/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/khong khro dag gis gdungs pa 
[\[231b.6\]]rnams/_/khong khro spangs pa'i chos thos pas/_/khong khro zhi ste ma lus spangs/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/ser sna dag gis gdungs pa rnams/_/ser sna spangs pa'i chos thos pas/_/ser sna zhi ste ma lus spangs/_/gang zhig dul ba'i spyod grub pa/_/
[\[231b.7\]]dpag med chos ni 'di thos pas/_/mang du thos pa'i mtshor zhugs nas/_/kun 'dzin sgo ni sgrub par byed/_/gzhan yang mkha' las sgra thos pas/_/me tog dag gis sangs rgyas mchod/_/yon tan khyad par 'phags sgrub cing /_/snying rje chen po'i rdzu 'phrul ston/_/gzhan yang 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]mkha' las sgra thos pas/_/bcom ldan sku dang skye gnas dang /_/gdung rgyud dang ni gsung sgra rnams/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i bsngags pa brjod/_/sems can 'gro ba ji lta bar/_/rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci rigs bshad/_/mig dang rna ba sna lce lus/_/
[\[232a.2\]]gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa dang /_/bskum pa dang ni brkyang ba dag_/ston par mdzad pa khyad par 'phags/_/bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pas na/_/'jig rten sgron ma rab mdzad cing /_/gzugs ni mang po ston pa yang /_/thams cad sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yin/_/
[\[232a.3\]]snod dang snod min de rjes su/_/mi 'thun chos ni ston mdzad pas/_/sems can tshe rabs tshad med nas/_/sangs rgyas mchod pa ma byas shing /_/dmu rgod gdul bar dka' ba la/_/sems can dmyal bar bshad par mdzad/_/gang zhig las lam rmongs gyur cing /_/
[\[232a.4\]]lta la brten nas spros dga' ba/_/bcom ldan de dag lta ba dang /_/spros pa zhi ba'i sgra thos mdzad/_/gzhan yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid/_/nges pa nyid du stong pa dang /_/'gro 'ong med cing mtshan med dang /_/ci yang med pa'i sgra yang thos/_/gzhan yang sems can brgya 
[\[232a.5\]]stong dag_/mkha' las sha dang shes rab spyan/_/de bzhin chos kyi spyan bar du/_/yang dag ston pa'i sgra yang thos/_/bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab sgra/_/rnam grol rnam grol mthong ba'i sgra/_/ston pa dag kyang thos par 
[\[232a.6\]]gyur/_/sems can dag ni ji snyed la/_/ji bzhin rdzu 'phrul rab bstan nas/_/ji ltar rjes 'thun sgra skad kyis/_/yang dag chos ni bstan par mdzad/_/sems can la la gang zhig ni/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod bsgrub mos/_/rdzu 'phrul mos pa ji lta bzhin/_/
[\[232a.7\]]sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sgra ston/_/bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/sems can dbang po ji lta bzhin/_/rgya cher yang dag 'byed mdzad pas/_/len 'dzin ston la dgod par mdzad/_/bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/phung po khams dang skye mched 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]kyi/_/bcings dang grol dang nye ring dang /_/sa yi gnas skabs bye brag gi/_/mtshan nyid ston pa thos par gyur/_/gzhan yang sa dang ye shes kyi/_/'od zer tshad med ston pa dang /_/nyon mongs bag chags spangs pa dang /_/spangs min ston pa thos par gyur/_/bcom 
[\[232b.2\]]ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/lha dang mi yi ngo bo nyid/_/las dang 'bras bu mi mtshungs pas/_/skye len tha dad thos par gyur/_/res 'ga' bud med mdun dag tu/_/bud med brgyan pa'i lus sprul nas/_/mkha' las skyo ston sgra bsgrags pas/_/gang thos 'dod 
[\[232b.3\]]chags sel bar mdzad/_/shA ri'i bu ni ji lta bzhin/_/shin du dang ba skyes gyur pa/_/thugs rjes mos pa ji bzhin du/_/bla med chos ni ston par mdzad/_/maud gal bu dang 'od srung dang /_/ka pi na dang kun dga' dang /_/'od srung chen po dag dang ni/_/kun shes 
[\[232b.4\]]kau di n+ya la sogs/_/de dag mos pa ji bzhin du/_/nyan thos chos ston thos par gyur/_/lha rnams dang ni lha ma yin/_/gnod sbyin dag ni mang po dang /_/be ro ka ni 'khor bcas dang /_/grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams/_/bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni/_/gzungs 
[\[232b.5\]]sngags sgra ni thos par gyur/_/i di si/_bi di si/_i ra su/_i ra/_au na si/_/ma na si/_u khyi/_a no khyi/_A khi tsa la mang naM ye/_dar ni sh+tha ni mi/_ta ka ni/_e mi man tra/_ni ha ra/_a bu re/_bud d+he/_ni re/_a khi tsha ra/_bi ya ki ri ya te/_a khi tsha ra ba ra mi te/_
[\[232b.6\]]ka lA ba hi ni/_sarbo bing shi ni ra d+he pau na/_pa ra sha sad te/_sha sa ta/_pa ra sha sad ta/_ta ra sad ta/_b+hU mi/_A ma b+ha ra/_li la b+ha na/_shi tsa tsid ta/_pi ba ma ti/_tsid ta a nan ta/_o be ra ha ba mi ta b+hu mi/_na na ma kA ni/_a ka ni bi b+hi mid te/_sha ri bi sh+tha/_a ma la ni ma 
[\[232b.7\]]lA/_bU li te na ra shi tsa/_ha ha ri/_ma ma lI/_b+ha ra ni ti sh+tha/_tsa k+Shu nir ha ra/_u d+ha ri ta pa tsi/_an ta ri/_ku ta ri/_ke tu su ke tu su pa ri ni/_ka ra ni/_ku su ma ni yai/_ka ka ri/_ka kha ri/_u pa la mU ri/_ti sh+thang ra ni/_nAg ni ra ha re/_pa ra lad te/_a te pa ra ya te/_an 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]ta rab+han d+he/_an ta ra ta b+ha ti shi tsa/_ha si ra/_ma kha li/_I ni sam b+ha re/_ti sh+tha sit+ta ra ni/_ku b+hu lo tsa te/_gzhan yang rgyal po rnam thos bu/_/yul 'khor srung ni la sogs pas/_/khyad 'phags sgra ni grangs med kyis/_/bden pa'i sngags tshig rab tu 
[\[233a.2\]]smras/_/tshad med sgra ni de dag kyang /_/bde gshegs rdzu 'phrul dbang gis byung /_/rdzu 'phrul dag ni tshad med pas/_/bstan pa dag kyang tshad med pas/_/res 'ga' sangs rgyas med zhing du/_/rdzu 'phrul rol ba'i stobs dag gis/_/'khor bskor sangs rgyas sku ston pa/_/
[\[233a.3\]]da ltar mthong ba ji bzhin no/_/bsam gyis mi khyab zhing dag tu/_/sprul pa tshad med ston mdzad pas/_/bltams nas gom pa bdun gshegs dang /_/rgyal srid spangs nas rab byung dang /_/byang chub snying por sangs rgyas nas/_/brnyes pa'i chos dag rab dgongs te/_/chos 
[\[233a.4\]]kyi 'khor lo skor mdzad dang /_/mya ngan 'das pa ston par mdzad/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis/_/sna tshogs chos ni ston mdzad pas/_/sems can dag ni tshad med rnams/_/khyad 'phags ye shes grub par mdzad/_/de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor 
[\[233a.5\]]gyis yongs bskor nas/_/byams chos bsgom pa bshad bstan pas/_/byams pa'i sems ni 'phel bar mdzad/_/de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/_/lha rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas/_/bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi bstan mdzad pas/_/bsdu ba'i spyod bzhi 'phel 
[\[233a.6\]]bar mdzad/_/de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/_/klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas/_/zhe sdang nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas/_/zhe sdang sems ni spangs par gyur/_/de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/_/rnam 'tshe nyes dmigs bshad bstan 
[\[233a.7\]]pas/_/rnam 'tshe sems ni spangs bar gyur/_/de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/_/lha ma yin gyis yongs bskor nas/_/'thab pa'i nyes dmigs bshad bstan te/_/bzod pa bsgoms pa'i bsngags pa brjod/_/de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/_/nam mkha' lding gis yongs bskor 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]nas/_/'gal byas nyes dmigs bshad bstan te/_/'dum pa'i sems kyis bsngags pa mdzad/_/de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/_/dri za'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/_/dga' ba'i tshig ni dpag med kyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags brjod bstan/_/de 
[\[233b.2\]]tshe thugs rje chen po yis/_/lto 'phye 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/_/mu stegs chos la smod mdzad cing /_/bcom ldan gsung rab bsngags brjod bstan/_/de tshe thugs rje chen po yis/_/'dre srin 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 
[\[233b.3\]]mchog_/rgya cher bsngags pa bstan par mdzad/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mig zad mtha' bstan thos pas na/_/mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya 
[\[233b.4\]]stong snyed/_/mig skye mtha' ni bstan thos pas/_/mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mig gi mtha' ni bstan thos pas/_/mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan 
[\[233b.5\]]pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mig 'jug bstan pa thos gyur nas/_/mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mig dben bstan pa thos pas na/_/mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 
[\[233b.6\]]gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mig la skye med bstan thos pas/_/mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mig med bstan pa thos pas na/_/
[\[233b.7\]]mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mig ni nyer zhi bstan thos pas/_/mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]mig la bdag med bstan thos pas/_/mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mig la gang zag med thos pas/_/mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 
[\[234a.2\]]'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mig la sems can med thos pas/_/mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mig la srog med thos pas na/_/mthar phyin don 
[\[234a.3\]]ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/mig la gso ba med thos pas/_/mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/'jig rten 
[\[234a.4\]]zhen pa rab smad de/_/zhen pa mi skyed nyid du mdzad/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/'jig rten rnyed pa rab smad de/_/'dus ma byas kyi bsngags brjod mdzad/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/
[\[234a.5\]]sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/zag bcas shes pa rab smad de/_/zag med shes rab bsngags par mdzad/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/'jig rten bsam gtan rab smad de/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 
[\[234a.6\]]'dzin bsngags/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/zag bcas tshul khrims rab smad de/_/zag med bslab gnas bsngags par mdzad/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/
[\[234a.7\]]sems rgya chung ngu'i skyon brjod de/_/sems rgya chen po'i yon tan bsngags/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/lus kyi tshul khrims sems shes rab/_/zag med rten pa med pa yi/_/bsngags pa dag ni brjod par mdzad/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]bstan nas/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam bsngags shing /_/spros la dga' zhing zhen pa dag_/sangs rgyas smad par rab tu bstan/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/mig zad skyon ni rab 'byed cing /_/rab zhi mtshan 
[\[234b.2\]]nyid bstan par mdzad/_/rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/_/sgra dang ming gi bar du yang /_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/dar la bab cing gzhon pa la/_/nyes 
[\[234b.3\]]dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/cho rigs dag ni snyems pa la/_/nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya 
[\[234b.4\]]cher ni/_/longs spyod bag med gyur pa la/_/nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/rang dbang bag med gyur pa la/_/nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/_/thugs rje 
[\[234b.5\]]chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/gzugs kyis bag med gyur pa la/_/nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/bud med bag med gyur pa la/_/nyes 
[\[234b.6\]]dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/gos kyis bag med gyur pa la/_/nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/_/thug rje chen po 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher 
[\[234b.7\]]ni/_/chang gis bag med gyur pa la/_/nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/rgyal po bag med gyur pa la/_/nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/tshul khrims snyems par gyur pa la/_/nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can rnams la rgya cher ni/_/shes rab snyems par gyur pa la/_/nyes 
[\[235a.2\]]dmigs dpag med yod par bstan/_/de bzhin rtogs dang rdzu 'phrul dang /_/bsam gtan mkhas pa'i nga rgyal dang /_/nor dang bshad dang rigs dang 'khor/_/rol mo glu dang lce rgyang dang /_/grags pa phun tshogs bsngags pa dang /_/bkur sti dang ni rnyed pa dang /_/
[\[235a.3\]]mdzes dang g.yo sgyu nga rgyal dang /_/ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang /_/khengs dang phun tshogs nga rgyal dang /_/bag med 'dod chags de bzhin no/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can gang zhig sems dang yid/_/dman par gyur pa de dag la/_/khyad par 
[\[235a.4\]]'phags pa'i 'du shes bstan/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can gang zhig rab zhum zhing /_/rtsol bar mi byed de dag la/_/brtson 'grus stobs ni ston par mdzad/_/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas/_/sems can gang zhig nor rnams la/_/
[\[235a.5\]]chags par gyur pa de dag la/_/chog shes chos ni ston par mdzad/_/gzhan yang spos kyi dri gtsang khang /_/me tog dag ni gzhal med khang /_/khang pa brtsegs ma mchog sprul nas/_/sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs par bstan/_/gzhan yang lha yi bu mo rnams/_/me 
[\[235a.6\]]tog tsam pa khang pa na/_/gnas pa'i lus phyed mngon sprul nas/_/me tog phreng thogs mchod byed bstan/_/gzhan yang lha min bu mo dag_/me tog ma li khang pa na/_/gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas/_/me tog phreng thogs mchod byed bstan/_/gzhan yang lha yi bu rnams 
[\[235a.7\]]dag_/pad ma sngon po'i khang pa na/_/gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas/_/sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags pa bstan/_/gzhan yang tshangs pa rnams kyi lha/_/gser gyi gzhal med khang pa na/_/gnas pa lus kun bstan sprul nas/_/sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags pa 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]bstan/_/gzhan yang lha yi bu mo dag_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis lus brgyan cing /_/rgyan ni phan tshun reg pa las/_/sgra snyan dag ni rab byung nas/_/'dus byas rnams kyi chos dag ni/_/'gyur zhing mi brtan yin na yang /_/byis pa mi bden rtog pa yis/_/yang dag 
[\[235b.2\]]ji bzhin mi shes zer/_/rgyan gyi sgra ni de dag kyang /_/lus dang sems las byung ma yin/_/'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med/_/phyogs kyang yod pa ma yin te/_/gzugs dang sems kyi bar du yang /_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/byis pa rnams ni mi shes pas/_/
[\[235b.3\]]'di la the tshom skye bar 'gyur/_/rgyan gyi rnam pa de dag las/_/sgra snyan byung ba de yis ni/_/sangs rgyas zhing kun grags pas na/_/sems can tshad med grol bar gyur/_/de lta bas na khyod rnams kyis/_/'dren pa'i rang byung ye shes dang /_/yon tan dpag med sku dag ni/_/sred 
[\[235b.4\]]pa'i spros las 'das pa dang /_/rab dben skyon ni med pa dang /_/lta bral sems ni rab sbyangs dang /_/mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa dang /_/sku dang thugs ni dag par ltos/_/khyed kyis bcom ldan grong gshegs tshe/_/gom pa dag ni seng ge 'dra/_/gshegs stabs ngang pa 
[\[235b.5\]]glang chen 'dra/_/sems can re ba skong bar mdzad/_/bsod nams khyad 'phags yongs su rdzogs/_/yang dag mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan/_/sems can dag ni thams cad kun/_/lta bas mi ngoms nyid du ltos/_/khyod kyis rkang gnyis gtso yi mchog_/thugs rje chen po ldan 
[\[235b.6\]]pas na/_/dngos po chung ngus mchod byas kyang /_/yon tan tshad med 'thob mdzad pas/_/sems can dag ni mang po rnams/_/bskal pa brgya stong mang por ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa 'thob par du/_/rnam smin thug pa med par ltos/_/khyed kyis rkang gnyis gtso mchog ni/_/zag 
[\[235b.7\]]med tshul khrims rdzogs pas na/_/sems can dag ni mang po rnams/_/gus pas spyi bos phyag byed dang /_/lha yi 'khor ni mang po rnams/_/so so'i gzhal med khang spangs nas/_/rtse ba dag la chags med par/_/'dren pa la ni rten byed ltos/_/khyed kyis bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor/_/
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la dad skyes nas/_/gser gyi rlung yab dag thogs te/_/g.yas g.yon du ni 'khod pa dang /_/bdud kyi bu ni lnga brgya yis/_/lha yi me tog yid 'ong bas/_/de bzhin gshegs la mngon gtor nas/_/bla med ye shes tshol la ltos/_/'das 
[\[236a.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ni/_/bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pas na/_/deng ni bcom ldan phrad gyur nas/_/so sor dga' bar gyur pa yin/_/spobs pa dag ni tshad med kyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod/_/de yi tshe na bdud kyi bu/_/srid pa spangs pa zhes bya ba/_/
[\[236a.3\]]thog mar bcom ldan bsngags brjod nas/_/mig zad mtha' ni shes par gyur/_/mig gi skye mtha' shes pa nas/_/rab zhi mtshan nyid bar du rtogs/_/gzhan yang mig zad la sogs pa'i/_/mig don dag ni dpag med rtogs/_/des na tshig mkhas dag gis ni/_/sems 
[\[236a.4\]]can rnams la yang dag bstan/_/ming dang don rnams la yang ni/_/zhen dang the tshom med pas na/_/'gro 'ong med par rab rtogs shing /_/blang dor med pa nyid du gyur/_/rang bzhin dag ni stong dben pas/_/yi ge rnams ni spangs pa dang /_/len dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang /_/kha 
[\[236a.5\]]ton 'don cing sgrub med rtogs/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/_/sngon yang rab tu phye ste bstan/_/btags pa'i ming tsam yin pas na/_/yang dag brjod du ci yang med/_/rang bzhin stong pa de dag ni/_/phung po khams dang skye mched 'das/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa med cing bden pa'ang 
[\[236a.6\]]med/_/gnas dang gnas pa yod pa min/_/tshig gis smra ba'i lam chad cing /_/sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu zhi/_/skye bo'i mtshan ma zhen pa'i phyir/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs par mthong /_/bcom ldan mtshan ma yongs spangs kyang /_/byis pa yang dag ma yin rtog_/
[\[236a.7\]]bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/gang zhig dga' ba skye 'gyur ba/_/de ni mtshan mar rtog pa ste/_/mya ngan gdung ba dang bcas par 'gyur/_/gang gis mtshan ma'i rtog spangs pa/_/grong khyer gshegs pa mthong mi 'gyur/_/gshegs shing bskyod pa'i mtshan ma la/_/
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]rnam rtog med pa'i shes rab 'thob/_/gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong /_/des ni grong khyer gshegs pa mthong /_/skye zhing 'khor ba'i chos dag la/_/rnam par rtog pa skyed par byed/_/gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan mar mthong /_/dga' ba dag ni skye 'gyur ba/_/de 
[\[236b.2\]]ni bdud kyi spyod la gnas/_/bdud kyi spyod yul snang ba yin/_/gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong /_/de ni 'gyur ba mthong ba yin/_/de ni mya ngan gdungs bcas pas/_/mkhas pas snying brtser bya ba yin/_/chos la thob par gang lta ba/_/de la chos stor mya ngan yod/_/
[\[236b.3\]]sangs rgyas mthong ba skyes pa la/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sdug bsngal yod/_/bskal pa mang po gang bsgoms pas/_/mtshan ma thams cad rtogs pas na/_/grong khyer gshegs par mi rtog cing /_/mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du shes med/_/sems kyi mtshan nyid stong rtogs pa/_/
[\[236b.4\]]sangs rgyas spyod la gnas pas na/_/grong khyer gshegs par mi rtog cing /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i 'du shes med/_/gang gis de ltar rab shes pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong 'gyur zhing /_/ngo bo nyid kyang stong rtogs pas/_/mthar ni skye 'gag ci yang med/_/bcom ldan 
[\[236b.5\]]bskal pa dpag med nas/_/dka' ba rnams ni rab spyad nas/_/ngo bo nyid ni stong mkhyen na/_/byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so/_/bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/_/'khor ni brgya stong mang gis bskor/_/mi dang mi ma yin la sogs/_/dang ba'i sems kyi mchod 
[\[236b.6\]]pa bas/_/gang gis skad cig tsam du ni/_/mig zad mtha' ni rab sems shing /_/mtshan ma rnams ni stong rtogs na/_/'di yi bsod nams de bas 'phags/_/bgrang ba dang ni grangs kyi cha/_/rgyu tsam du yang mi bzod do/_/de bzhin mig gi skye mtha' dang /_/mig gi mtha' 
[\[236b.7\]]dang 'jug pa nas/_/rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang /_/de bzhin du ni rig par bya/_/rna ba sna lce lus dang yid/_/gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas/_/sgra dang ming gi bar du yang /_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/_/grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/_/
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis/_/sa ni kun tu rab tu g.yos/_/ri rnams gang yin de dag kyang /_/thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phyogs/_/lha dang mi ni chos kyi phyir/_/thams cad 'ongs nas gus mchod byas/_/de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/_/grong khyer 
[\[237a.2\]]du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/_/lha yi dbang po mi yi rgyal/_/lha ma yin ni mang po dang /_/gnod sbyin dag ni mang po rnams/_/rang gi grong khyer spangs nas ni/_/bcom ldan spyan sngar 'dus gyur te/_/rab tu dga' bas mchod pa byas/_/de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/_/grong khyer 
[\[237a.3\]]du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/_/gzhan yang rnam pa tha dad pa'i/_/bya yi tshogs ni tshad med pa/_/ne tso dang ni rma bya dang /_/ka la ping ka bya yi rnams/_/bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/yon tan mchog ni mthong bas na/_/thams cad nam mkha' dag la ni/_/rab tu dga' bas rnam 
[\[237a.4\]]par rtse/_/thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/_/sgra snyan dag ni rab tu phyung /_/de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/_/grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang /_/rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis/_/sems can tshad med brgya stong snyed/_/ldongs pa dag 
[\[237a.5\]]ni mthong bar gyur/_/'on pa rnams ni thos par gyur/_/dbang po ma tshang gang yin pa/_/thams cad dbang po tshang bar gyur/_/sdug bsngal la ni gnas pa dag_/thams cad bde ba thob par gyur/_/de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das/_/grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/_/nam 
[\[237a.6\]]mkha' bar snang dag las ni/_/'di skad smra ba thos par gyur/_/gang gis mtshan ma rnams kyis ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs byed pa/_/de yis bcom ldan 'das la ni/_/mchod pa byas zhes brjod mi bya/_/mig zad mtha' yi ngo bo nyid/_/rtogs par yang ni mi 
[\[237a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/mtshan ma rnams ni gang spangs pa/_/yon tan bzhi ni bsags pas na/_/mig zad mtha' yi ngo bo nyid/_/rab tu rtogs par yang 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar mig ni zad pa'i mtha'/_/rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan yang /_/rab 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]tu rtogs par khong du chud/_/mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag la/_/mi 'dzin sbed pa med pa dang /_/mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la/_/rten cing gnas pa med pa dang /_/mig ni rab tu dben pa la/_/g.yo ba'i bsam pa med gyur pa/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong 
[\[237b.2\]]ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la/_/rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /_/mig gi mtha' ni gang yin pa/_/de la yid kyi rtog med dang /_/mig ni rnam par 'jig pa la/_/bstan par bya ba med gyur pa/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong ba nyid 
[\[237b.3\]]du gyur pa yin/_/mig ni med par gyur pa la/_/mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_/mig ni skye ba med pa la/_/yongs su sdud pa med pa dang /_/mig ni rab tu zhi ba la/_/'dzin pa dag ni med gyur pa/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/
[\[237b.4\]]mig ni zad par shes pa'i phyir/_/mtshan rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_/mig gi mtha' ni shes pa'i phyir/_/dbang po dag ni nges gyur dang /_/mig ni skye ba shes pa'i phyir/_/dbang po rang dbang thob gyur pa/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong ba nyid du 
[\[237b.5\]]gyur pa yin/_/mig ni med par rtogs gyur nas/_/gzugs ni khong du chud pa dang /_/mig ni 'jig par rab shes nas/_/chos la so sor rtog pa dang /_/mig ni skye med shes gyur nas/_/lam ni sgrub par gang byed pa/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong 
[\[237b.6\]]ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/mig zad mtha' ni gang yin pa/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/_/las kyi bye brag tha dad pa/_/de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/_/las kyi bye brag tha dad pa/_/rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/
[\[237b.7\]]mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/mig skye mtha' ni gang yin pa/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/_/sdug bsngal bye brag tha dad pa/_/de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal bye brag tha dad pa/_/rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]pa rnams/_/mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/mig gi 'jig pa gang yin pa/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/_/sdug bsngal 'jig pa gang yin pa/_/de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal 'jig pa gang yin pa/_/rab tu rtogs 
[\[238a.2\]]par gyur pa'i phyir/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/mig gi med pa gang yin pa/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/_/mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa/_/de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/_/mtshan ma spangs pa gang yin pa/_/
[\[238a.3\]]rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/mig gi skye med gang yin pa/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/_/bag chags spangs pa gang yin pa/_/de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/_/bag chags spangs 
[\[238a.4\]]pa gang yin pa/_/rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/_des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/gzhan yang mig gi mi rtog nyid/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/_/sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa/_/de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/_/
[\[238a.5\]]sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa/_/rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/gzhan yang mig la yi ge med/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag kyang /_/rab tu rtogs 
[\[238a.6\]]par gyur pa yin/_/sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag ni/_/rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/gzhan yang mig gi mi 'ong nyid/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/_/'dod rnams spangs pa gang 
[\[238a.7\]]yin pa/_/de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/_/'dod rnams spangs pa gang yin pa/_/rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/gzhan yang bsam gtan bsgom pa dag_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/_/nyon mongs 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]spangs pa gang yin pa/_/de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/_/nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa/_/rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/_/mthong ba nyid du gyur pa yin/_/gang zag des ni de bzhin du/_/mig gi sngon mtha' shes pa dang /_/mig 
[\[238b.2\]]gi mi gnas shes pa dang /_/mig gi skye ba shes pa dang /_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul shes pa dang /_/mig gi dman pa shes pa dang /_/mig gi khyad par 'phags shes dang /_/ye shes dman pa shes pa dang /_/rnam dag ye shes shes pa dang /_/tshul khrims rnam dag shes 
[\[238b.3\]]pa dang /_/lus kyi sdom pa'i shes pa dang /_/rnam dag sgra yi shes pa dang /_/ngag gi sdom pa'i shes pa dang /_/rnam dag sems kyi shes pa dang /_/gnas kyi bye brag shes pa dang /_/sems kyi chos kyi shes pa dang /_/sems skyon shes pa'i shes pa dang /_/rnam dag 
[\[238b.4\]]las kyi shes pa dang /_/sems kyi sdom pa'i shes pa dang /_/nyes dmigs shes pa'i shes pa dang /_/rnam dag sgra yi shes pa dang /_/phung po'i bye brag shes pa dang /_/phung po'i rgyu rkyen shes pa dang /_/mig ni yongs shes shes pa dang /_/sdug bsngal 'byung gnas shes 
[\[238b.5\]]pa dang /_/zag med tshul khrims shes pa dang /_/tshul khrims rgyu rkyen shes pa dang /_/sdug bsngal rgyu rkyen shes pa dang /_/sdug bsngal zad pa'i rgyu shes dang /_/'dus byas rnams kyi shes pa dang /_/zag pa zad pa'i shes pa dag_/yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin/_/
[\[238b.6\]]gzhan yang rgyu rkyen bcu gnyis kyi/_/spyod dang bcas pa'i shes pa dang /_/spyod pa med pa'i shes pa dang /_/mtshan ma bcas dang mtshan ma med/_/'dus byas dang ni 'dus ma byas/_/rnam par gzhag dang yongs sdud dang /_/bdag dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa/_/yang dag 
[\[238b.7\]]ji bzhin shes pa yin/_/gzhan yang mig zad skye mtha' dang /_/mig gi mtha' dang rab dben dang /_/'jug pa dang ni med pa dang /_/mi skye ba dang nyer zhi nyid/_/yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na/_/sems can dag ni mang po rnams/_/rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang /_/mthu 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]dang bcas pa'i ye shes dang /_/brtson 'grus ye shes 'thob par byed/_/gzhan yang gcig dang tha dad shes/_/sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/_/mos pa'i shes pa gang yin pa/_/yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/_/gzhan yang sems can 
[\[239a.2\]]thams cad kyi/_/mos pa khyad par 'phags pa dang /_/rnam dag sems kyi shes pa dang /_/las dang rnam smin shes pa dang /_/dbang po khams kyi shes pa dang /_/sems kyi 'gyur ba shes pa dang /_/shes rab mos pa'i shes pa dang /_/shin tu rnam grol shes pa 
[\[239a.3\]]dang /_/spobs pa mchog gi shes pa dag_/yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/_/gzhan yang sems can ma rungs dang /_/chos la mos pa med gyur pa/_/yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na/_/mos pa'i shes pa skyed par byed/_/gzhan yang don gyi tshul dag ni/_/yang 
[\[239a.4\]]dag ji bzhin shes pas na/_/le lo med pa'i shes pa dag_/dus shes sgrub par byed pa yin/_/gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis/_/chos rnams rab tu 'byed pa dang /_/thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dag_/yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/_/gzhan yang 
[\[239a.5\]]rgya chen don dag dang /_/tshig gis bstan pa gang yin pa/_/rjes su shes pa'i shes pa dag_/yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/_/gzhan yang grogs bzang 'thun gnas dang /_/gos dang zas dang btung ba dag_/tshod shes pa yi shes pa rnams/_/yang dag ji 
[\[239a.6\]]bzhin shes pa yin/_/gzhan yang bya ba med pa yi/_/gzugs kyi chos ni gang yin pa/_/nan tan bsgrub pa'i shes pa dag_/yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/_/gzhan yang lus sems skyon med cing /_/sgro 'dogs skur 'debs yongs spangs nas/_/bla med 
[\[239a.7\]]ye shes gang tshol ba/_/yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/_/gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gis/_/nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/_/sprul pa'i sku ni rab bstan nas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed/_/yongs su smin par mdzad pas na/_/thams cad rab tu 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]dga' gyur nas/_/dad pa skyes pa'i shes pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang /_/mos shing gus pa'i shes pa dang /_/'dod chags spangs pa'i chos dag la/_/rab mos bsgrub pa'i shes pa dang /_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun tshogs la yang /_/mchod par 
[\[239b.2\]]mos pa'i shes pa dang /_/byang chub chen po dag la yang /_/rab mos bsngo ba'i shes pa dang /_/gzungs rnams kyi ni sgo dag la/_/rab mos ston pa'i shes pa dang /_/mos pa rnams ni gang yin pa/_/so sor rab rtogs shes pa dang /_/'phags pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin 
[\[239b.3\]]pa/_/legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang /_/bsrung dang rjes su dran rnams la/_/nges par byed pa'i shes pa dang /_/dpag tu med pa'i sems dag la/_/legs par 'jug pa'i shes pa dang /_/tshigs su bcad pa tshad med rnams/_/yang dag ston pa'i shes pa dang /_/
[\[239b.4\]]'dod pa'i mtshams sbyor gang yin pa/_/rtogs shing go ba'i shes pa dang /_/'gro ba dman pa de dag tu/_/ltung bar mi 'gyur shes pa dang /_/mi dge bshes gnyen gang yin pa/_/yongs su spong byed shes pa dang /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang yin pa/_/sten par 
[\[239b.5\]]byed pa'i shes pa dang /_/'dri zhing lan ldon gang yin pa/_/rab tu rnam 'byed shes pa dang /_/gnas dang gnas min gang yin pa/_/legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang /_/sa dang sa min gang yin pa/_/legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang /_/rab 'bring tha ma gang 
[\[239b.6\]]yin pa/_/rnam par 'byed pa'i shes pa dang /_/'dus byas shes pa gang yin dang /_/'dus ma byas kyi shes pa dang /_/dngos po dang ni rdzas kyi shes/_/dngos dang rdzas min shes pa dang /_/yongs su sdud byed shes pa dang /_/yongs su sdud min shes pa dang /_/
[\[239b.7\]]mngon par sgrub pa'i shes pa dang /_/yang dag sgrub min shes pa dang /_/mig dang mig min shes pa dang /_/mig dang lhan cig shes pa dang /_/mig gi bye brag shes pa dang /_/mig gi rang bzhin shes pa dang /_/yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/_/rna ba sna lce lus 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]nas ni/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/_/chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga/_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/gang zhig mig gi rgyu rkyen nyid/_/yang dag stong zhing dben pa dang /_/mthar ni bdag yod ma yin par/_/sems par byed pa gang yin pa/_/
[\[240a.2\]]gang zag des ni de bzhin du/_/yang dag nges pa kho nar ni/_/sems kyi ting 'dzin gang yin pa/_/yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mig gi rten 'brel dang /_/mig mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dag_/nges pa nyid du rtogs gyur nas/_/sems par byed 
[\[240a.3\]]pa gang yin pa/_/gang zag des ni de bzhin du/_/mig gi rgyu rkyen gang yin dang /_/mthar ni yod pa ma yin pa/_/yang dag ji bzhin rtogs par 'gyur/_/rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/_/chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga/_/thams cad de bzhin 
[\[240a.4\]]sbyar bar bya/_/de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das/_/grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/_/zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis/_/dngos po ngo mtshar rab bstan pa/_/deng 'dir bdag gi mdor bsdus nas/_/yon tan phyogs ni cung zad cig_/sems can dga' ba bskyed 
[\[240a.5\]]pa'i phyir/_/yang dag par ni bstan par bya/_/de tshe lha mi 'dren pa yis/_/spu yi khung bu gcig nas ni/_/'od zer brgya stong tshad med snyed/_/rab tu bkye bar gyur pas na/_/'od zer dag ni re res kyang /_/zhing ni tshad med gsal mdzad nas/_/sems can mang po kun 
[\[240a.6\]]gyi phyir/_/sangs rgyas mdzad pa rab tu mdzad/_/gang zhig 'das pa'i dus su ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang /_/yun ring sbyin dang tshul khrims dag_/mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa/_/de lta bu yi gang zag dag_/des ni ji skad bstan pa yi/_/rdzu 
[\[240a.7\]]'phrul dngos po thos gyur na/_/rab tu dga' zhing mos par 'gyur/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnams/_/nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal gyi/_/spyod yul min par rab shes nas/_/de lta bu yi gang zag dag_/des ni ji skad bstan pa yi/_/rdzu 'phrul dag ni thos gyur 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]na/_/mos pa dag ni skye 'gyur zhing /_/ngo mtshar 'dzin pa'i sems kyang skyed/_/lha dang mi ni 'dren pa yis/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mthu dag gis/_/de lta bu la sogs pa yi/_/rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rab bstan pas/_/sems can dag ni brgya stong dang /_/tshad med grangs 
[\[240b.2\]]med pa rnams kyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni/_/bsten cing rim gro mchod pa byas/_/lha dang mi ni 'dren pa yis/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mthu dag gis/_/mdo sde dag ni brgya stong dang /_/tshad med grangs med rab bshad pas/_/sems can dag ni mang po 
[\[240b.3\]]rnams/_/bstan pa de ni thos pas na/_/thams cad dang bas rab blangs te/_/sems ni rab tu dga' bar gyur/_/de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das/_/grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi ni mthu dag gis/_/nam mkha' las ni 'di skad du/_/
[\[240b.4\]]mig zad mtha' ni shes pa nas/_/lha mig ni nye bar zhi ba dang /_/mig nyid rgyu yi bar du yang /_/'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang /_/mthar ni stong dben shes par gyis/_/de skad du ni thos par gyur/_/rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/_/chos 
[\[240b.5\]]ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga/_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das/_/grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/_/nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/_/sgra snyan dam pa mchog byung nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sna tshogs/_/bsngags pa brjod 
[\[240b.6\]]par gyur pas na/_/'khor ni 'dus pa chen po rnams/_/thams cad dad mos sems kyang skyes/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni bdud dang bdud dpung dag_/pham mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta 
[\[240b.7\]]bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/log par lta ba'i tshogs thams cad/_/rab tu 'dul bar nus shes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni 'dod chags gzhom pa dang /_/zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur ba de dag ni/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa/_/thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni zhe sdang gzhom 
[\[241a.2\]]pa dang /_/zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/zhe sdang dag ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni gti mug 
[\[241a.3\]]gzhom pa dang /_/zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/gti mug dag ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/
[\[241a.4\]]mtshan ni nga rgyal gzhom pa dang /_/zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/nga rgyal dag ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang 
[\[241a.5\]]yin pa/_/mtshan ni khong khro gzhom pa dang /_/zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/khong khro dag ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi 
[\[241a.6\]]seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni phrag dog gzhom pa dang /_/zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/phrag dog dag ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/
[\[241a.7\]]mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni mi bden gzhom pa dang /_/zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/mi bden dag ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni lta rnams gzhom pa dang /_/zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/lta ba dag ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/
[\[241b.2\]]mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni spros pa gzhom pa dang /_/zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/spros pa dag ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/
[\[241b.3\]]mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni yang dag pa yi chos/_/rnam dag chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/rnam dag chos ni gang yin pa/_/rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/
[\[241b.4\]]mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni las rnams rtogs pa yi/_/chos kyi rgyal zhes bya ba yin/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/las rnams thams cad gang yin pa/_/rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten 
[\[241b.5\]]bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni rdzu 'phrul phun tshogs pa'i/_/chos kyi rgyal zhes bya ba yin/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/rdzu 'phrul yon tan gang yin pa/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da 
[\[241b.6\]]ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni pha rol phyin pa rnams/_/phun tshogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/pha rol phyin drug gang yin pa/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 
[\[241b.7\]]zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni 'du byed gang yin pa/_/rab rtogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/_/'du byed dag ni thams cad kun/_/rab tu rtogs 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni rnam par dag pa yi/_/'od zer kun 'dzin skyed ces bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i 
[\[242a.2\]]skye len dag_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni kha dog dag pa yi/_/'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/
[\[242a.3\]]khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dam pa/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni sku nyid dag pa yi/_/'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa 
[\[242a.4\]]de dag ni/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs sku dag_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni gdung nyid dag pa yi/_/'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/
[\[242a.5\]]thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i rus rigs rnams/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni rgya cher grags pa yi/_/'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya/_/gang gis 
[\[242a.6\]]'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/rgya cher grags pa'i grags pa rnams/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni sbyin pa gtong ba dang /_/tshul khrims can dang bzod 
[\[242a.7\]]bsgoms dang /_/brtson 'grus brtsams dang bsam gtan dang /_/shes rab kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/thos par gyur pa de dag ni/_/sbyin pa dang ni tshul khrims nas/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang /_/gzungs kyi sgo ni gang yin pa/_/
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni stong nyid rdzogs pa yi/_/chos kyi rje zhes bya ba yin/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/_/chos rnams stong pa'i don dag kyang /_/
[\[242b.2\]]yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni bdag med rdzogs pa yi/_/chos kyi rje zhes bya ba yin/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/_/skye 'gag med don gang yin pa/_/yang 
[\[242b.3\]]dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer/_/da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi/_/mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/_/mtshan ni spyan nyid dag pa yi/_/kun 'dzin chos kyi rje zhes bya/_/gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/_/'dzin par byed pa de dag ni/_/mig zad mtha' don gang yin pa/_/yang 
[\[242b.4\]]dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer/_/rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/_/chos ni nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /_/me tog phreng ba spos dag dang /_/mar me gdugs dang gos rnams kyang /_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//_//bam po lnga pa 
[\[242b.5\]]ste tha ma//_de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das/_/grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag ni/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs rnams kyis/_/nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/_/sgra snyan dam pa rab byung ste/_/gzungs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs dag_/yang dag 
[\[242b.6\]]par ni bstan pas na/_/'khor ni 'dus pa chen po rnams/_/'di lta bu yi tshig thos te/_/gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/_/mig gi zad mtha' gang yin dang /_/skye mtha' dang ni mtha' rnams dang /_/rab dben dang ni 'jug pa nas/_/nye bar zhi ba'i bar rnams kyi/_/
[\[242b.7\]]chos rnams gang yin de dag gis/_/mthar phyin gnas ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad rab tu rtogs par byed/_/sbyin pa'i stobs ni gang dag gis/_/mthar ni gang dag sdud pa dang /_/tshul khrims stobs ni gang dag gis/_/mthar ni gang dag 'grub pa dang /_/bzod 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]pa'i stobs ni gang dag gis/_/mthar ni gang dag bkod pa dang /_/brtson 'grus stobs ni gang dag gis/_/mthar ni gang dag slong ba dang /_/bsam gtan stobs ni gang dag gis/_/mthar ni gang dag sgom pa dang /_/shes rab stobs ni gang dag gis/_/mthar ni gang dag ston pa 
[\[243a.2\]]dang /_/yi ge rnams dang brjod pa dang /_/sgra skad rnams ni spangs pa nas/_/gzugs dang sems kyi bar du yang /_/mthar ni rnam dag nyid du rtogs/_/zag dang bcas dang zag med dang /_/don rnams dang ni phan pa dag_/thams cad stong zhing dben pa dang /_/mthar ni rnam dag nyid du rtogs/_/
[\[243a.3\]]srid pa dag ni thams cad la/_/rten cing gnas par mi byed dang /_/gzungs dang ting 'dzin dag la ni/_/rab tu dben par gnas par byed/_/'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang /_/dge ba ma yin mi dge min/_/lung du mi ston pa yang min/_/bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i/_/de lta bu yi mtshan 
[\[243a.4\]]ma rnams/_/thams cad yongs su dag pas na/_/dbang phyug yon tan dag la yang /_/gnas par yang ni mi byed do/_/nyan thos dang ni skye bo dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos la yang /_/gnas par yang ni mi byed do/_/mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag dang /_/skye mtha' dang ni mtha' rnams nas/_/
[\[243a.5\]]nye bar zhi ba'i bar rnams kyi/_/spyod pa dag ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad yongs su zhi bar byed/_/skye ba dang ni mi skye dang /_/sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba dang /_/bstod pa dang ni smad pa dag_/thams cad yongs su spong zhes zer/_/mthar phyin snang ba gang yin dang /_/stong pa'i 
[\[243a.6\]]gzungs ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad rab tu gang rtogs pa/_/'di nyid sangs rgyas spyod yul la/_/rab tu gnas par byed pa yin/_/'di nyid sangs rgyas rol pa yi/_/gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin/_/'di nyid sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul la/_/rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin/_/'di 
[\[243a.7\]]nyid sangs rgyas mkhyen pa la/_/rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin/_/mig zad mtha' yi stobs dag la/_/de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang /_/mig skye mtha' yi stobs dag la/_/de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang /_/mig gi mtha' yi stobs dag la/_/de bzhin du ni gnas pa nas/_/
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]nye bar zhi ba'i stobs kyi bar/_/de la rab tu gnas pa dang /_/rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/_/chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga/_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer/_/gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs/_/khyad 
[\[243b.2\]]par 'phags pa gang yin pa/_/yongs su rdzogs par byed ces zer/_/gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis/_/gzi byin mthu stobs de lta bu/_/yongs su rdzogs par byas nas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_gnas kun la ni 'jug pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[243b.3\]]pa thams cad kyi/_/spyod yul kun la gnas gyur pas/_/'jig rten pa ni thams cad kun/_/lha ma yin gyi tshogs dag la/_/brtan par 'dzin pa'i sems spangs nas/_/tshangs pa'i spyod la gnas par byed/_/gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad med dang /_/grul bum dag ni tshad med 
[\[243b.4\]]rnams/_/de dag thams cad kun kyang ni/_/rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed/_/dri za'i 'khor ni gang yin dang /_/srin po'i 'khor ni gang yin pa/_/tshad med grangs med de dag kyang /_/rab tu dul la dga' bar byed/_/gal te tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/_/sgra snyan dag ni 
[\[243b.5\]]dam pa yis/_/tshig dang don ni rjod byed kyang /_/yang dag bstan par mi nus te/_/sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis/_/dpag par bya ba ma yin dang /_/sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis/_/gzungs bar bya ba min zhes zer/_/gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni/_/mig gis dmigs 
[\[243b.6\]]par bya ba min/_/gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni/_/lus kyi bar gyis dmigs bya min/_/gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni/_/mig gis dmigs par bya ba min/_/mig gi spyod yul bar gyis kyang /_/dmigs par bya ba ma yin te/_/rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/_/chos ni 
[\[243b.7\]]rnam pa nyi shu lnga/_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer/_/gzhan yang mig gi zad mtha' dang /_/mig rnams kyi ni skye mtha' dang /_/mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas/_/nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag la/_/bdag dang skyes bu med pa dang /_/sems dang srog ni med pa dang /_/de bzhin gang zag 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]med pa dang /_/mtshan ma med cing byed med dang /_/'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang /_/'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mtshan/_/thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer/_/gzhan yang 'di skad chos nyid kyi/_/mig ni rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer/_/gzhan yang 'di skad chos rnams las/_/
[\[244a.2\]]grub pa'i mig ni gang yin dang /_/ye shes mig dang shes rab mig_/tshangs pa'i mig dang lha mig dang /_/tshangs par skyes nas thob mig dang /_/lhar ni skyes nas thob mig dang /_/tshangs pa'i rnam smin mig dag dang /_/lha yi rnam smin mig dag dang /_/tshangs pa'i rgyu las skyes mig 
[\[244a.3\]]dang /_/lha yi rgyu las skyes pa'i mig_/lha yi rdzu 'phrul mig dag dang /_/lha yi brtson 'grus dag gi mig_/dman par skyes pa'i mig dag dang /_/khyad 'phags skyes pa'i mig dag dang /_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten gang yin pa/_/yongs su spangs pa'i mig dag dang /_/klu dang gnod sbyin mig 
[\[244a.4\]]dag dang /_/grul bum gyi ni mig dag dang /_/yongs su gdung bcas mig dag dang /_/yongs su gdung min mig dag dang /_/rnam par dag pa'i mig dag dang /_/rnam par dag min mig dag dang /_/chur ring zheng thung mig dag dang /_/nyan thos theg pa'i mig dag dang /_/bsam gtan pa yi 
[\[244a.5\]]mig dag dang /_/ting nge 'dzin gyi mig dag dang /_/spyod yul las byung mig dag dang /_/'du shes las byung mig dag dang /_/'dod chags las byung mig dag dang /_/'dod chags bral ba'i mig dag dang /_/rgyu las byung ba'i mig dag dang /_/rgyu min las byung mig dag dang /_/mtshungs par ldan pa'i 
[\[244a.6\]]mig dag dang /_/mtshungs par ldan min mig dag dang /_/sgo brten las byung mig dag dang /_/sgo las byung min mig dag dang /_/rgyu rkyen las byung mig dag dang /_/rgyu sgo las skyes mig dag dang /_/sha las grub min mig dag dang /_/ye shes rnam par dag mig dang /_/yod pa min pa'i mig dag dang /_/
[\[244a.7\]]dmigs med mig ni gang yin pa/_/thams cad rtogs par byed ces zer/_/rna ba sna lce lus nas ni/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar/_/chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga/_/thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer/_/de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das/_/nam mkha' bar snang dag las ni/_/gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i sgra/_/sgra snyan 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]dam pa mchog byung nas/_/khyad par 'phags pa gzungs kyi chos/_/'di skad du ni bka' stsal te/_/'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa yis/_/rdzu 'phrul dag gis sprul pa yin/_/'di lta ste/_si le/_/ma le ma le/_sid d+he/_ai ni/_si Ne/_ku lu ni yu/_ku lu ne yu/_ku le ma le/_ku no te/_a la shi/_a si le/_si si 
[\[244b.2\]]le te/_su si le/_si le si le/_khyi bi le/_a bi le/_su Te tsa na/_d+ha ni ma ni/_ka ni/_ka la te/_su ka le/_pra ya/_sha nang ni/_a nu lo si kyi/_bi lo me/_su b+ha ni re sh+he/_a shi ri le/_sar ma par phun te/_pa ri b+ha he/_d+ha ra ni/_d+he shu tsi ha/_su d+he/_a tsa na/_b+hu bo ga gnang /_kud ba no/_b+ha sa b+ha nang /_pan ri d+hu ri ya/_ni pa ri ka no ni/_ma naM
