[\[264b.4\]]'gyur te/_khyim bdag khyed rnams sred pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i chos bcu po 'di dag las thar bar 'dod dam/_gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams log pa nyid bcu las thar bar 'dod dam/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_log pa'i lta ba dang /_log pa'i rtog pa dang /_log pa'i ngag dang /_log pa'i 
[\[264b.5\]]las kyi mtha' dang /_log pa'i 'tsho ba dang log pa'i rtsol ba dang log pa'i dran pa dang /_log pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_log pa'i rnam par grol ba dang /_log pa'i shes pa dang bcu ste/_khyim bdag khyed rnams log pa nyid bcu po 'di dag las thar bar 'dod dam/_gzhan yang khyim bdag 
[\[264b.6\]]khyed rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu las thar bar 'dod dam/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod 
[\[264b.7\]]sems dang /_log par lta ba ste/_khyim bdag khyed rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po 'di dag las thar bar 'dod dam/_gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa bcu las thar bar 'dod dam/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ser sna'i dri ma kun nas nyon 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]mongs pa dang /_'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_gnod sems kyi dri ma kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_le lo'i dri ma kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_g.yeng ba'i dri ma kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_'chal ba'i shes rab kyi dri ma 
[\[265a.2\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_sri zhu med pa'i dri ma kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_the tshom gyi dri ma kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_ma mos pa'i dri ma kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_ma gus pa'i dri ma kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/_khyim bdag khyed rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa bcu po 'di 
[\[265a.3\]]dag las thar bar 'dod dam/_gzhan yang khyim bdag khyed rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa bcu las thar bar 'dod dam/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phrag dog dang /_ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba las thar bar 'dod dam/_'di lta ste/_khyim bdag khyed rnams ma rig pa'i ling tog las 
[\[265a.4\]]thar bar 'dod dam/_'di lta ste/_khyim bdag khyed rnams gti mug gi 'obs las thar bar 'dod dam/_'di lta ste/_khyim bdag khyed rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo las thar bar 'dod dam/_'di lta ste/_khyim bdag khyed rnams log pa'i zug rngu las thar bar 'dod dam/_'di lta ste/_khyim 
[\[265a.5\]]bdag khyed rnams khro ba dang 'khon du 'dzin pa las thar bar 'dod dam/_'di lta ste/_khyim bdag khyed rnams 'dod chags kyi me las thar bar 'dod dam/_'di lta ste/_khyim bdag khyed rnams zhe sdang gi dug las thar bar 'dod dam/_'di lta ste/_khyim bdag khyed rnams sgrib pa'i tsher 
[\[265a.6\]]ma las thar bar 'dod dam/_'di lta ste/_khyim bdag khyed rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las thar bar 'dod dam/_khyim bdag khyed rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa bcu po 'di dag las thar bar 'dod dam/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis sgra skad 
[\[265a.7\]]mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gtse ba bcu las thar bar 'tshal te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skye bas gtse ba dang /_rga bas gtse ba dang /_na bas gtse ba dang /_'chi bas gtse ba dang /_mya ngan gyis gtse ba dang /_smre sngags 'don pas 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]gtse ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyis gtse ba dang /_yid mi bde bas gtse ba dang /_'khrug pas gtse ba dang /_'khor ba'i gtse ba las bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thar bar 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin du 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa'i bar du chos bcu po 'di dag las thams cad rgyas par 
[\[265b.2\]]bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag rnams mig ni thar bar mi 'dod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mig ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste/_mig ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go_/de bas na khyim bdag rnams mig la 
[\[265b.3\]]bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o/_khyim bdag rnams rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni thar bar mi 'dod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yid ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste/_yid ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go_/de bas na khyim bdag rnams yid 
[\[265b.4\]]la yang bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o/_/khyim bdag rnams gzugs ni thar bar mi 'dod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste/_gzugs ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go_/de bas na khyim bdag rnams gzugs la yang bdag 
[\[265b.5\]]med do zhes gnas par bya'o/_/khyim bdag rnams sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos ni thar bar mi 'dod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi bar du byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste/_chos ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go_/de bas na khyim bdag rnams chos 
[\[265b.6\]]kyi bar du yang bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o/_/khyim bdag rnams gzugs kyi phung po ni thar bar mi 'dod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs kyi phung po ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste/_gzugs kyi phung po ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go_/de bas na khyim bdag 
[\[265b.7\]]rnams gzugs kyi phung po la yang bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o/_/khyim bdag rnams tshor ba'i phung po dang /_'du shes kyi phung po dang /_'du byed kyi phung po dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni thar bar mi 'dod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni byed pa med 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]pa g.yo ba med pa ste/_rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni mi sems shing /_rnam par mi rig go_/de bas na khyim bdag rnams rnam par shes pa'i phung po la yang bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o/_/khyim bdag rnams sa'i khams ni thar bar mi 'dod do/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[266a.2\]]zhe na/_sa'i khams ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste/_sa'i khams ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go_/de bas na khyim bdag rnams sa'i khams la yang bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o/_/khyim bdag rnams chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_
[\[266a.3\]]nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams ni thar bar mi 'dod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par shes pa'i khams ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa ste/_rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mi sems shing rnam par mi rig go_/de bas na khyim bdag rnams rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[266a.4\]]khams la yang bdag med do zhes gnas par bya'o/_/de ltar na khyim bdag rnams chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su rtog pa las byung ste/_rkyen la rag las pa/_stobs med pa/_nyam chung ba/_rkyen rnams las byung ba/_rkyen rnams yod na chos rnams gdags par 
[\[266a.5\]]'gyur gyi/_rkyen med na chos rnams gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag rnams chos thams cad ni btags pa tsam ste/_'di la lam chad pa mya ngan las 'das pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am/_rga ba'am/_'chi ba'am/_'pho ba'am/_'byung ba gang yang med do/_/de ltar khyim 
[\[266a.6\]]bdag rnams khyed rnam grangs 'dis chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa/_kun brtags pa las byung ba/_rkyen la rag las pa/_stobs med pa/_nyam chung ba/_rkyen rnams las byung ba ste/_rkyen rnams yod na chos rnams gdags par 'gyur gyi/_rkyen med na chos rnams 
[\[266a.7\]]gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad ni btags pa tsam ste/_'di la lam chad pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am/_rga ba'am/_'chi ba'am/_'pho ba'am/_'byung ba gang yang med par rig par bya'o/_/de ltar na khyim bdag rnams yang dag pa ma 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]yin par kun rtog pa yod na/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa med na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yod na ma rig pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_tshul 
[\[266b.2\]]bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa med na ma rig pa gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnams gdags par 'gyur gyi/_ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams su gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/'du byed yod na rnam par shes pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_'du byed med na rnam par 
[\[266b.3\]]shes pa gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/rnam par shes pa yod na ming dang gzugs gdags par 'gyur gyi/_rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugs su gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/ming dang gzugs yod na skye mched drug gdags par 'gyur gyi/_ming dang gzugs 
[\[266b.4\]]med na skye mched drug tu gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/skye mched drug yod na reg pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_skye mched drug med na reg par gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/reg pa yod na tshor ba gdags par 'gyur gyi/_reg pa med na tshor bar gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[266b.5\]]tshor ba yod na sred pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_tshor ba med na sred par gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/sred pa yod na len pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_sred pa med na len par gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/len pa yod na srid pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_len pa med na srid par 
[\[266b.6\]]gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/srid pa yod na skye ba gdags par 'gyur gyi/_srid pa med na skye bar gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/skye ba yod na rga shi gdags par 'gyur gyi/_skye ba med na rga shir gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/rga ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_rgas pa dang /_gtugs pa dang /_
[\[266b.7\]]spyi ther ba dang /_skra skya ba dang /_gnyer ma mang ba dang /_tshe nyams pa dang /_dbang po yongs su smin pa dang /_'du byed rnams kyi dngos po rnyings pa ste/_de ni rga ba zhes bya'o/_/'chi ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'chi ba dang /_'pho ba dang /_'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang /_phung po 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]rnams zhig pa dang /_lus bor ba dang /_ris 'thun pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dang bral ba ste/_'di ni 'chi ba zhes bya'o/_/de la rga ba 'di dang /_'chi ba 'di la rga shi zhes bya'o/_/de ltar skye ba yod na rga shi gdags par 'gyur gyi/_skye ba med na rga shir gdags 
[\[267a.2\]]par mi 'gyur te/_skye ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_skye ba dang /_rdzogs par skye ba dang /_'jug pa dang /_mngon par 'grub pa dang /_phung po rnams 'byung ba dang /_skye mched rnams rab tu thob pa dang /_ris 'thun pa dang phrad pa ste/_de ni skye ba zhes bya'o/_/srid pa yod na skye ba 
[\[267a.3\]]gdags par 'gyur gyi/_srid pa med na skye bar gdags par mi 'gyur te/_srid pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i srid pa dang /_gzugs kyi srid pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i srid pa ste/_de ni srid pa zhes bya'o/_/len pa yod na srid pa gdags par 'gyur 
[\[267a.4\]]gyi/_len pa med na srid par gdags par mi 'gyur te/_len pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i len pa dang /_lta ba'i len pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs kyi len pa dang /_bdag tu smra ba'i len pa ste/_de ni len pa zhes bya'o/_/sred pa yod na len pa gdags 
[\[267a.5\]]par 'gyur gyi/_sred pa med na len par gdags par mi 'gyur te/_sred pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs la sred pa dang /_sgra la sred pa dang /_dri la sred pa dang /_ro la sred pa dang /_reg bya la sred pa dang /_chos la sred pa ste/_de ni sred pa zhes bya'o/_/tshor ba 
[\[267a.6\]]yod na sred pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_tshor ba med na sred par gdags par mi 'gyur te/_tshor ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 
[\[267a.7\]]tshor ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ste/_de ni tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/reg pa yod na tshor ba gdags par 'gyur gyi/_reg pa med na tshor bar gdags par mi 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]'gyur te/_reg pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ste/_de ni reg pa zhes bya'o/_/skye mched drug yod na reg pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_skye mched drug med na reg par gdags par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[267b.2\]]skye mched drug ces bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mig gi skye mched dang /_rna ba'i skye mched dang /_sna'i skye mched dang /_lce'i skye mched dang /_lus kyi skye mched dang /_yid kyi skye mched de/_de ni skye mched drug ces bya'o/_/ming dang gzugs yod na skye mched drug gdags par 'gyur gyi/_
[\[267b.3\]]ming dang gzugs med na skye mched drug tu gdags par mi 'gyur te/_ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa dang /_reg pa dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /_'byung ba chen po bzhi la gnas pa'i ming dang 
[\[267b.4\]]gzugs te/_de ni ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa yod na ming dang gzugs gdags par 'gyur gyi/_rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugs su gdags par mi 'gyur te/_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i 
[\[267b.5\]]rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste/_de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/'du byed rnams yod na rnam par shes par gdags par 'gyur gyi/_'du byed rnams med na 
[\[267b.6\]]rnam par shes par gdags par mi 'gyur te/_'du byed rnams shes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs la kun sems pa dang /_sgra la kun sems pa dang /_dri la kun sems pa dang /_ro la kun sems pa dang /_reg bya la kun sems pa dang /_chos la kun sems pa ste/_
[\[267b.7\]]de dag ni 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o/_/ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnams gdags par 'gyur te/_ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams su gdags par mi 'gyur te/_ma rig pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa dang /_sngon dang 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa dang /_nang mi shes pa dang /_phyi mi shes pa dang /_nang dang phyi mi shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal mi shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba mi shes pa dang /_'gog pa mi shes pa dang /_lam mi shes pa ste/_de ltar rkyen mi shes pa dang /_rten cing 
[\[268a.2\]]'brel bar 'byung ba mi shes pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams mi shes pa dang /_nag po dang /_dkar po dang /_rkyen dang /_rkyen ma yin pa dang /_snang ba dang /_mi snang ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_bsten par bya ba dang /_bsten 
[\[268a.3\]]par bya ba ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang mi shes pa dang /_mi mthong ba dang /_mngon par mi rtogs pa dang /_khong du mi chud pa de ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yod na ma rig pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa med na ma rig par 
[\[268a.4\]]gdags par mi 'gyur te/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig gam/_bdag 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig gam/_ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung ba zhig na bdag 'das pa'i dus na gang du byung ba zhig_/bdag 'das 
[\[268a.5\]]pa'i dus na cir gyur pa zhig_/bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur ram/_ci bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba zhig na/_bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang du 'byung bar 'gyur/_bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhes 
[\[268a.6\]]nang du bdag ci/_bdag su zhig ci yod dam ci med dam/_ci byung ngam ma byung ngam/_cir gyur gang du byung /_bdag cir gyur/_gang du byung ba zhig_/ci bdag byung ba zhig na/_bdag gang du byung ba zhig_/bdag der byung ba zhig gam zhes the tshom za zhing yid gnyis su 'gyur te/_de de 
[\[268a.7\]]ltar tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byas pas lta bar gyur pa drug las lta ba gang yang rung ba/_cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bdag yod ces lta bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdag med ces lta bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdag la bdag yang dag par rjes su mthong zhes lta bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdag la bdag 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes lta bar 'gyur ba dang /_de ni bdag ste de 'jig rten no zhes lta bar 'gyur ba dang /_gal te rkyen la brten te 'byung ba ni rtag pa/_brtan pa/_ther zug pa/_mi 'gyur ba'i chos can/_ther zug pa yang dag par 'dug pa'am/_'dug par 'gyur ba zhes 
[\[268b.2\]]lta bar 'gyur ba de ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa yod na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa med na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par gdags par 
[\[268b.3\]]mi 'gyur te/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_skye ba po dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po ste/_de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa 
[\[268b.4\]]kun rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/so so'i skye bo thos pa dang /_mi ldan pa rnams bdag ces rtog cing yongs su rtog pa dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_skyes bu dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bu dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po zhes rtog cing yongs su rtog pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin 
[\[268b.5\]]pa kun tu rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa yod na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa med na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gdags par mi 'gyur te/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa 
[\[268b.6\]]yid la byed pa yod na/_ma rig pa gdags par 'gyur gyi/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa med na/_ma rig par gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnams gdags par 'gyur gyi/_ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams su gdags par mi 'gyur ba nas/_skye 
[\[268b.7\]]ba yod na rga shi gdags par 'gyur gyi/_skye ba med na rga shir gdags par mi 'gyur ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de ltar na khyim bdag rnams chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa las byung ba/_rkyen la rag las 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]pa/_stobs med pa/_rkyen rnams las byung ba yin te/_rkyen med na chos rnams gdags par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag rnams chos thams cad ni btags pa tsam ste/_'di la lam chad pa mya ngan las 'das pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am/_rga ba'am/_'chi ba'am/_
[\[269a.2\]]'pho ba 'am/_'byung ba gang yang med do/_/khyim bdag rnams 'di lta ste/_dper na chu'i mtsho chen po la nya gnas par gyur pa khyim bdag rnams de ci snyam du sems/_nya de dag ci zhig gi mthu/_de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chab kyi mthu'o/_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[269a.3\]]pa chab kyi mthu'o/_/de la khyim bdag rnams ci chu de sems sam/_de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de lta ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag rnams de ltar chu sems pa med pa la ci'i stobs shig yod/_bcom 
[\[269a.4\]]ldan 'das stobs ma mchis so/_/bde bar gshegs pa stobs chung ngo /_/bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag rnams de bzhin du chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa/_kun rtog pa las byung ba/_stobs med pa/_nyam chung ba/_rkyen rnams las 'byung ba ste/_rkyen rnams yod 
[\[269a.5\]]na chos rnams gdags par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag rnams chos thams cad ni btags pa tsam ste/_'di la lam chad pa mya ngan las 'das pa ma gtogs par skye ba'am/_rga ba'am/_'chi ba'am/_'pho ba'am/_'byung ba gang yang med do/_/khyim bdag khyed rnams de 
[\[269a.6\]]bas na/_rkyen de dag la tshul bzhin so sor rtogs la/_de'i tshe yid brtan du mi rung ba dang /_yid brtan pa ma yin pas skrag par gyis shig_/skrag par gyur pa de na 'bros par gyis shig/_chos gang las 'bros pa'i chos de gang zhes tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs shig_/
[\[269a.7\]]tshul bzhin so sor rtog pa de na chos gang chos de las [(]'bros [,]'phros [)]pa'i chos de rtogs par gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyim bdag rnams rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni dmigs su med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]cad ni bdag med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams bdag dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni sems can med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa 
[\[269b.2\]]las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni srog med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams dus gsum yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams sgra dang /_skad dang /_dbyangs dang /_tshig gi lam nas brjod du med pa'i phyir chos thams 
[\[269b.3\]]cad ni yi ge med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams dmigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni chags pa med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad ni zhi ba'o/_/khyim bdag rnams nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyir chos thams cad ni kun du song 
[\[269b.4\]]ba'o/_/khyim bdag rnams nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid la yang dag par gnas pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams gnas pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni ma g.yos pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams mi gnas shing g.yo ba med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir 
[\[269b.5\]]chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams rba klong dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams mtshan ma med dbyibs med pa la snang ba rgyu ba dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni kha dog med pa'o/_/khyim bdag 
[\[269b.6\]]rnams nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni nga'i ba med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams mig gi lam las shin tu 'das pa dang /_rna ba dang sna 
[\[269b.7\]]dang lce dang lus dang /_yid kyi lam las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad ni kun gzhi med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams skye ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_gnas pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni dor ba med cing bsnan pa med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams sems dang 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni byed pa med pa g.yo ba med pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni rkyen la rag las pa'o/_/khyim bdag rnams mig ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa/_mi 
[\[270a.2\]]rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_ther zug ma yin pa/_snying po med pa/_nyam chung ba/_zhigs pa/_yun thung ba/_yid brtan du mi rung ba/_sdug bsngal ba/_nad mang ba/_gtse ba mang ba yin te/_khyim bdag khyed rnams kyis mig de la gnas par mi bya'o/_/khyim bdag 
[\[270a.3\]]rnams rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa/_mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_ther zug ma yin pa/_yid brtan du mi rung ba/_snying po med pa/_zhigs pa/_nad can/_sdug bsngal ba/_nad mang ba/_gtse ba mang ba yin te/_
[\[270a.4\]]khyim bdag khyed rnams kyis yid de la gnas par mi bya'o/_/yang khyim bdag rnams 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_mig 'di ni mnyer mi bzod de/_dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o/_/mig 'di ni ring du mi gnas te chu'i chu bur lta bu'o/_/mig 'di ni las dang nyon mongs pa dang /_sred 
[\[270a.5\]]pa las byung ba ste/_smig rgyu lta bu'o/_/mig 'di ni rang bzhin gyis snying po med de chu shing lta bu'o/_/mig 'di ni phyin ci log las byung ba ste/_sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/mig 'di ni log pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa mthong ba ste/_rmi lam lta bu'o/_/mig 'di ni rkyen la rag 
[\[270a.6\]]las pa ste brag ca lta bu'o/_/mig 'di ni las kyi mig yor gyis kun du snang ba ste mig yor lta bu'o/_/mig 'di ni sems 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid de sprin lta bu'o/_/mig 'di ni skad cig tu 'jig pa dang ldan pa ste/_glog lta bu'o/_/mig 'di ni bdag po med 
[\[270a.7\]]de/_sa dang mtshungs so/_/mig 'di ni bdag med de chu dang mtshungs so/_/mig 'di ni sems can med de me dang mtshungs so/_/mig 'di ni srog med de rlung dang mtshungs so/_/mig 'di ni gang zag med de nam mkha' dang mtshungs so/_/mig 'di ni 'byung ba chen po'i kun gzhi 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/_/mig 'di ni bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba ste stong pa'o/_/mig 'di ni rtswa dang rtsig pa dang /_shing dang /_rdo dang /_mig yor lta bu ste bems po'o/_/mig 'di ni rlung gi 'khrul 'khor dang ldan par 'byung ste/_byed pa med pa'o/_/mig 'di ni gsog ste 
[\[270b.2\]]mi gtsang ba dang rnag bsags pa'o/_/mig 'di ni gsob ste g.yog pa kun du mnye ba gzhig pa rnam par 'thor ba 'jig pa'i chos can no/_/mig 'di ni rtag tu rga ba'i zil gyis non pa ste khron pa rnying pa dang mtshungs so/_/mig 'di ni mthar 'chi ba ste mthar mi gnas pa'o/_/khyim 
[\[270b.3\]]bdag rnams mig ji lta ba de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyang rig par bya'o/_/gong ma bzhin du sbyar te chos thams cad kyi bar du rig par bya'o/_/khyim bdag rnams gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_mig 'di dang 'di lta ste/_rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus 'di ni byis pa so so'i 
[\[270b.4\]]skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo/_'di lta ste/_yid 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_gzugs 'di dang lta ste/_/sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo/_/'di lta 
[\[270b.5\]]ste/_khyim bdag rnams gzugs kyi phung po 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_khyim bdag rnams tshor ba'i phung po 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_khyim bdag rnams 'du shes kyi phung po 'di ni byis pa 
[\[270b.6\]]so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_khyim bdag rnams 'du byed kyi phung po 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_khyim bdag rnams rnam par shes pa'i phung po 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam 
[\[270b.7\]]mo/_/'di lta ste/_khyim bdag rnams sa'i khams 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_khyim bdag rnams chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]khyim bdag rnams 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod pa tsam mo/_/de bas na khyim bdag khyed rnams mi 'dod par gyis shig mi 'dod par gyur nas bu dang chung ma rnams nye bar ma len cig_/nor 
[\[271a.2\]]rnams ma len cig_/de dag mi len par gyur nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar gyis shig_/dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas mi 'dod par gyis shig_/khyim bdag rnams rab tu byung ba'i mi 'dod pa gang zhe na gang so sor thar ba'i sdom pas bsdams shing cho ga dang /_
[\[271a.3\]]spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa/_kha na ma tho ba rdul tsam la yang 'jigs par lta zhing bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par bzung nas slob ste/_tshul khrims dang ldan par gnas pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan pa ni mig mi len/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_
[\[271a.4\]]yid mi len/_gzugs mi len/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos mi len/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi len/_sa'i khams mi len/_chu'i khams mi len/_me'i khams dang /_
[\[271a.5\]]rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams mi len te/_khyim bdag rnams 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i mi 'dod pa'o/_/mi 'dod nas mig gi khams mi len to/_/gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_yid kyi khams kyi bar du mi len te/_gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_
[\[271a.6\]]gang mi len pa de yongs su mi spong ngo /_/ci yongs su mi spong zhe na/_mig yongs su mi spong /_rna ba dang sna dang lce dang /_lus dang yid yongs su mi spong /_gzugs yongs su mi spong /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos yongs su mi spong /_gzugs 
[\[271a.7\]]kyi phung po yongs su mi spong /_tshor ba'i phung po yongs su mi spong /_'du shes kyi phung po yongs su mi spong /_'du byed kyi phung po yongs su mi spong /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs su mi spong /_sa'i khams yongs su mi spong /_chu'i khams yongs su mi spong /_me'i 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yongs su mi spong ngo /_de nam mi spong ba de na de kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med na yang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nam yang bar gyur pa de de 
[\[271b.2\]]mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nam mi snang ba de na gang la yang khong khro bar mi byed do/_/de nam khong khro bar mi byed pa de na bdag la gnod par mi sems/_gzhan la gnod par mi sems/_gnyi ga la gnod par mi sems te/_de gnod par mi sems pas phung po'i lhag ma 
[\[271b.3\]]med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/khyim bdag rnams de la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhe na/_de la mig yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' 
[\[271b.4\]]mod kyi/_khyim bdag rnams gang mig la brten nas nga zhe 'am/_nga'i zhes yang dag pa ma yin pa 'dzin pa de dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'o/_/gang dang bral ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin zhe na/_'dod chags dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[271b.5\]]'das pa'o/_/zhe sdang dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/gti mug dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/mi shes pa dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_yang khyim bdag rnams mi shes pa ni 'das pa la med 
[\[271b.6\]]par ma gyur/_de ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa la med par ma gyur mod kyi/_mi shes pa dang bral nas shes pa skyes so/_/khyim bdag rnams de la shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zad pa shes pa'o/_/de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zad pa 
[\[271b.7\]]shes pa ni 'das pa ma yin/_/zad pa shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_zad pa shes pa ni da ltar byung ba ma yin mod kyi/_khyim bdag rnams gang la brten te mi shes pa dang bral nas shes pa skyes par gyur pa de ni mi shes pa dang bral ba'i shes pa'o/_/mig 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]la brten nas mi shes pa dang bral zhing shes pa skyes kyang mig ni nga'i ba ma yin no/_gang nga'i ba ma yin pa de yongs su ma bzung ba'o/_gang yongs su ma bzung ba de spangs pa'o/_gang spangs pa de grol ba'o/_gang las grol zhe na/_bdag 
[\[272a.2\]]tu 'dzin pa las grol/_sems can du 'dzin pa las grol/_srog tu 'dzin pa dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /_chad par 'dzin pa dang /_rtag par 'dzin pa las grol/_'dzin pa thams cad las grol/_yongs su rtog pa las grol te/_de yongs su mi rtog 
[\[272a.3\]]go_/yongs su mi rtog pas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go_/ci la mi rtog ce na/_nga dang nga'i zhes mi rtog ste/_de mi sogs shing sogs par mi byed la spongs zhing mi len to/_/spangs pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/grol lo/_/byung ngo /_/rab tu rnam par 
[\[272a.4\]]grol lo/_/bral lo/_/gang las byung zhe na/_sdug bsngal thams cad las byung ngo /_/khyim bdag khyed rnams 'byung bar 'dod na/_chos gang yang blang bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyim bdag rnams len pas ni srid par 'gyur ro/_/mi len pas ni srid pa med 
[\[272a.5\]]do/_/de la khyim bdag rnams mig yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin no/_/gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa nas/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[272a.6\]]pa ma yin mod kyi/_khyim bdag rnams gang rnam par shes pa la brten te/_nga dang nga'i zhes yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa de dang bral ba de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_gang dang bral na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin zhe na/_'dod chags dang bral ba ni 
[\[272a.7\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_zhe sdang dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/gti mug dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/mi shes pa dang bral ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_yang khyim bdag rnams mi shes pa ni 'das pa 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]dang /_da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa la med par gyur pa ma yin mod kyi/_mi shes pa dang bral nas shes pa skyes so/_/khyim bdag rnams de la shes pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zad pa shes pa'o/_/de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/_zad pa shes pa ni 'das pa ma yin/_zad pa 
[\[272b.2\]]shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_zad pa shes pa ni da ltar byung ba ma yin mod kyi/_khyim bdag rnams mig la brten te/_mi shes pa dang bral nas shes pa skyes par gyur pa de ni mi shes pa dang bral ba'i shes pa'o/_mig la brten te mi shes pa dang bral nas shes pa skyes 
[\[272b.3\]]kyang shes pa'i dbyings ni nga'i ba ma yin no/_/gang nga'i ba ma yin pa de yongs su ma bzung ba'o/_/gang yongs su ma bzung ba de spangs pa'o/_/gang spangs pa de grol ba'o/_/gang las grol zhe na/_bdag tu 'dzin pa las grol/_sems can du 'dzin pa dang /_srog tu 
[\[272b.4\]]'dzin pa dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /_chad par 'dzin pa dang /_rtag par 'dzin pa las grol/_yongs su rtog pa las grol te/_de yongs su mi rtog go_/yongs su mi rtog pas mi rtog rnam par mi rtag go_/ci la mi rtog ce na/_nga zhes mi rtog nga'i zhes mi rtog 
[\[272b.5\]]ste/_de mi sogs shing sogs pa med de/_len pa med cing spangs pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/grol lo/_/byung ngo /_/rab tu rnam par grol lo/_/bral lo/_/gang las byung zhe na/_sdug bsngal thams cad las byung ngo /_/khyim bdag khyed rnams 'byung 
[\[272b.6\]]bar 'dod na chos gang yang blang bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyim bdag rnams len pas ni srid par 'gyur gyi/_mi len pas ni ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/len pa 
[\[272b.7\]]las ni 'jigs skye ste/_/de phyir ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'jigs bcas gnas ni 'di mthong nas/_/mkhas pas de ni mi len to/_/lam gang nyid la bsgom bya ba/_/shes rab kyis ni de blta ste/_/shes rab kyis ni mthong 'gyur bas/_/rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]ro/_/skye mched thams cad stong pa ste/_/snying po med pa g.yo zhing gsog_/skye dgu rnams ni sred pas bslus/_/de la chags par mi bya'o/_/chos rnams stong par ngas mkhyen te/_/chos rnams snying po med par mkhyen/_/bde brnyes mya ngan mi mdzad de/_/
[\[273a.2\]]ngas ni mi g.yo bde ba brnyes/_/gang gis 'di ltar chos rnams kun/_/stong pa nyid du shes pa de/_/sdug bsngal dag ni kun las thar/_/de la rtsod pa med pa yin/_/'dod pa 'di ni yongs su 'dzin kun dang /_/gtse ba thams cad kyi yang skyed pa yin/_/yongs su 
[\[273a.3\]]'dzin pa dag las len par gsungs/_/len pa dag las srid pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/srid pa las ni rdzogs skye skye ba ste/_/de ni 'jug pa dag dang 'grub par 'gyur/_/skyes nas nad dang rga dang 'chi ba dang /_/mi 'dod sdug bsngal chen po gzhan dag gnod/_/
[\[273a.4\]]'dod pa med na len pa yod ma yin/_/len pa med na srid par mi 'gyur te/_/srid pa mngon par 'grub pa las 'das pa ni/_/skye rga na dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de phyir khyed kun gcig tu 'dus gyur nas/_/yongs su 'dzin pa rnam par spang byos la/_/bu dang chung 
[\[273a.5\]]ma dag la dga' spongs te/_/dge slong tshul 'di myur du blang bar byos/_/shes kyi khe 'dod rnyed pa 'dod ma byed/_/ngan ngon tsam dag gis ni chog byos la/_/gdol pa dag dang 'dra ba'i dma' sems kyis/_/gzhan gyi grong du nye bar 'gro bar bya/_/nga ni tshul khrims 
[\[273a.6\]]ldan zhes bdag ma snyems/_/'di ni tshul khrims ngan zhes gzhan ma brnyas/_/tshul khrims tsam gyis gzhan la gang brnyas pa/_/snyems phyir de ni tshul khrims 'chal ces bya/_/ji ltar [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dag ni rgyas zin pa/_/de dag nyid du de zin gsod pa ltar/_/de bzhin 
[\[273a.7\]]bdud kyi zhags pas zin pa de/_/snyems pa de nyid kyis ni de bcom mo/_/'phya ba'i bsam pa can gyi gang zag dag_/gzhan la brnyas pas bdag nyid nyams par byed/_/de bas tshul khrims 'chal la'ang mi brnyas na/_/khrims ldan tshangs par spyod la smos ci 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]dgos/_/drang srong des pa'i rjes su slob pa dag_/rnam par grol ba zhi ba 'di tshol zhing /_/lus dang srog rnams la yang mi lta bar/_/rtag tu dben pa dgon par gnas par bya/_/gnod pa'i rtsa ba gcer bu'i gsang tshig dang /_/'jig rten rgyang pan gsang tshig 
[\[273b.2\]]rnams spongs la/_/stong pa nyid dang ldan par gang gsungs pa/_/zab mo'i chos la dga' ba bskyed par byos/_/nang dang phyi rol dag gi skye mched ni/_/bcu gnyis po ste sems kyi rtsa bar bshad/_/de dag kun kyang las kyi rgyu las byung ngo /_/las kyang yun ring sems 
[\[273b.3\]]pas bzhag pa'o/_/mig dang gzugs gnyis la ni brten byas nas/_/rkyen rnams las kyang rnam par shes pa skye/_/'du ba ma tshang bas ni nub gyur te/_/ji ltar shing med me ni mi 'bar bzhin/_/de ltar chos 'di thams cad rab skyes pa/_/phan tshun 'dus pa 
[\[273b.4\]]las ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/byed pa po dang tshor ba mi dmigs te/_/bya ba dag ni sgyu ma lta bur snang /_/ngas ni nang dang phyi rol chos rnams kun/_/stong pa nyid de sgyu ma 'dra bar mkhyen/_/byis pa mi shes log par 'dzin pa dag_/nga dang nga yi zhes kyang rnam par rtog_/
[\[273b.5\]]mig ni nang na cung zad yod ma yin/_/phyi rol gang du'ang sems can mi dmigs te/_/mig ni bdag med byed med srog med de/_/chos rnams kun kyang de ltar shes par byos/_/mig ni sems shing grol bar 'dod ma yin/_/de bzhin rna ba dang ni sna dang lce/_/lus dang 
[\[273b.6\]]yid dang gzugs kyang byed med de/_/chos rnams thams cad de dang 'dra bar ltos/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho dag gi chu las ni/_/dbu ba rdos pa chen po mang byung ba/_/de la mig ldan tshul bzhin nges brtags na/_/dbu ba rdos pa nyam chung snying po med/_/de bzhin phung po lnga yi ngo bo 
[\[273b.7\]]nyid/_/dbu ba lta bur nyam chung gang shes pa/_/gtse ba thams cad dang ni skye ba dang /_/rga dang mya ngan gtse las grol bar 'gyur/_/gang dag nga yi bstan la rab byung nas/_/chos kun sgyu ma lta bur shes pa de/_/yul gyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par za/_/de ni phyogs 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas mchod par byed/_/de nas khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po sa phyogs de nyid na gnas pa de dag chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/'di lta ste dper na gos dog pa nag po dang bral ba tshon du bcug na myur du tshon 'dzin 
[\[274a.2\]]pa de bzhin du khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po sa phyogs de nyid na gnas pa de dag chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag 
[\[274a.3\]]par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas so/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi gtam ni 'di yin te/_khyim bdag rnams mig kun tu 'bar te/_cis kun tu 'bar zhe na/_'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar 
[\[274a.4\]]ro/_/skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pas kun tu 'bar te/_bdag gir bya ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad do/_/khyim bdag rnams rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_
[\[274a.5\]]lus dang /_yid kyi bar du kun tu 'bar te/_cis kun tu 'bar zhe na/_'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi me dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba 
[\[274a.6\]]dang /_'khrug pas kun tu 'bar te/_bdag gir bya ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad do/_/khyim bdag rnams gzugs kun tu 'bar te/_cis kun tu 'bar zhe na/_'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ro/_/de ltar sgra dang /_dri 
[\[274a.7\]]dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams kyang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/khyim bdag rnams gzugs kyi phung po kun tu 'bar te/_cis kun tu 'bar zhe na/_'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ro/_/tshor ba'i phung po dang /_
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]'du shes kyi phung po dang /_'du byed kyi phung po dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang de bzhin no/_/khyim bdag rnams sa'i khams kun tu 'bar te/_cis kun tu 'bar zhe na/_'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ro/_/khyim 
[\[274b.2\]]bdag rnams chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams kun tu 'bar te/_cis kun tu 'bar zhe na/_'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi mes kun tu 'bar ro/_/skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi 
[\[274b.3\]]ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pas kun tu 'bar te/_bdag gir bya ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad do/_/de bas na khyim bdag rnams mig blang bar mi bya'o/_/zhes khyim bdag rnams de ltar bslab 
[\[274b.4\]]par bya'o/_/de bzhin du khyim bdag rnams rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de bas na khyim bdag rnams gzugs blang bar mi bya/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos blang bar mi bya'o zhes 
[\[274b.5\]]de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/khyim bdag rnams gzugs kyi phung po blang bar mi bya/_tshor ba'i phung po dang /_'du shes kyi phung po dang /_'du byed kyi phung po dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po blang bar mi bya'o/_/zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de bas na khyim bdag rnams 
[\[274b.6\]]sa'i khams blang bar mi bya/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de bas na khyim bdag rnams rnam par shes pa'i khams blang bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de bas na 
[\[274b.7\]]khyim bdag rnams 'jig rten 'di blang bar mi bya/_'jig rten pha rol blang bar mi bya'o zhes khyim bdag rnams de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/khyim bdag khyed rnams nam mig mi len cing /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid mi len pa de na khyed rnams mig nas yid kyi 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]bar la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag khyed rnams nam gzugs mi len cing /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams mi len pa de na khyed rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag khyed rnams nam gzugs kyi 
[\[275a.2\]]phung po mi len cing tshor ba'i phung po dang /_'du shes kyi phung po dang /_'du byed kyi phung po mi len pa de na khyed rnams phung po rnams la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi len pa de na khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i phung po la mi gnas 
[\[275a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag khyed rnams nam sa'i khams mi len cing chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams mi len pa de na khyed rnams khams rnams la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag khyed rnams nam rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[275a.4\]]khams mi len pa de na khyed rnams rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag khyed rnams nam 'jig rten 'di mi len cing 'jig rten pha rol mi len pa de na khyed rnams 'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag khyed rnams nam chos 
[\[275a.5\]]thams cad mi len pa de na khyed rnams chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag khyed rnams nam chos thams cad la mi gnas pa de na khyed rnams mi 'byung mi 'jig go_/khyed rnams nam mi 'byung mi 'jig pa de na khyed rnams skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_
[\[275a.6\]]'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i 
[\[275a.7\]]phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/skye ba dang ni 'chi ba yis/_/'jig rten 'di kun kun nas 'bar/_/byis pa skyabs med gtse ba ste/_/de dag 'phags pa'i lam las nyams/_/brgya lam 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]bar 'gyur/_/dal ba chud zos ma byed par/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa tsam byos shig_/gang la gnas te rnam sgom pa/_/shes rab kyis ni de yang ltos/_/shes rab kyis ni de mthong ste/_/rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/gang la gnas te sems sgom pa/_/thams cad 
[\[275b.2\]]stong par shes par bya/_/chos rnams stong par rig nas ni/_/byang chub nyid kyang stong pa yin/_/'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang /_/me gsum de dag shin tu mi bzad pa/_/des ni 'jig rten 'di kun rab 'bar yang /_/byis pa ring nas gnyid log khong mi chud/_/
[\[275b.3\]]skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi ba dang /_/smre sngags 'don dang sdug bsngal yid mi bdes/_/'jig rten 'di dag gtses par rig nas ni/_/chos rnams kun la gnas par ma byed cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[275b.4\]]'das bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba rnyed par gyur cig_/bdag cag rnams kyis bde bar gshegs pa las bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag tshur shog ces gsungs pa dang /_de nyid 
[\[275b.5\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung bar gyur te/_de nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_de nyid kyis dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/_/'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/de dag gis ni ngur smrig bgos/_/de dag gis ni skra yang bregs/_/kun kyang lhung bzed 
[\[275b.6\]]thogs gyur nas/_/de nyid du ni dgra bcom gyur/_/ston pas dgra bcom rab mkhyen nas/_/dge slong gi ni dge 'dun dang /_/lha rnams mdun du mngon sum du/_/ched du rjod pa ched du rjod/_/'jig rten gyi ni mgon po la/_/sngon chad sbyin pa byin pas na/_/gang na bde ba mang 
[\[275b.7\]]ba der/_/shin tu dga' zhing 'ongs par gyur/_/de dag gis ni nga mthong nas/_/dad pas rab tu skyed par gyur/_/de dag sems ni dang ba la/_/chos rnams kyi ni mchog bstan to/_/dgra bcom gyi ni gsungs thos nas/_/bdag tu lta ba rnam par bshig_/stong nyid mngon du byas 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]nas ni/_/de dag skye ba kun las grol/_/khyim bdag gi le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam gyi bar du khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam po mi g.yo ba'i gnas la bkod nas kun nas mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen 
[\[276a.2\]]por gshegs so/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lha rnams dang /_gnod sbyin ci 'jigs 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gis 'di lta bu sbyin gnas 'jig rten na shin tu dkon pa'i bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms dbul lo snyam mo/_/de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs 
[\[276a.3\]]kyis bsod snyoms kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/_dri phun sum tshogs pa/_ro phun sum tshogs pa/_reg pa phun sum tshogs pa bcom ldan 'das la phul nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms de bzhes so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[276a.4\]]la gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis bsod snyoms phul ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe steng gi bar snang las ci 'jigs kyi 'khor mang po gnod sbyin drug khri brgyad stong gis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rjes su yi rang ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/de nas de'i phyir gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyis rang gi 'khor 
[\[276a.5\]]rnams la bos te/_bdag gis ni da gzod de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms phul gyis/_khyed kyis ni dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul cig_/de ni khyed rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis dge slong gi dge 
[\[276a.6\]]'dun la bsod snyoms phul nas gnod sbyin de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang bsod snyoms blangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa las des bsod snyoms blangs par mkhyen nas phyogs de nas slar 
[\[276a.7\]]log go_/de ltar de'i tshe lha stong phrag du ma dang /_klu stong phrag du ma dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po stong phrag du ma dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang /_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]phrag du ma rnams bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring du dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che ba zhig tu gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs 'khor dang bcas pas lha'i me tog 
[\[276b.2\]]man dA ra dang /_ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gtor/_mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor to/_/gtor mngon par gtor/_
[\[276b.3\]]mngon par rab tu gtor nas thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bsam pa yang mkhyen/_de'i 'khor gnod sbyin mang po'i bsam pa yang mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos 
[\[276b.4\]]nyid ni 'di yin te/_nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de na zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/_
[\[276b.5\]]des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid med par byas te/_sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/_slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor 
[\[276b.6\]]ba byas te/_kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/kha cig ni phrag par nub bo/_/kha cig ni pus mor nub bo/_/chos nyid ni 'di yin te/_nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od 
[\[276b.7\]]zer zhabs gnyis kyi 'og tu nub par 'gyur ro/_/nam dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/nam gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer mdun du nub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]nam mi rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer g.yon du nub par 'gyur ro/_/nam lha rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer g.yas su nub par 'gyur ro/_/nam nyan thos rnams la lung ston pa de na 'od zer pus mor nub par 'gyur ro/_/nam rang sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[277a.2\]]la lung ston pa de na 'od zer phrag par nub par 'gyur ro/_/nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa de na 'od zer steng gi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams su nub par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[277a.3\]]kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong ste/_mthong nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol 
[\[277a.4\]]to/_/ci rgyus 'jig rten snang mdzad pa/_/'jig rten kun la sman pa'i slad/_/'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/_/ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/_/de ring su yis sa bon btab/_/de ring su la lung yang ston/_/gang zhig thar phyir rab tu 
[\[277a.5\]]zhugs/_/dpa' bo rnam par 'dren pa rnams/_/rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad/_/thub pa ci slad 'dzum pa bstan/_/'od zer don ni bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar gsungs pa/_/
[\[277a.6\]]'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/_/ci 'jigs rab tu dad sems kyis/_/bsod snyoms dag ni phul bas na/_/de ltar de phyir 'dzum pa mdzad/_/gnod sbyin 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_/sum cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sum cu gsum nas shi 'phos nas/_/'thab bral 
[\[277a.7\]]du yang 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'thab bral nas ni dga' ldan 'gro/_/'dod la 'dod pas dgar byas nas/_/mi yi nang du skye 'gyur te/_/rgyal po rdzu 'phrul ldan par 'gyur/_/'khor los sgyur ba mi yi dbang /_/gling bzhi dag gi dbang po ste/_/mi yi 'jig rten shi 'phos 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]nas/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba nyi shur ni/_/rtag tu bsti stang byas par 'gyur/_/lha yi nang dang mi nang du/_/yang dang yang ni kun tu 'gro/_/phyis de rgyal srid bor nas ni/_/khyim med par yang rab tu 'byung /_/rkyen gyis byang chub 
[\[277b.2\]]thob 'gyur te/_/der ni mtha' yang thug par 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin dag ni sum khri rnams/_/gnod sbyin skye gnas 'phos gyur nas/_/sum cu rtsa gsum skye bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas la ni gus byas nas/_/sangs rgyas byams pa mthong gyur cing /_/de na mthar 
[\[277b.3\]]ni thug 'gyur te/_/dgra bcom pa yang thob 'gyur na/_/ston pa la ni su mi mchod/_/gnod sbyin stong du tshang ba rnams/_/byang chub mchog la rab zhugs pas/_/de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_/nam du'ang ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/kha cig srog chags kun phan 
[\[277b.4\]]phyir/_/byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing /_/sangs rgyas 'dren pa stong rnams la/_/bkur sti dag ni byed par 'gyur/_/kha cig sangs rgyas byang chub phyir/_/stong phrag gnyis dang gsum dag kyang /_/me tog phreng ba dri rnams kyis/_/mchod pa dag ni byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[277b.5\]]dag pa bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can/_/'dren pa bye ba phrag stong la/_/kha cig bkur sti byed 'gyur te/_/'di dag phyis ni byang chub reg_/de na ci 'jigs de yi bu/_/ri bo zhes bya rdzu 'phrul che/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag gyur ces/_/des kyang sems ni bskyed par 
[\[277b.6\]]gyur/_/des ni sangs rgyas bsti stang byas/_/thams cad du yang smon lam btab/_/nga mthong nas ni mchod byas te/_/byang chub phyir ni sems btud do/_/de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_/ngan 'gro thams cad spangs gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas byams pa mthong nas ni/_/
[\[277b.7\]]gdugs rnams bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur/_/gdugs rnams bye ba phul nas ni/_/na bza' bye ba 'bul bar 'gyur/_/na bza' bye ba phul nas ni/_/de nyid du yang rab tu 'byung /_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub dam pa rab tshol zhing /_/lo yang lnga 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]brgya tshang bar ni/_/tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/_/'di lta bu yi rnam grangs kyis/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims yang dag spyod/_/gang gA'i bye ma ji snyed pa/_/de snyed bskal par spyod par 'gyur/_/dper gsungs pa ni de snyed du/_/de dag khyed kyis 
[\[278a.2\]]shes par gyis/_/de dag dper yang shes nas ni/_/de bas lhag par spyad par gyis/_/sngar ni dpe rnams gang brjod pa/_/gang gA yi ni bye snyed kyi/_/de snyed sangs rgyas mthong gyur nas/_/de dag kun la bsti stang byed/_/e ma'o ye shes e ma shes/_/e ma'o 
[\[278a.3\]]bla na med pa'i sems/_/sems can kun gyi 'dren pa ni/_/de ltar zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/de phyis sems can kun gyi mchog_/sangs rgyas su yang de 'gyur te/_/de ni de yi mtshan btags pa/_/sman pa'i rgyal por rnam par grags/_/lo ni bye ba bdun cur 
[\[278a.4\]]yang /_/srog chags rnams la chos bstan te/_/phyis gdod rkang gnyis gtso bo ni/_/de nas mya ngan 'das par 'gyur/_/rab tu dul ba'i sems rnams kyi/_/'dus pa dag ni nyi shur 'gyur/_/de la tha ma gcig po ni/_/dge slong bye ba nyi shur 'gyur/_/'dus pa 
[\[278a.5\]]rnams ni gang brjod pa'i/_/nyan thos dpag tu med pa ste/_/de yi nyan thos ji snyed pa/_/byang chub zhugs pa'ang de snyed do/_/sems can rnams kyi don mdzad nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'das/_/lo ni brgya phrag stong dag tu/_/de yi dam chos gnas par 'gyur/_/
[\[278a.6\]]bskal pa lnga brgya tshang bar ni/_/sangs rgyas mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa gcig la'ang 'byung ba ni/_/de na stong rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi rnams mkhas pa gang dag ni/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams bsnyen 'dod pa/_/tshul bzhin mang du thos pa dang /_/rab tu 
[\[278a.7\]]'dun pa nyid du bya/_/tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par spongs/_/tshul bzhin la ni rtag tu sgoms/_/mang du thos pa rab tu bya/_/des ni shes rab rnam par 'phel/_/byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi/_/rtsa ba'i don ni chos bzhi ste/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims thos 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]dang gtong /_/byang chub kyi ni lam la bzang /_/bla na med pa'i theg pa mchog_/byang chub kyi ni lam yang bstan/_/the tshom gcod pa bzang po yis/_/nyan thos kyi ni lam bstan to/_/sems can gang dag 'di 'dod pa/_/de la ngas ni skabs dbye'o/_/chos 
[\[278b.2\]]rnams kyi ni mchog ston pa/_/'jig rten snang mdzad rnyed par dka'/_/de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs zhes grag gis/_/bdag gis bcom ldan 
[\[278b.3\]]'das la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po zhig skyed do snyam mo/_/de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos rang gi 'khor la smras pa/_grogs po dag shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 
[\[278b.4\]]gshegs kyis/_de la grogs po dag mthu ci yod pa dang /_ci nus kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la spro ba skyed cig_/de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo g.yog dang bcas pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas bzung ste/_ri'i rgyal po bya rgod 
[\[278b.5\]]kyi phung po'i bar gyi lam de thams cad gseg ma dang /_gyo mo dang /_sdong dum dang /_tsher ma rnams med par byas so/_/me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar dag par byas so/_/lam de dag thams cad bsal nas spos kyi chus kun tu chag chag btab bo/_/lam der 
[\[278b.6\]]gos ni mtshams med par bting ngo /_/lam der mi gang tsam du me tog gis chal par bkram mo/_/lam de dag gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyis shin tu brgyan to/_/lam de bdug spos dam pa'i snying po rab kyi snod nas bdugs so/_/steng gi bar snang las 
[\[278b.7\]]dar gyi lnga ldir sbyangs te/_shin tu brgyan to/_/lam der sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sgra 'khrol bar byas so/_/lam de nas mda' rgyang gang tshun chad tsam me tog ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos khebs shing ngur pa sgra 'byin par byas so/_/lam der gser glebs 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]pas rab tu g.yogs so/_/lam de gser gyi dra ba dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi dra bas rab tu g.yogs so/_/de nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du de lta bu'i bkod pa byas nas lus chen po mngon par sprul te/_'khor dang bcas pa dga' mgu rangs 
[\[279a.2\]]rab tu dga' ste/_mos shing yid bde ba skyes nas/_dga' ba'i sems dang /_bde ba'i sems dang /_mnyen pa'i sems dang /_rnam par dang ba'i sems dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang /_rab tu sim pa'i sems dang /_sangs rgyas la gzhol ba'i sems dang /_
[\[279a.3\]]chos la gzhol ba'i sems dang /_dge 'dun la gzhol ba'i sems dang /_byang chub las mi g.yo ba'i sems dang /_mi bskyod pa'i sems dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems dang /_'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems dang /_
[\[279a.4\]]sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_dga' ba'i sems dang /_btang snyoms kyi sems dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems dang /_snying po'i sems dang /_brtan pa'i sems dang /_mi 
[\[279a.5\]]phyed pa'i sems dang /_ma zhigs pa'i sems dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba'i sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad bsgrub pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[279a.6\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[279a.7\]]gsol to/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams kyi mchog_/chos rnams kyi ni dam pa ston/_/'jig rten mgon la bdag gis ni/_/bla na ma mchis mchod pa bgyis/_/'dren pa ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin/_/stobs bcu dang ni rab ldan te/_/mi 'jigs pa la rab 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]gnas nas/_/sems can don rnams bgyid par shog_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams dang /_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan/_/'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/_/'jig rten snang ba byed par shog_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/snyan pa'i chos 
[\[279b.2\]]ni rab ston cing /_/rnam pa bcu gnyis dam pa yi/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog_/rgyal ba ji lta de bzhin du/_/cho 'phrul rnams ni rab ston cing /_/srog chags bye ba du ma yi/_/sems can rnams kyi don bgyid shog_/dpa' chen gang rnams ma byon pa/_/
[\[279b.3\]]'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad ltar/_/byang chub dam pa rab rtogs nas/_/lam de rab tu ston par shog_/sems can ldongs pa kun gyi phyir/_/mig dang ldan pa nyid gyur te/_/gnas dang rten dang skyabs dag dang /_/de bzhin dpung gnyen 'gyur bar shog_/
[\[279b.4\]]ji ltar 'dren pa grol mdzad bzhin/_/'gro ba lngar ni skyes pa yi/_/srog chags rnams kyi mgon du shog_/bdag gis sdug bsngal kun las dgrol/_/'jig rten na ni mtshungs pa yod med pa/_/lha dbang lha ma yin dang klus mchod pa/_/gzi brjid dag ni mtha' yas 
[\[279b.5\]]'od mdzad pa/_/rkang gnyis mchog la bdag gis mchod pa bgyis/_/bdag ni las mchog dam pa 'di dag gis/_/mi dbang sa steng mchog tu gyur pa bzhin/_/bsod nams rab mchog sum cu gnyis mtshan ldan/_/chos kyi bdag po de dang 'dra bar shog_/
[\[279b.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bo la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis gsungs pa/_chos kyi dam pa rnams kyi phyir/_/ston pa'i rim gro gang byed pa/_/sems can rnams kyi mchog yin te/_/de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/'jig 
[\[279b.7\]]rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/_/'jig rten snang mdzad mchog la ni/_/lha dang klu dang mi rnams kyis/_/mchod pa bya bar 'os par 'gyur/_/byang chub mchog tu sangs rgyas nas/_/shing mchog drung du rab 'dug ste/_/sdig can bdud las rgyal nas su/_/srog chags 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]rnams la chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lha stong phrag du ma dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po stong phrag du ma dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po stong phrag du ma dang /_/mi dang mi ma yin pa stong phrag du ma dang /_srog chags bye ba khrag 
[\[280a.2\]]khrig brgya stong phrag du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_/sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen pos 'od zer ni rab 
[\[280a.3\]]tu 'gyed/_zhing ni rab tu g.yo bar byas/_me tog gi char ni rab tu 'bebs/_sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig ni rab tu 'khrol bar byas te/_gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi bu ri bos lam du bkod pa ji ltar mngon par byas pa bzhin du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi pad ma la zhabs bzhag 
[\[280a.4\]]ste/_ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan mchog chos kyi gdan/_gdan dam pa/_gdan bzang po/_'jig rten gsum po kun las khyad par du 'phags 
[\[280a.5\]]pa'i gdan/_sangs rgyas kyi gdan shoms shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs te/_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten rnams la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[280a.6\]]sde snod ces bya ba'i mdo sde sems can thams cad la phan par rab tu bsngags pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa 'chad par 'gyur te/_de yang sems can thams cad the tshom du gyur pa la rab tu ston pa/_sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa/_sems 
[\[280a.7\]]can thams cad kyi the tshom skye ba gcod pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde 'di 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te/_de na lha bye ba drug cu rtsa brgyad kyis ras bcos ma re re de bzhin 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]gshegs pa la phul te/_de dag kyang der gdan du bting bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de rnams la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis gsungs pa/_/'jig rten mgon gyi gdan du ni/_/lha 
[\[280b.2\]]yi gos rab dam pa mchog_/lha yis rab tu bting ba la/_/de la rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs/_/thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin/_/sangs rgyas bzhugs par gyur ma thag_/'jig rten rnam pa drug g.yos shing /_/skye bo rab tu dga' bar gyur/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni 
[\[280b.3\]]ri dang bcas/_/de na rab tu snang bar gyur/_/de na chos 'dod rnams la ni/_/skyob pa sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul ston/_/lha dang klu dang mi rnams dang /_/grul bum [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]srul po rnams/_/de dag gcig gis gcig mthong ste/_/sgrib pa dag ni med par gyur/_/lha rnams 
[\[280b.4\]]bye ba phrag stong dang /_/khrag khrig phrag ni brgya rnams dag_/rnyed dga' yi ni tshig gsung ba/_/sangs rgyas la ni dga' bas lta/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang /_/de tshe blon pos yongs bskor cing /_/'jig rten gyi ni mgon po mchog_/sangs rgyas drung du 'ongs 
[\[280b.5\]]par gyur/_/ston pas lha dang klu rnams dang /_/mi rnams 'dus par mkhyen pa dang /_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu rab gzigs nas/_/'jig rten the tshom gang yod pa/_/rkang gnyis mchog la dris shig dang /_/the tshom dag ni dris pa 
[\[280b.6\]]rnams/_/rnam par 'dren pa ngas bshad do/_/de ltar de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed 'dus nas/_chos nyan pa de dag thams cad kyis dal bar shes nas/_sems can thams cad kyis bsams te/_phyag 'tshal nas chos 
[\[280b.7\]]mnyan pa'i phyir rna ba blags te 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu chen po dge slong ma 'dus pa rnams la soms la/_ma lhags pa rnams kyang tshol te/_rgyang ring po na gnas pa rnams kyang 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]sdus shig_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ri'i rgyal po kha ba can gyi lho phyogs kyi ngos la gnas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams te/_bsams nas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ga la ba der song ste 
[\[281a.2\]]phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po longs shig_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_bdud du bcas pa dang /_tshangs par bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu 
[\[281a.3\]]rnams dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'khor gyi mdun du chos ston te/_ston pas bka' stsal gyis/_btsun pa 'od srung bdag cag gnyis kyi chos kyi bar chad du 'gyur du 'ong gis 'dong ngo /_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang 
[\[281a.4\]]ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod song shig dang /_kho bo yang khyod song ba'i rjes bzhin du 'ong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos stan de la 'phrul ba sprul te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal po'i khab 
[\[281a.5\]]kyi grong khyer chen por zhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor bzhis bskor cing mdun du bdar nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor 
[\[281a.6\]]gyi nang du ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sprul pa de mthong nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bcom 
[\[281a.7\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'dug par mthong ste/_mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa 'od srung khyod stan ga la ba de nas sprul te/_sprul nas mgyogs par bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te/_spyan sngar ha cang 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'khor gyi nang na phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa ni myur ba la sten pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan no/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ni bcom 
[\[281b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gsungs na 'di la kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa lta ci zhig tu 'gyur/_gnod sbyin ci 'jigs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//bam po gsum pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te 
[\[281b.3\]]bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das 
[\[281b.4\]]kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[281b.5\]]shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i 
[\[281b.6\]]bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dag lags/_ngag gi las kho na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang /_yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa dang /_lus kyi las 
[\[281b.7\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang /_yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang /_lus kyi las ma g.yos pa dang /_ngag gi las ma g.yos pa dang /_yid kyi las ma g.yos pa rnams lags/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]bdud dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyod mi nus pa rnams lags/_sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/_sems can thams cad kyi 'dren par gyur pa dang /_rnam par 'dren par gyur pa dang /_yongs su 'dren par gyur pa dang /_sgron mar 
[\[282a.2\]]gyur pa dang /_stegs su gyur pa dang /_zam par gyur pa dang /_grur gyur pa dang /_sgrol ba po dang /_pha rol du 'gro bar gyur pa dang /_gnas dang mgon dang skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen du gyur pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bzlog par mi 
[\[282a.3\]]nus pa rnams lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis don de nyid kun zhus pa/_/gang gis byang chub rab zhugs pa/_/dpa' bo de yi don ci lags/_/gang gis dam pa 'tshang rgya ba/_/yon tan chos rnams brjod du 
[\[282a.4\]]gsol/_/srog chags kun la sman slad du/_/dpa' bo de dag ji ltar spyod/_/ji lta bu yi chos bsgoms pas/_/mi yi dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por rab gnas nas/_/sdig can dag ni ji ltar 'dul/_/bye ba dag gi zhing bskyod nas/_/ji ltar byang chub 
[\[282a.5\]]mchog 'tshang rgya/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gi don/_/'di 'dra'i tshig ni ci zhig lags/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi mchog rnams dang /_/byang chub dag ni 'dir brjod gsol/_/srog chags kun las sman slad du/_/pad ma bzhin du ma chags shing /_/sems can 
[\[282a.6\]]bye ba grol mdzad par/_/'jig rten 'di ni ji ltar spyod/_/mkhas pa lha dang klu dag dang /_/mi dang mi ma lags rnams kyis/_/ji lta bur ni mchod 'gyur ba/_/zhus pa de dag bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces 
[\[282a.7\]]bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos gcig po de dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag dang /_gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yongs su 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bsam pa ji lta bu/_byang chub 
[\[282b.2\]]kyi sems ji lta bu/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu bsam pa zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i phyir snying po'o/_/brten pa'i phyir mi phyed pa'o/_/mi g.yo ba'i phyir brtan pa'o/_/ma 'khrul 
[\[282b.3\]]ba'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o/_/shin tu gnas pa'i phyir ma 'khrul pa'o/_/mi zlogs pa'i phyir shin tu gnas pa'o/_/sems can la lta ba'i phyir mi zlogs pa'o/_/snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i phyir sems can la lta ba'o/_/yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rtsa 
[\[282b.4\]]ba'o/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'i phyir yongs su mi skyo ba'o/_/bdag la bde ba ma yin pa'i phyir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa'o/_/lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'i phyir bdag bde ba ma yin pa'o/_/zang zing med pa'i 
[\[282b.5\]]phyir lan du phan 'dogs par re ba med pa'o/_/sems can gyi phyir 'brang bas zang zing med pa'o/_/mthu chung ba'i sems can la lta ba'i phyir sems can gyi phyir 'brang ba'o/_/mgon du gyur pa'i phyir mthu chung ba'i sems can la lta ba'o/_/skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyi phyir 
[\[282b.6\]]mgon du gyur pa'o/_/ma 'khrugs pa'i phyir skyabs dang dpung gnyen no/_/shin tu yang dag par brtags pa'i phyir ma 'khrugs pa'o/_/rtsod pa med pa'i phyir shin tu yang dag par brtag pa'o/_/bsam pa dge ba'i phyir rtsod pa med pa'o/_/ci yang med pa'i phyir bsam 
[\[282b.7\]]pa dge ba'o/_/shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir ci yang med pa'o/_/rab tu byung bar byas pa'i phyir shin tu yongs su dag pa'o/_/nang dri ma med pa'i phyir rab tu byang bar byas pa'o/_/phyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'o/_/de ltar shA ri'i bu mi phyed pas 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]snying po zhes bya ba nas phyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir nang dri ma med pa'i bar du ste/_bsam pa ni de lta bu'o/_/byang chub kyi sems ji lta bu zhe na/_sems de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba'o/_/sems de ni theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i phyir 'brel ba 
[\[283a.2\]]med pa'o/_/sems de ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir brtan pa'o/_/sems de ni bdud thams cad kyis mi phyed pa'o/_/sems de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir rtag pa'o/_/sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba'o/_/
[\[283a.3\]]sems de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa'o/_/sems de ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir bla na med pa'o/_/sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nges par phigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'o/_/sems de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la mi mnyam pa 
[\[283a.4\]]med pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o/_/sems de ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o/_/sems de ni shes rab kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o/_/sems de ni sems can thams cad la skabs 'byed pa'i phyir rgya che ba'o/_/sems de 
[\[283a.5\]]ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir yangs pa'o/_/sems de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la btang ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'o/_/sems de ni snying rje chen po ma bcad pa'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o/_/sems de ni mkhas pas bsngags pa'i phyir mngon du 'gro bar 
[\[283a.6\]]bya ba'o/_/sems de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa'o/_/sems de ni bde ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi gnas so/_/sems de ni tshul khrims kyis smon lam las byung ba'o/_/sems de ni bzod pas bsnyen par dga' ba'o/_/sems de ni brtson 'grus kyis 
[\[283a.7\]]thul bar dka' ba'o/_/sems de ni bsam gtan dag gis nye bar zhi ba'o/_/sems de ni shes rab kyi tshogs kyis gnod pa med pa'o/_/yang sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]par grol ba'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o/_/sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po'i rtsa ba'o/_/sems de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rnams kyi 
[\[283b.2\]]rtsa ba'o/_/yang shA ri'i bu sems de ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/_de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems de lta bu dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/sems rgya chen po sems can 
[\[283b.3\]]mchog rab ces bya'o/_/'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du gyur pa'i sems can zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/_ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/_yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa yin/_lus kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/_
[\[283b.4\]]ngag gi las yongs su dag pa yin/_yid kyi las yongs su dag pa yin/_lus kyi las ma g.yos pa yin/_ngag gi las ma g.yos pa yin/_yid kyi las ma g.yos pa yin te/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams

[\[283b.6\]]pa dang /_stegs su gyur pa dang /_zam par gyur pa dang /_grur gyur pa dang /_sgrol bar gyur pa dang /_pha rol tu 'gro ba dang /_gnas dang /_mgon dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen yin no/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa de las bdud dang 
[\[283b.7\]]bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bskyod par mi nus pa yin no/_/de ltar na shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas dad pa yin no/_/dad pa mang ba dang /_'phags pa rnams mthong bar 'dod 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]pa dang /_chos nyan par 'dod pa yin/_ser sna med cing lhug par gtong ba dang /_lag brkyang zhing rnam par gtong ba la dga' ba dang /_sbyin pa bged pa la dga' ba yin/_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems yin/_rnyog pa med pa'i sems 
[\[284a.2\]]dang /_'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang /_ma 'dres pa'i sems dang /_de las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mngon par dad pa dang /_rab tu rtog cing yid ches pa dang /_the tshom med cing som nyi med pa yin no/_/de nag po dang /_dkar po'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu mi 
[\[284a.3\]]stor bar shes pas srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa yin te/_de srog gcod pa spong ba yin/_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal ba dang /_brnab sems dang /_
[\[284a.4\]]gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba spong ba yin te/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag spangs nas/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par len cing spyod do/_/de dad pa dang ldan pas gang dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dag yang dag par song ba dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa 
[\[284a.5\]]dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_dge ba'i chos can dang /_mang du thos pa dang /_thos pa la brtson pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang /_dul ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_rtsod pa'i smra ba med pa dang /_mi snyan par smra ba med pa dang /_bsam 
[\[284a.6\]]pa dge zhing mi dge ba'i bsam pa med pa dang /_dge ba la yang dag par sbyor ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang /_rgod pa med pa dang /_khengs pa ma yin pa dang /_yab yab po med pa dang /_mu cor mi smra ba dang /_tshig ma 'dres pa dang /_dran 
[\[284a.7\]]pa nye bar gnas pa dang /_sems shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa de dag dang /_ji ltar srid par 'dren pa bcad pa dang /_zug rngu phyung ba dang /_khur bor ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_yang srid pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /_de lta bu'i dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig nas de dag la bsnyen cing bsten te/_bsnyen bkur byed cing mgu bar byed kyi/_yid byung bar mi byed do/_/dga' bar byed kyi/_mi dga' bar mi byed do/_/

[\[284b.3\]]dang /_tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba dang /_thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang /_sgom pas 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/'di ni sbyin pa/_'di ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /_'di ni ser sna/_'di ni ser sna'i 'bras bu/_'di ni tshul 
[\[284b.4\]]khrims/_'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/_'di ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims/_'di ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa/_'di ni bzod pa/_'di ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa/_'di ni gnod sems/_'di ni gnod sems kyi rnam par smin pa/_'di ni brtson 
[\[284b.5\]]'grus/_'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa/_'di ni le lo/_'di ni le lo'i rnam par smin pa/_'di ni bsam gtan/_'di ni bsam gtan rnams kyi rnam par smin pa/_'di ni sems g.yeng ba/_'di ni sems g.yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa/_'di ni shes rab/_
[\[284b.6\]]'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/_'di ni 'chal ba'i shes rab/_'di ni 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa/_'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa/_'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa/_'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa/_'di ni lus
